fields.product_name: AFFIX - Nylon Backpack - Men - Black
fields.description: AFFIX's backpack is made from tough, lightweight nylon that packs away neatlyMinimal in design and construction, it's sized to hold as much as your gym kit and a small laptop and features an external zipped pocket to keep cards within easy reach.

fields.product_name: Ader Error - Logo-AppliquÃ©d Canvas Backpack - Men - Black
fields.description: Korean collective Ader Error combines traditional and retro influences with the contemporary and even futuristicThis backpack is made from sturdy canvas and fitted with a spacious main compartment, laptop sleeve and ventilating mesh back panelThe colourful bungee cord drawstring is inspired by classic outdoors gear.

fields.product_name: Anderson's - Full-Grain Leather and Suede Backpack - Men - Blue
fields.description: Anderson's spends up to six months naturally tanning its hides, resulting in supple, durable leather like the kind used to make this backpackHandcrafted in Parma, Italy, it's panelled with tonal suede at the front and has internal pockets to keep everything organised.

fields.product_name: Anderson's - Textured Leather-Trimmed Suede Backpack - Men - Green
fields.description: Anderson's flap-top backpack has a charming vintage feelIt's made from durable suede and supple textured-leather, and has comfortable adjustable shoulder strapsUse the internal zipped pocket to organise smaller items, like your phone and keysWear it with: Massimo Alba Trousers, Massimo Alba Sweater, Brunello Cucinelli Knitwear, Mr PShoes.

fields.product_name: Balenciaga - Scribble Printed Canvas Backpack - Men - Black
fields.description: Balenciaga's 'Scribble' backpack features two version of the house's moniker, an all-over cursive logo and a block print along the topSpacious enough to fit all of your daily essentials, it's made from sturdy canvas and has adjustable shoulder strapsKeep your phone easily accessible by storing it in the front zipped pocketWear it with: Balenciaga Sweatpants, Balenciaga T-shirt, Balenciaga Sneakers, Balenciaga Ring.

fields.product_name: Balenciaga - Arena Logo-Print Crinkled-Leather Backpack - Men - Black
fields.description: Balenciaga's spacious 'Arena' backpack is ideal for short trips and weekends awayMade from the brand's signature crinkled-leather, it's oversized in shape and fitted with mesh pouches at either side for bottlesThe external pocket is subtly stamped with the house's moniker.

fields.product_name: Balenciaga - Explorer Logo-Detailed Canvas Backpack - Men - Black
fields.description: Balenciaga's 'Explorer' backpack is made from sturdy canvas and detailed front and centre with the house's logoInside, there's plenty of room for a laptop, gym kit and a paperback or twoKeep your keys or cardholder safe in the internal zipped pocket.

fields.product_name: Bennett Winch - Full-Grain Leather Backpack - Men - Black
fields.description: Bennett Winch 's backpack is made from Tuscan leather, selected for its richness, durability and characterful full-grain that will disguise wear and tear and age beautifullyInside, it has a detachable section to separate your kit and keep everything organisedThe minimal design makes it appropriate for wearing with tailoring to the officeShown here with Mr Pjacket, J.Crew trousers, Maison KitsunÃ© T-shirt, Paul Smith sneakers.

fields.product_name: Bleu de Chauffe - Woody Leather-Trimmed Waxed Cotton-Canvas Backpack - Men - Green
fields.description: Bleu de Chauffe's designs are inspired by workwear, so naturally they're hard-wearing and always feature plenty of practical detailsModelled on traditional climbing styles, this 'Woody' backpack is handmade from cotton-canvas that's waxed for durabilityIt has vegetable-tanned leather trims, adjustable buckled straps to personalise the fit and an internal padded sleeve for your laptopWear it with: Mr PJeans, A.P.CShirt, Converse Sneakers.

fields.product_name: Bleu de Chauffe - Bayou Leather-Trimmed Waxed Cotton-Ripstop Backpack - Men - Blue
fields.description: Bleu de Chauffe draws inspiration from vintage French workwear, which explains the functional details of this backpack, note the adjustable webbing straps and practical compartmentsIdeal for weekend trips or your daily commute, it's made from British Millerain's waterproof waxed cotton-ripstop and has a padded Air Mesh back panel with double-layer foam lining for comfortWear it with: Nudie Jeans Shirt, A.P.CShorts, Veja Sneakers.

fields.product_name: Bleu de Chauffe - Full-Grain Leather Backpack - Men - Brown
fields.description: Bleu de Chauffe is dedicated to French style and tradition, from its name (which describes those classic blue worker jackets), to its workshop and tanneries, which are all based in the countryCrafted by hand from vegetable-tanned full-grain leather, this backpack is fitted with a felted sleeve on the inside to protect a tablet or small laptopWear it with: Mr PT-shirt, Barena Trousers, J.MWeston Sneakers.

fields.product_name: Bleu de Chauffe - Basile Leather-Trimmed Waxed Cotton-Ripstop Backpack - Men - Neutrals
fields.description: Bleu de Chauffe's 'Basile' backpack has been made in France from the same waxed cotton-ripstop that's used for sails and parachutes, so you can trust that it's durable and resistant to moistureFeaturing a padded 'Air Mesh' back panel and ergonomic straps for comfort, it has waterproof pockets, vegetable-tanned leather trims and a sleeve that will fit a 13 laptopWear it with: Folk T-shirt, NN07 Trousers, Converse Sneakers, Bleu de Chauffe Belt.

fields.product_name: Brunello Cucinelli - Leather-Trimmed Suede Backpack - Men - Burgundy
fields.description: Brunello Cucinelli's premium materials make even simple designs feel elevatedCrafted from a combination of smooth and textured suede, this dark-burgundy backpack has durable leather trims, plenty of pockets and enough space for your commuting and daily essentials.

fields.product_name: Brunello Cucinelli - Suede-Trimmed Burnished Full-Grain Leather Backpack - Men - Brown
fields.description: Brunello Cucinelli's commitment to fine fabrics and artful craftsmanship ensures this backpack is as practical as it is smartAssembled in the label's Solomeo workshop from supple burnished full-grain leather and finished with a tonal suede back panel, it unzips to a spacious interior and has two side pockets for keeping essentials within easy reach.

fields.product_name: Bottega Veneta - Webbing-Trimmed Shell Backpack - Men - Orange
fields.description: Bottega Veneta's bright-orange backpack is really durable and practical, like the outdoor gear it's inspired byDesigned with mesh pockets for a water bottle and keys, plus a zipped one to stash your phone, it's been made in Italy from water-resistant shell and has padded straps for comfortThe roll-down top and adjustable webbing trims keep everything secure.

fields.product_name: Bottega Veneta - Intrecciato Padded Quilted Nylon Backpack - Men - Black
fields.description: Bottega Veneta invented its intrecciato weave initially to strengthen small strips of leather, but its popularity has encouraged the brand to experiment with other materials, including nylon in the case of this backpackThe technique provides the same resilience, while extra padding helps ensure your cargo is protectedWear it with: Prada Sweatshirt, Balenciaga Trousers, Balenciaga Shoes.

fields.product_name: Dunhill - Belgrave Full-Grain Leather Backpack - Men - Black
fields.description: Part of the 'Belgrave' collection, Dunhill's backpack is inspired by vintage styles and offers a smart alternative to a briefcaseIt's made from black full-grain leather and has a spacious interior fitted with a padded laptop sleeveThe external pocket fastens with an engine-turned faceted silver buckle.

fields.product_name: Eastpak - Tecum L CNNCT Canvas Backpack - Men - Green
fields.description: A functional backpack doesn't mean compromising on style, which is something that Eastpak proves over and againThis version of its 'Tecum L CNNCT' bag is made from technical canvas with a zipped pocket at the front and plenty of compartments on the inside to organise everything, including a protective sleeve for your laptopSmall details, like the expandable webbing side tabs, D-rings on the shoulder straps and low-profile top handle make it really convenientWear it with: Folk T-shirt, Vans Jacket, AG Jeans Jeans, Veja Sneakers.

fields.product_name: Dunhill - Cadogan Full-Grain Leather Backpack - Men - Black
fields.description: Dunhill's 'Cadogan' backpack is designed for busy commutes and urban adventures alike â it's made from full-grain leather and fitted with a single adjustable shoulder strap that'll allow you to carry it cross-body whenever you need to go hands-freeUse the zipped compartments to keep small valuables on hand.

fields.product_name: Engineered Garments - Nylon-Ripstop Backpack - Men - Gray
fields.description: Engineered Garments' backpack is designed to standup to everything from daily wear on your commute to rigorous adventure like mountain climbingConstructed from durable yet lightweight nylon-ripstop, it has roomy interior and exterior pockets with bungee-inspired drawstrings to keep your belongings safeIt can easily be folded and stowed away when not in use.

fields.product_name: Ermenegildo Zegna - Pelle Tessuta and Smooth Leather Belt Bag - Men - Black
fields.description: Compact and functional, Ermenegildo Zegna's belt bag is designed to keep your essentials close at handIt's made from a combination of the label's signature Pelle Tessuta and smooth leather, and features a selection of pockets for organisationWear it with: Brunello Cucinelli T-shirt, The Row Sweatpants, Ermenegildo Zegna Sweater, Brunello Cucinelli Sneakers.

fields.product_name: Ermenegildo Zegna - Full-Grain Leather Backpack - Men - Black
fields.description: This Ermenegildo Zegna accessory harnesses the practical qualities of a backpack and belt bagIt's made from full-grain leather with a handy front zipped pocket and webbing strap that can be adjusted to accommodate bulkier layersWear it over your shoulder or cross-body.

fields.product_name: Ermenegildo Zegna - Pelle Tessuta and Leather Backpack - Men - Black
fields.description: Ermenegildo Zegna's backpack is crafted from a mix of smooth and Pelle Tessuta leather, an innovative woven construction created by the brandIt's large enough to carry all your essentials plus a laptop or tablet, and has an extra pocket on the front so you can easily reach for smaller items like a phone or charger.

fields.product_name: Ermenegildo Zegna - Blazer Full-Grain Leather Backpack - Men - Black
fields.description: Ermenegildo Zegna 's sophisticated backpack is equipped with plenty of pockets to keep your kit organised while you're travelling or just commuting to the officeIt's crafted from full-grain leather and detailed with a ticket pocket, 'Asola' cuts and hand-painted trims, all signatures of the tailoring-inspired 'Blazer' collectionWear it with: Ermenegildo Zegna Sneakers, Ermenegildo Zegna Trousers, Canali Sweater, Ermenegildo Zegna Cardholder.

fields.product_name: Ermenegildo Zegna - Cross-Grain Leather Backpack - Men - Black
fields.description: Ermenegildo Zegna's compact cross-grain leather backpack is ideal for the daily commute and weekend errandsSling the single strap over a shoulder, organising your phone, cardholder and even a small tablet inside.

fields.product_name: Filson - Dryden Leather-Trimmed Camouflage-Print CORDURA Backpack - Men - Green
fields.description: Filson's limited-edition camouflage-print 'Dryden' backpack is made from abrasion-resistant CORDURAÂ®, so you can be confident that it will withstand everything from the daily commute to a long-haul tripIt's peppered with practical details like a reinforced base, padded laptop sleeve and plenty of compartments.

fields.product_name: Filson - Dryden Leather-Trimmed Camouflage-Print CORDURA Backpack - Men - Blue
fields.description: Filson's 'Dryden' backpack is made from abrasion-resistant CORDURAÂ®, so you can be confident that it will withstand everything from the daily commute to a long-haul tripIt's peppered with practical details like a reinforced base, padded laptop sleeve and plenty of compartments.

fields.product_name: Filson - Ranger Twill Backpack - Men - Brown
fields.description: Inspired by rugged forestry backpacks, Filson's one is a practical choice for weekends away, whether you're roaming the countryside or an urban jungleSpacious enough to hold a change of clothes and a wash bag, it's made from durable twill and equipped with an internal laptop sleeveThe toggle-fastening drawstring will keep your belongings secure.

fields.product_name: Filson - Ranger Twill Backpack - Men - Green
fields.description: Inspired by rugged forestry backpacks, Filson's one is a practical choice for weekends away, whether you're roaming the countryside or an urban jungleSpacious enough to hold a change of clothes and a wash bag, it's made from durable twill and equipped with an internal laptop sleeveThe toggle-fastening drawstring will keep your belongings secure.

fields.product_name: Fendi - Convertible Leather and Suede-Trimmed Shell and Canvas Backpack - Men - Green
fields.description: When carried as a backpack, this accessory is unmistakably Fendi, printed all over with the label's iconic 'Zucca' monogramThough if you're going for a more low-key look, the lightweight canvas top can be rolled down and zipped away into the army-green shell base, transforming it into a more minimal belt bagConvert this practical piece depending on your schedule.

fields.product_name: Fendi - Peekaboo Logo-Embossed Leather Backpack - Men - Black
fields.description: Fendi's 'Peekaboo' backpack is named as such for the flash of yellow lining its front compartmentIt's panelled with smooth and monogrammed leather, with padded mesh at the back for comfort and cargo protection.

fields.product_name: Gallery Dept. - Distressed Logo-Print Tie-Dyed Canvas Backpack - Men - Multi
fields.description: Gallery Deptis headed by contemporary artist Mr JosuÃ© Thomas, and this canvas backpack looks like something that might have seen its fair share of days in his studioIt's distressed through the body and oxidised buckles, tie-dyed in a mottle of vibrant colours and worn at the seams.

fields.product_name: Gucci - Monogrammed Coated-Canvas and Leather Backpack - Men - Black
fields.description: By Gucci's maximalist standards, this backpack is fairly low-key on iconography, but that's not saying much given the 'Supreme GG' monogram is practically woven into its constructionIt's made from durable coated-canvas and supple black leather with horsebit-inspired red and navy webbing strapsMake use of the two additional pockets to keep valuables in easy reach and stow a tablet in the internal padded sleeve.

fields.product_name: Gucci - Ophidia Leather and Webbing-Trimmed Monogrammed Coated-Canvas Backpack - Men - Brown
fields.description: Gucci's hiking-inspired 'Ophidia' backpack has been crafted in Italy from durable monogrammed coated-canvas that the brand calls 'Supreme'Featuring signature house codes like striped webbing and 'GG' hardware, it's trimmed with leather and has plenty of pockets for organisation, including a padded laptop sleeve.

fields.product_name: Gucci - Logo-AppliquÃ©d Leather-Trimmed Printed Monogrammed Coated-Canvas Backpack - Men - Brown
fields.description: When it comes to prints, Mr Alessandro Michele's creativity knows no boundsThis backpack features Gucci's latest 'Fake/Not' graphic stamped on monogrammed coated-canvas and accompanied by webbing-inspired stripesThis spacious accessory is reinforced with leather and has plenty of room for your daily essentials.

fields.product_name: Gucci - Logo-Embossed Leather Backpack - Men - Black
fields.description: Gucci's versatile backpack is sleek enough to carry in lieu of a briefcase for the office, but will also make such a cool addition to streetwear looksIt's been crafted in Italy from glossy black leather and embossed with the brand's iconic 'GG' monogramLined in canvas, it has a padded sleeve to protect your laptop and front pockets for smaller essentials.

fields.product_name: Gucci - Mopheus Embossed Leather Bacpack - Men - Black
fields.description: Gucci consistently re-invents its signature logos â this 'Morpheus' backpack is quilted to resemble the archival 'Rhombus' monogramCrafted in Italy from supple black leather, it has a padded mesh back for comfort and a spacious front pocket for your wallet and sunglasses.

fields.product_name: Gucci - Off the Grid Leather-Trimmed Monogrammed ECONYL Canvas Backpack - Men - Black
fields.description: Part of the Gucciâs sustainability focused collection, this backpack is made from ECONYLÂ® produced from recycled materials and well-equipped should you want to go 'Off the Grid' for a few daysIt's fitted with multiple zipped pockets and has ample amount of storage for all your essentialsThe padded shoulders and adjustable straps provide maximum comfort during extended wear.

fields.product_name: Gucci - Morpheus Convertible Textured-Leather Bag - Men - Black
fields.description: Defined by a rectangular, '70s-inspired shape, Gucci's 'Morpheus' bag is a backpack, tote and duffle hybridIt's been crafted in Italy from textured-leather that's specially treated to give it a slightly worn, vintage appearanceConvert it by detaching the adjustable shoulder strapsShown here with Gucci shirt, Gucci trousers, Loewe coat, Gucci shoes.

fields.product_name: Herschel Supply Co - Camouflage-Print CORDURA Backpack - Men - Black
fields.description: Herschel Supply Co creates cool, technically designed accessories that can stand up to travelPrinted with a camouflage pattern, this backpack is made from CORDURAÂ®, one of the label's most resilient fabricsIt's reasonably sized, large enough to hold the essentials without feeling bulky, and has a padded sleeve inside for a laptop or tablet.

fields.product_name: Herschel Supply Co - Barrow Large 210D Nailhead Dobby-Nylon Backpack - Men - Black
fields.description: Herschel Supply Co's 'Barlow' backpack is a solid choice whether you're hiking serious trails or just commuting through the cityMade from water-resistant 210D Nailhead dobby-nylon, it has comfortable padded straps, plenty of pockets and a sleeve inside to accommodate a 15 laptopIt's compatible with a hydration pack and comes with a ripstop rain cover that stows in the bottom zipped compartment.

fields.product_name: Herschel Supply Co - Surplus Purcell Herringbone Canvas Backpack - Men - Green
fields.description: Herschel Supply Co's military-inspired 'Surplus' collection is designed to stand up to more than just your daily commuteThis 'Purcell' backpack is made from hard-wearing herringbone canvas that's treated with a water-resistant finishThe buckled sternum belt and adjustable, contoured straps evenly distribute the weight for a comfortable carry.

fields.product_name: Herschel Supply Co - Trail Daypack Packable Ultralight Nylon-Ripstop Backpack - Men - Green
fields.description: Herschel Supply Co's 'Daypack' from the 'Trail' collection stows into its own zipped pocket, making it easy for travellingMade from water-resistant Ultralight nylon-ripstop, it has plenty of storage pockets, a hydration-compatible port and adjustable straps to evenly distribute the weight.

fields.product_name: Herschel Supply Co - Barlow Large Nailhead Dobby-Nylon Backpack - Men - Red
fields.description: Herschel Supply Co's 'Barlow' backpack is just as practical on the trails as the morning commuteIt's made from durable Nailhead dobby-nylon and has lots of pockets to hold your water bottle, laptop and keysIt's also coated with a water-resistant treatment and comes with a ripstop rain cover that you can stow in the separate zipped compartment.

fields.product_name: Herschel Supply Co - HS6 Ripstop Backpack - Men - Blue
fields.description: Herschel Supply Co's minimalist 'Studio' collection is defined by clean lines and technical fabricsDesigned with a pair of webbing top handles and comfortable straps, this 'HS6' backpack is made from lightweight ripstop that'll hold up well to the daily grindThe internal mesh laptop sleeve and stretchy side pockets make it a great option for commutingWear it with: Mr PT-shirt, nanamica Jacket, Tempus Now Trousers, Converse Sneakers.

fields.product_name: Hugo Boss - Crosstown Full-Grain Leather Backpack - Men - Gray
fields.description: Hugo Boss' 'Crosstown' backpack has a convertible shoulder strap to alternate how you wear it cross-bodyIt's made from durable full-grain leather and has a front zipped pocket to keep necessary valuables within easy reach.

fields.product_name: Indispensable - Trill Iridescent Shell and Canvas Backpack - Men - Black
fields.description: Indispensable's 'Trill' backpack is made from shell sourced from Japan, which illuminates in bright iridescence under flashlightIt's fitted with a multitude of pockets, and a padded sleeve for your laptop.

fields.product_name: Indispensable - Auror Iridescent Shell and Canvas Backpack - Men - Black
fields.description: Indispensable's backpack will transform a simple black T-shirt and jeans, and you'll find it to be practical, tooDesigned to resemble a vest, it's made from durable canvas and trimmed with nylon panels that reflect iridescent colours in the lightUse the multiple zipped pockets to stow your essentials.

fields.product_name: Loewe - Leather Backpack - Men - Brown
fields.description: Loewe has specialised in leather goods since 1846, today, the brand has a team of 24 artisans at its workshop in the heart of Madrid who are trained with the same age-old techniques that were used centuries agoCrafted from thick, smooth hide, this backpack has a bucket shape with a secure drawstring top and is embossed with the house's 'Anagram' emblem at the sideIt's reinforced at the base for durability and has an internal slip pocket to secure your smartphoneWear it with: Loewe Shirt, Loewe Jeans, Loewe Sneakers, Gucci Socks.

fields.product_name: Loewe - Full-Grain Leather Backpack - Men - Black
fields.description: Loewe's backpack is a smart alternative to a briefcaseDesigned with a squared silhouette to accommodate your laptop and files, it's been handcrafted at the label's Spanish workshop from durable full-grain leather and has practical pockets to organise business cards and chargersWear it with: Maison Margiela Coat, Bottega Veneta Sweater, Balenciaga Trousers, Prada Boots.

fields.product_name: MONTROI - Full-Grain Leather Backpack - Men - Black
fields.description: MONTROI's timeless backpack is minimal, practical and impeccably craftedMade in Spain from full-grain leather with robust suede linings, it has a spacious main compartment which opens completely" and a padded laptop sleeveIt secures with military-grade parachute locks for extra securityWear it with: TOM FORD Shirt, Loro Piana Jacket, Mr PTrousers, John Lobb Boots.

fields.product_name: Maison Margiela - Logo-Embroidered Canvas Backpack - Men - Black
fields.description: Maison Margiela enjoys the sharpness of black with white, so this backpack bears a smart logo-embroidered pinstripe in that colourwayIt's constructed from durable canvas and has ample room to carry larger gadgets like a laptop or cameraReserve the front zipped pocket for your phone.

fields.product_name: Master-Piece - Leather-Trimmed MASTERTEX-08 Backpack - Men - Black
fields.description: Master-Piece's practical designs are great for travel, since they're made from durable materials that can withstand plenty of wear and tearCrafted in Japan from MASTERTEX-08â¢ that's resistant to water and abrasions, this double-compartment backpack is reinforced with Scotchgardâ¢-treated leather trims and has multiple pockets for organising your tech gadgets.

fields.product_name: Master-Piece - Rebirth Project Leather-Trimmed Nylon and Canvas Backpack - Men - Black
fields.description: Made in collaboration with Rebirth Project, Master-Piece's backpack is constructed from durable nylon produced from unused airbags, each one will have its own unique crinkled finish and characterIt's trimmed with leather and reinforced with sturdy canvas made from recycled polyesterThere are plenty of zipped pockets to keep your items neatly organised and a padded compartment at the back to hold a laptop.

fields.product_name: Master-Piece - Leather-Trimmed Nylon-Twill Backpack - Men - Blue
fields.description: Japanese brand Master-Piece designs practical bags that are both fashionable and functionalBuilt to stand up to everyday use, this leather-trimmed backpack is made from durable nylon-twill and has an expandable roll-top design that's roomy enough for a laptop and other essentialsThe exterior has multiple pockets for extra storage, too.

fields.product_name: Master-Piece - Rebirth Project Leather-Trimmed Crinkled-Shell and Canvas Sling Backpack - Men - Black
fields.description: Master-Piece teamed up with Rebirth Project to create its 'Airback' collection that turns recycled materials like unused airbags into pieces like this crinkled-shell and canvas backpackThe result is a sleek and durable style with variations in colour that makes each one unique.

fields.product_name: Moncler - Argens Webbing-Trimmed Ripstop Backpack - Men - Black
fields.description: Moncler's sizeable backpack is a comfortable option for carrying around a bit of kit and also offers something in terms of style differentiationIt's made from durable ripstop, reinforced with webbing for extra structure and slings cross-body by a single strap rather than the traditional double shoulder designMultiple zip and buckle fastenings will keep your belongings secure.

fields.product_name: Moncler - Argens Webbing and Suede-Trimmed Ripstop Backpack - Men - Black
fields.description: Moncler's 'Argens' backpack is inspired by the kind of hiking gear you'd need for pristine mountainsCreated by an adventurous spirit, it's made from durable black ripstop and has a tonal suede baseMultiple pockets, adjustable straps, side release buckles plus waterproof and coated zippers are all useful, considered touchesWear it with: Moncler Jacket, SAINT LAURENT Jeans, Moncler Boots, Moncler Sunglasses.

fields.product_name: Mismo - Leather-Trimmed Canvas Backpack - Men - Blue
fields.description: This backpack is one of Mismo's best-sellers, behind the streamlined shape is a host of functional aspectsIt's made from waterproof canvas with a roll-top opening which you can use to adjust the size according to your needs, as well as a foamed compartment to protect your laptopElegant vegetable-tanned leather trims reinforce the seamsWear it with: Drake's Shirt, Save Khaki United Trousers, Veja Sneakers, Mr PSocks.

fields.product_name: Moncler - Gimont Logo-Print Grosgrain-Trimmed Canvas Backpack - Men - Black
fields.description: Moncler's 'Gimont' backpack is fitted with three large compartments that're ideal for everyday commutes or weekend tripsMade from lightweight yet durable canvas, it's fitted with D-ring tabs, so you can attach a small water bottle or coin pouchThe buckled straps create a secure fit.

fields.product_name: Mulberry - Leather-Trimmed ECONYL Nylon-Twill Backpack - Men - Black
fields.description: Part of Mulberry's 'Heritage' collection, this backpack is modelled after one of the label's earliest piecesIt's updated in durable ECONYLÂ® nylon-twill and trimmed with tonal, glossy leatherThe handy side pockets are perfect for keeping your smaller items organised, while the belt and buckle straps are signature touches.

fields.product_name: Mulberry - Urban Pebble-Grain Leather Backpack - Men - Black
fields.description: Mulberryâs âUrbanâ backpack is impeccably crafted from pebble-grain leather in a sleek, minimal silhouetteIt has top and side handles for a variety of carrying options and is large enough to fit all your essentials, including a laptopKeep smaller items organised in the front zipped pocketWear it with: Monitaly Trousers, J.Crew Sweater, Red Wing Shoes Boots.

fields.product_name: Moncler Genius - 6 Moncler 1017 ALYX 9SM Shell Backpack - Men - Black
fields.description: Moncler Genius teamed up with 1017 ALYX 9SM with a mutual goal to design high-quality clothing and accessories that are functional and long-lastingMade from durable shell, this backpack has a spacious interior and an abundance of small pocketsIt closes with the streetwear brand's signature buckles and a drawstring top to keep the contents secure.

fields.product_name: Montblanc - Full-Grain Leather Backpack - Men - Black
fields.description: Neat, simple, and well-crafted, Montblanc's backpack's a solid choice for commutes and daily travelsIt's been made in Italy from black full-grain leather, which will break-in nicely with wear, and has adjustable padded strapsWear it with: Canali Sweater, Loro Piana Jacket, TOM FORD Jeans, Brunello Cucinelli Sneakers.

fields.product_name: nonnative - Dweller Logo-Embroidered SPIDELON Ripstop Backpack - Men - Black
fields.description: This 'Dweller' backpack has been made in Japan from nonnative's durable SPIDELONÂ® ripstop, so it can withstand everything from tumbles in overhead cabins to commutes on inclement daysFitted with an internal laptop sleeve to keep tech secure, it's subtly embroidered with a signature slogan on the front pocket and has adjustable padded straps for a personalised fitWear it with: Neighborhood T-shirt, nanamica Trousers, Vans Sneakers, nonnative Hat.

fields.product_name: Norse Projects - Packable Ripstop Backpack - Men - Black
fields.description: Practical, functional designs like this backpack are Norse Projects' signatureIt's made from water-resistant ripstop that's lightweight, durable and reinforced in areas that carry the most weightBest of all, it packs away inside the front pocket for easy storage when it's not in useWear it with: Norse Projects Jacket, Officine Generale Trousers, Norse Projects T-shirt, New Balance Sneakers.

fields.product_name: Oliver Spencer - Leather-Trimmed Nylon Backpack - Men - Green
fields.description: Oliver Spencer's backpack has a slim profile and practical top handles, so you can easily carry it as a tote bagIt's made from durable, water-repellent nylon and leather and has plenty of organisational pockets inside, including a padded sleeve for a laptopWear it with: Oliver Spencer Shirt, Mr PT-shirt, Oliver Spencer Trousers, Mr PSneakers.

fields.product_name: Paul Smith - Textured-Leather Sling Backpack - Men - Black
fields.description: Paul Smith's sling backpack is ideal for commuters, it's comfortable to carry, whether biking or walking, and easy to access your belongings on the goDesigned with a zipped pocket for cards, it's crafted from scratch-resistant textured-leather and has a sleeve inside to keep things organised.

fields.product_name: Paul Smith - Striped Webbing-Trimmed Full-Grain Leather Backpack - Men - Black
fields.description: An essential for commuters, this Paul Smith backpack is crafted from supple full-grain leather and designed with multiple interior compartments for organization, including a padded slip pocket to keep your laptop protectedItâs accented with adjustable webbing shoulder straps in the brandâs signature multicolored stripesWear it with: Acne Studios Trousers, Mr PSweater, Common Projects Sneakers, Acne Studios Scarf.

fields.product_name: Porter-Yoshida & Co - Star-Print Nylon Backpack - Men - Black
fields.description: Porter-Yoshida & Co's backpack is printed with glossed stars, a nod to the American flagIt's made from a high-density nylon that's lightweight but durable, making it optimal for commutes.

fields.product_name: Porter-Yoshida & Co - Camouflage-Print CorduraÂ® Nylon and Cotton-Ripstop Backpack - Men - Blue
fields.description: Constructed from durable CorduraÂ® nylon and cotton-ripstop, Porter-Yoshida & Co's backpack is part of the brand's military-inspired 'Platoon' seriesIt's printed with a 'Woodland' camouflage pattern and sized to carry all of your essentials through the city or rugged terrainIt can be folded into its own interior pocket for compact storage.

fields.product_name: Porter-Yoshida & Co - 2Way Canvas Backpack - Men - Blue
fields.description: Porter-Yoshida & Co's '2Way' bag has been made in Japan from high-density canvas that's coloured in a two bath dying process to achieve a rich hueIt has a variety of pockets to keep your belongings organised and adjustable handles, so it can be carried as a backpack or toteWear it with: Aspesi Shirt, AMI Polo shirt, Monitaly Trousers, AMI Socks.

fields.product_name: Porter-Yoshida & Co - Tanker Padded Shell Backpack - Men - Black
fields.description: Porter-Yoshida & Co's 'Tanker' range is modelled on the US Air Force's ageless 'MA-1' jacket and was released to offer a travel series with a military look"This backpack has been made in Japan from tough black nylon and lined in bright-orange shellIt has a useful zipped pouch pocket at the front for organising small items.

fields.product_name: Purdey - Leather-Panelled Canvas Backpack and Wool Blanket - Men - Brown
fields.description: Purdey 's limited edition backpack has been handmade in France from eco-friendly 'nettle' cotton-canvas developed in collaboration with a family-owned mill in Burnley, Lancashire and inspired by the fabrics used by the Swiss Army during World War IIPerfect for outdoor adventures, this 18-litre piece is reinforced by panels of durable brown leather from Britain's last remaining oak-bark tannery and has tough webbing shoulder straps that can be easily adjustedIt comes with a sizeable checked blanket that fastens securely to the front of this carryall, meaning it won't use up any internal spaceShown here with A.P.Cjeans, Brunello Cucinelli cardigan, TOM FORD T-shirt, Ermenegildo Zegna boots.
fields.material: Cow Leather and Cotton/Nettle Canvas backpack with blanket carrying straps (30 % leather - Bos Taurus- and 69 % Canvas (55% Nettle - Urtica Dioica - and 45% cotton / 1% Solid Brass fitings) / blanket: 100% lambswool

fields.product_name: RRL - Riley Leather Backpack - Men - Brown
fields.description: RRL's supple leather 'Riley' backpack will only get better with ageIt's been made in Italy, tumbled and tarnished for a naturally worn finish, and has a roomy suede-lined interior and secure buckled drawstring topAdjust the straps to personalise the drop, then stash your keys and cardholder in the front pockets to keep them in easy reach.

fields.product_name: SAINT LAURENT - City Croc-Effect Leather Backpack - Men - Black
fields.description: SAINT LAURENT's 'City' bag is a truly elevated take on a trusty backpackIt's made from croc-effect leather with a breathable fabric back section and is equipped with a handy headphone port at the topThe front pocket allows you to keep a wallet or your keys close by, while the capacious interior will comfortably fit a spare change of shoes or a laptopWear it with: SAINT LAURENT Sweater, SAINT LAURENT Jeans, SAINT LAURENT Sneakers, SAINT LAURENT Sunglasses.

fields.product_name: SAINT LAURENT - Full-Grain Leather Backpack - Men - Black
fields.description: SAINT LAURENT shows how grown-ups do backpacksThis one has been made in Italy from black full-grain leather and has a drawstring-adjustable top so you can fit more or less in main compartment, depending on the day's requirementsIt's slung from adjustable padded straps.

fields.product_name: SAINT LAURENT - City Leather-Trimmed Canvas Backpack - Men - Black
fields.description: Thanks to its sleek shape, SAINT LAURENT's 'City' backpack is a smart and practical option for workIt's been made in Italy from durable black canvas, reinforced with smooth leather and stamped with a logo under the zipped pocket in silver letteringIf you're carrying heavier loads, the padded straps will help to protect your shouldersWear it with: SAINT LAURENT Shirt, SAINT LAURENT Jeans, SAINT LAURENT Sneakers, SAINT LAURENT Sunglasses.

fields.product_name: SAINT LAURENT - City Leather Backpack - Men - Black
fields.description: SAINT LAURENT's 'City' bag is a truly elevated take on a trusty backpackIt's made from leather with a breathable fabric back section and is equipped with a handy headphone port at the topThe front pocket allows you to keep a wallet or your keys close by, while the capacious interior will comfortably fit a spare change of shoes or a laptopWear it with: SAINT LAURENT Sweater, SAINT LAURENT Jeans, SAINT LAURENT Sneakers, SAINT LAURENT Sunglasses.

fields.product_name: SAINT LAURENT - Leather-Trimmed Canvas Backpack - Men - Black
fields.description: SAINT LAURENT's backpack is a smart option for work and playMade from durable canvas reinforced with leather trims, it has a well-sized interior and a loop at the top handle to secure your headphonesThe padded straps will prevent shoulder strain if you're carrying heavier loadsWear it with: SAINT LAURENT Hoodie, SAINT LAURENT Jeans, SAINT LAURENT Sneakers, SAINT LAURENT Cardholder.

fields.product_name: Sealand Gear - Rowlie Rubber, Ripstop and Spinnaker Backpack - Men - Black
fields.description: EXCLUSIVE AT MR PORTERWith headquarters based in Cape Town's southern peninsula overlooking mountains and sea, Sealand Gear is inspired every day to create with minimal imprintThis sizeable 'Rowlie' backpack is handmade from a highly durable and shower-proof mix of upcycled rubber, risptop and spinnaker.

fields.product_name: Sealand Gear - Tombie Rubber, Ripstop and Spinnaker Backpack - Men - Black
fields.description: EXCLUSIVE AT MR PORTERUpcycled materials and handcraftsmanship are two cornerstones of Sealand GearThis 'Tombie' backpack is made from a highly resilient mix of rubber, ripstop and spinnaker fitted with multiple pockets inside and out.

fields.product_name: Serapian - Woven and Smooth Leather Backpack - Men - Green
fields.description: Serapian's backpack is a prime example of the brand's expert craftsmanship and emphasis on practicalityIt's been handwoven in Italy from army-green and black leather using an archival Mosaico technique and designed with a sling-like strap that can be adjusted to wear cross-body, around the waist or over your shoulder.

fields.product_name: Serapian - Leather-Trimmed Cotton-Canvas Backpack - Men - Black
fields.description: Serapian's backpack is handcrafted from the historic label's 'Stepan' coated-canvas, it was first developed in 1972 and is regarded for its impressive resilienceIt's trimmed with leather and fitted with plenty of pockets inside and out, including a laptop sleeve.

fields.product_name: Serapian - Compact Mosaico Woven Leather Backpack - Men - Green
fields.description: Serapian's 'Compact' backpack has been handcrafted using the brand's signature 'Mosaico' weave, slim strips of leather are braided to create an artful tessellation that makes the surface more resilient and flexibleIt's fitted with a trolley strap and laptop sleeve, plus slots for your cards and pen.

fields.product_name: Smythson - Panama Cross-Grain Leather Backpack - Men - Blue
fields.description: Smythson understands the practical and functional elements needed to travel and commute with easeThis backpack is made from its signature cross-grain leather, the texture of which helps disguise wear and tearIt's large enough to fit all your essentials and has a padded compartment at the back to hold a laptop.

fields.product_name: TOM FORD - Suede and Leather Backpack - Men - Green
fields.description: TOM FORD's signature 'Buckley' backpack has been impeccably crafted in Italy from 'Derby Green' suede and leather that will only improve with ageThe external zipped pocket is ideal for keeping essentials within easy reach, while the twill-lined interior features a padded sleeve to safely stow your tabletAdjust the shoulder straps to find a comfortable fitWear it with: TOM FORD Jeans, Dries Van Noten Sweater, TOM FORD Sneakers, TOM FORD Bracelet.

fields.product_name: TOM FORD - Full-Grain Leather Backpack - Men - Black
fields.description: TOM FORD's practical and refined 'Buckley' backpack is ideal for weekends away and daily commutes to the officeIt's been made in Italy from durable full-grain leather that's meant to withstand wear and tear, and has a snap-fastening sleeve inside for a tablet or laptopKeep sunglasses and a cardholder in the front zipped pocketShown here with TOM FORD shirt, TOM FORD jeans, TOM FORD boots.

fields.product_name: Undercover - Screwbear Printed Canvas Backpack - Men - Neutrals
fields.description: Undercover's Mr Jun Takahashi often turns things on their head â the 'Screwbear' print on this backpack might look cute at first, but you'll see it's a little more macabre once you get a bit closerMade from durable canvas, this style has multiple zipped compartments on the exterior and ample space insideAdjust the padded straps for comfortWear it with: Our Legacy T-Shirt, Acne Studios Jeans, Acne Studios Sneakers, A.P.CBracelet.

fields.product_name: Valentino - Valentino Garavani Logo-Print Canvas Backpack - Men - Black
fields.description: Valentino Garavani's backpack is printed all-over with the brand's 'VLTN' logo in contrasting whiteIdeal for stowing your daily essentials, this sizeable version is made from durable canvas that will withstand wear and tear and has internal slip and zipped pockets to help keep your things organisedThe shoulder straps are fully adjustable for comfort.

fields.product_name: Undercover - Screwbear Printed Canvas Backpack - Men - Black
fields.description: Undercover's Mr Jun Takahashi often turns things on their head â the 'Screwbear' print on this backpack might look cute at first, but you'll see it's a little more macabre once you get a bit closerMade from durable canvas, this style has multiple zipped compartments on the exterior and ample space insideAdjust the padded straps for comfortWear it with: Undercover T-Shirt, Vans Trousers, Converse Sneakers, A.P.CBracelet.

fields.product_name: AMIRI - Double-Breasted Metallic Velvet-Jacquard Blazer - Men - Blue
fields.description: Rock 'n' roll, and more specifically, the wardrobe of Mr Keith Richards circa the 1970s is the inspiration for AMIRI's AW20 collectionThis suit jacket is tailored from petrol velvet that has a subtle gleam across the diamond jacquardIt's fully lined for a structured drape and finished with double vents for ease of movementWear it with: AMIRI Trousers, AMIRI Sweater, Dries Van Noten Boots, Bottega Veneta Bracelet.

fields.product_name: AMIRI - Double-Breasted Silk Twill-Trimmed Wool-Blend BouclÃ© Blazer - Men - White
fields.description: A photograph of Mr Keith Richards waiting for his jet during a 1979 tour is the inspiration behind AMIRI's AW20 collection, the rock legend was wearing a white blazer just like this one in the imageIt's tailored from silver-threaded wool-blend bouclÃ© that gleams nicely under light, and has silk-twill trimsWear it with: AMIRI Jeans, AMIRI Rollneck, Nike Sneakers, Ader Error Bracelet.

fields.product_name: AMIRI - Embellished Double-Breasted Woven Blazer - Men - Black
fields.description: AMIRI incorporates its signature rock 'n' roll inspiration in a way that feels cool and refined every seasonIn a classic double-breasted silhouette, this peak-lapel blazer is embellished with ribbon, crystals and silver thread to resemble a guitar strapWear it with tailoring or the label's trademark skinny jeansWear it with: AMIRI Trousers, Velva Sheen Top, SAINT LAURENT Boots.

fields.product_name: Balmain - Black Slim-Fit Woven Blazer - Men - Black
fields.description: Mr Olivier Rousteing spends so much time fitting Balmain's jackets during production, the key to the house's great silhouettes is getting the sleeves perfectly proportionate to the bodyOne of the most popular styles, this double-breasted blazer is designed with sharp peak lapels and padded shoulders for structureIt has signature crest-embossed buttons and a butterfly lining for easy movement.

fields.product_name: Balenciaga - Bottle-Green Twill Blazer - Men - Green
fields.description: Balenciaga's twill blazer is intentionally sparse with the details to let the exceptional tailoring speak for itselfConstructed with 70 layers of interlining to maintain its distinct silhouette, it has tubular, 3D-moulded sleeves, an asymmetric button fastening and exaggerated shoulders that create a broadening effectThe slightly loose fit means you can comfortably layer it over a rollneck.

fields.product_name: Balenciaga - Oversized Double-Breasted Pleated Wool-Blend Blazer - Men - Blue
fields.description: Balenciaga's blazer has a pleated finish that gives it a cool texture, the folds are formed by doubling the fabric back on itselfMade from a mid-weight wool-blend, this piece has an oversized double-breasted profile detailed with peak lapels and lightly padded shoulders.

fields.product_name: Balenciaga - Double-Breasted Stretch-Virgin Wool Twill Blazer - Men - Black
fields.description: Balenciaga's double-breasted blazer is tailored with wide peak lapels and a felted undercollarIt's been crafted in Italy from stretch-virgin wool twill and has dropped shoulders that are padded for structureWear it with: Rick Owens Sweater, Balenciaga Trousers, Balenciaga Shoes, SAINT LAURENT Bracelet.

fields.product_name: Balenciaga - Navy Oversized Prince of Wales Checked Wool Blazer - Men - Blue
fields.description: Balenciaga's designs are always so distinctive, the house has been known for its unique take on shape and structure since the early daysTailored from wool patterned with a traditional Prince of Wales check, this oversized blazer has an asymmetric fastening, which transforms the lapels into a folded stand collar.

fields.product_name: Paul Smith - Slim-Fit Wool-Hopsack Blazer - Men - Blue
fields.description: Paul Smith's blazer is tailored from breathable wool-hopsack thatâs ideal for wearing year-roundKept neat with sharp notch lapels and functioning buttoned cuffs, it's lined for easy layering and has a double vent for movementWear it with: Paul Smith Shirt, TOM FORD Trousers, Paul Smith Shoes, Kingsman Tie.

fields.product_name: Paul Smith - Slim-Fit Unstructured Striped Embroidered Wool-Hopsack Blazer - Men - Blue
fields.description: Unmistakably a Paul Smith design, this blazer is embroidered with the brand's signature colourful stripes on one lapelIt's tailored for a slim fit from wool-hopsack thatâs known for its breathable properties, making it ideal for year-round wearLayer it over a rollneck sweater for smart-casual occasionsWear it with: Caruso Sweater, Caruso Trousers, Paul Smith Shoes, Paul Smith Bracelet.

fields.product_name: Paul Smith - Puppytooth Wool Blazer - Men - Blue
fields.description: Smart-casual occasions call for a blazer like Paul Smith'sBoth neat-looking and comfortable, it's been tailored in Italy from lightweight wool in a puppytooth pattern with plenty of variation in colourSoft shoulders and just a partial lining through the sleeves further the appeal.

fields.product_name: Polo Ralph Lauren - Navy Slim-Fit Unstructured Linen-Blend Blazer - Men - Blue
fields.description: Polo Ralph Lauren's linen-blend blazer looks just as good with jeans as it does with smart trousersIt's cut for a slim fit and partially lined, giving it an unstructured shape that comfortably molds to your frameIn a subtle nod to the brand's preppy roots, it's finished with rows of gold buttons engraved with the namesake sport's mallets and hats.

fields.product_name: Polo Ralph Lauren - Slim-Fit Slub Linen and Cotton-Blend Blazer - Men - Blue
fields.description: Polo Ralph Lauren's blazer is tailored in the label's slim, preppy shape and is ideal for teaming with casual styles like a Breton striped tee and chinosIt's cut from a blend of linen and cotton with a slubbed finish and has double back vents for comfortWear it with: Mr PT-shirt, Club Monaco Trousers, J.MWeston Loafers.
fields.material: shell: 55% linen / 45% cotton lining: 100% polyester. sleeve lining: 52% viscose 48% acetate.

fields.product_name: Polo Ralph Lauren - Morgan Unstructured Cotton-Chambray Blazer - Men - Blue
fields.description: Polo Ralph Lauren's 'Morgan' blazer is cooler and more laid-back than traditional suiting, so it's great for casual events where you still need to look smartIt's tailored for a slim fit from lightweight Japanese cotton-chambray, which makes it comfortable for warm weatherWear it with beige or white trousersWear it with: Mr PPolo shirt, Incotex Trousers, Sperry Shoes, L'Atelier du Vin Home.

fields.product_name: Purdey - Hawick Unstructured Wool and Cashmere-Blend Tweed Blazer - Men - Green
fields.description: All of Purdey's tweeds are made in Scotland and inspired by the brand's rich archives, which spans over two centuriesWoven from wool and cashmere-blend, this 'Hawick' blazer has a sleek Nehru collar and fastens with tonal-brown buttonsIt's cut for a regular fit, but the unstructured profile and partial lining keep it feeling light and relaxedWear it with: Purdey Shirt, Purdey Trousers, Purdey Boots, Bremont Watch.

fields.product_name: Richard James - Navy Spirit Slim-Fit Wool-Hopsack Blazer - Men - Blue
fields.description: Richard James ' 'Spirit' blazer is cut from wool-hopsack that's naturally breathable and resistant to creasing, which makes it suitable for travelling to meet clients or packing in a suitcaseTailored for a refined slim fit, it has padded shoulders and is left unlined, so it's really lightweightShown here with SALLE PRIVÃE trousers, Boglioli shirt, J.MWeston shoes, Gucci pocket square.

fields.product_name: Richard James - Checked Wool, Silk and Linen-Blend Blazer - Men - Blue
fields.description: Few sartorial options are as versatile as a navy checked blazer, so this one by Savile Row institution Richard James makes a worthy investmentIt's cut from a wool, silk and linen-blend with classic notch lapels and markers of high-quality tailoring like a felted undercollar and flexible double vent.

fields.product_name: Richard James - Checked Linen Blazer - Men - Multi
fields.description: Between the colourful checked pattern and the breathable fabric, Richard James' blazer is an easy choice for warm-weather eventsIt's neatly tailored from linen, has wide lapels and fastens with two horn buttonsIt'll look best with light coloured trousers and a simple shirtWear it with: Richard James Shirt, Richard James Trousers, J.MWeston Shoes.

fields.product_name: Richard James - Prince of Wales Checked MÃ©lange Silk Blazer - Men - Neutrals
fields.description: Richard James' designs are heavily inspired by traditional Savile Row, but the brand often includes unexpected elements, like this blazer that's made exclusively from ivory silkIt's tailored for a comfortable fit and features an understated Prince of Wales checked pattern and subtle mÃ©lange finishWear it with: TOM FORD Polo shirt, Richard James Trousers, Brunello Cucinelli Shoes.

fields.product_name: Rubinacci - Prince of Wales Checked Virgin Wool-Blend Blazer - Men - Brown
fields.description: The Rubinacci family has an encyclopaedic knowledge of tailoring and equally impressive experience in executing itA fine example of its handiwork is this jacket, originally designed in the '30s by the house's founder, it's cut from a Prince of Wales-checked virgin wool, silk and cashmere-blend that drapes so handsomelyIt's fully lined and softly structured, as you'd expect from suiting made in NaplesWear it with: Rubinacci Suit trousers, Caruso Shirt, Rubinacci Shoes, Rubinacci Tie.

fields.product_name: Rubinacci - Unstructured Woven Blazer - Men - Blue
fields.description: While Rubinacci is known for its unstructured suiting, the brand is committed to immaculate construction, favouring high armholes for comfort, soft shoulders and the signature boat-shaped pocket that follows the contours of the chestTailored in Italy from a blend of wool, cotton and canapa hemp with touches of cashmere and silk, this single-breasted jacket is cut in a relaxed silhouette and unlined for lightnessWear it with: Favourbrook Trousers, Lardini Shirt, George Cleverley Shoes, Bremont Sports watch.

fields.product_name: Rubinacci - Prince of Wales Checked Virgin Wool, Silk and Cashmere-Blend Blazer - Men - Blue
fields.description: Rubinacci has been perfecting its tailoring techniques across three generationsPatterned with classic Prince of Wales checks, this blazer has been made in Italy from a premium blend of virgin wool, silk and cashmere and is fully lined for smooth layeringGrandson of the founder, Mr Luca Rubinacci, suggests wearing it in the Neapolitan tradition by only fastening the bottom buttonWear it with: Rubinacci Trousers, Rubinacci Shoes, Rubinacci Tie, Le Gramme Bracelet.

fields.product_name: Rubinacci - Slim-Fit MÃ©lange Woven Blazer - Men - Green
fields.description: Wondering just how good Rubinacci's blazer feels? Here's a hint: the fabric's woven from a pure blend of cotton, wool, hemp, silk and cashmereIt's been expertly tailored for a slim fit at the historic Neopolitan workshopWear it with: Favourbrook Trousers, Canali Shirt, Rubinacci Bracelet, Giuseppe Zanotti Boots.

fields.product_name: SAINT LAURENT - Slim-Fit Piped Virgin Wool Blazer - Men - Black
fields.description: SAINT LAURENT's 'Le Smoking' indisputably has its place reserved in the sartorial hall of fame, and indeed, an edition is on display at the MetThis version has been tailored in Italy from silk-lined virgin wool, articulated with piping across the shoulders, pockets and peak lapelsWear it with: SAINT LAURENT Shirt, SAINT LAURENT Trousers, SAINT LAURENT Boots, SAINT LAURENT Glasses.

fields.product_name: SAINT LAURENT - Prince of Wales Checked Wool Blazer - Men - Gray
fields.description: SAINT LAURENT's blazer is tailored from substantial wool and patterned with refined Prince of Wales checks, so it'll lend itself well to formal and smart-casual settingsIt's topped with smart notch lapels and fully lined for smooth layeringWear it with: SAINT LAURENT T-shirt, SAINT LAURENT Jeans, SAINT LAURENT Boots, SAINT LAURENT Bracelet.

fields.product_name: SAINT LAURENT - Metallic Jacquard Blazer - Men - Black
fields.description: When it comes to statement-making tailoring, SAINT LAURENT is an authority, sharp, straight lines have been a signature since the label's conceptionWoven in Italy with threads of lamÃ© to create an abstract metallic check, this single-breasted blazer is cut for a boxy fit and lightly padded in the shouldersWear it with: Givenchy Trousers, SAINT LAURENT Boots, Alexander McQueen Belt, SAINT LAURENT BraceletSmall to sizeSee Size & Fit notes.

fields.product_name: SAINT LAURENT - Slim-Fit Wool and Cashmere-Blend Blazer - Men - Black
fields.description: SAINT LAURENT's Mr Anthony Vaccarello favours a straight shoulder on his blazers, placing them higher and fitting them with light padding, then cutting lean and narrow through the bodyThis version is tailored in the signature silhouette from a wool and cashmere-blendTeam yours with black trousers and a rollneck sweaterWear it with: SAINT LAURENT Sweater, Prada Trousers, SAINT LAURENT Shoes, SAINT LAURENT BagSmall to sizeSee Size & Fit notes.

fields.product_name: SAINT LAURENT - Slim-Fit Velvet Blazer - Men - Blue
fields.description: Thanks to SAINT LAURENT's rock 'n' roll streak, there's always a velvet blazer or two in its collectionsTailored in Italy, this style is cut for a slim fit and fully lined with silkThe notch lapels stay in place with a felted undercollarWear it with: SAINT LAURENT Jeans, SAINT LAURENT Shirt, SAINT LAURENT Boots, SAINT LAURENT Bracelet.

fields.product_name: Saman Amel - Beige Slim-Fit MÃ©lange Wool Blazer - Men - Neutrals
fields.description: EXCLUSIVE AT MR PORTERSaman Amel's palette for SS20 draws from the cool, unsaturated tones of beaches in Stockholm's outer archipelago, and the beige mÃ©lange of this blazer is fitting to the sandy terrainTailored for a particularly slim fit from smooth wool, it has a full yet soft shoulder line and low close with complementary mottled horn buttons.

fields.product_name: Saman Amel - Dark-Grey Slim-Fit MÃ©lange Cashmere Blazer - Men - Gray
fields.description: EXCLUSIVE AT MR PORTERStockholm tailor Saman Amel creates everything in the Neapolitan tradition fatto a mano , or totally by handThis jacket has been made in Italy from soft cashmere that drapes fluidly and is cut slimIt's fully canvassed so it will mould to your frame with wear.

fields.product_name: Saman Amel - Taupe Wool-Hopsack Blazer - Men - Brown
fields.description: Saman Amel borrows traditional Italian tailoring methods to create its suitingThis blazer is made from wool-hopsack and has sharp notch lapels and grained horn buttonsThe taupe hue acts just like a neutral and works with both dark and light coloursShown here with Saman Amel trousers, Saman Amel sweater, Common Projects sneakers.

fields.product_name: SALLE PRIVÃE - Sand Ross Slim-Fit Unstructured Cotton and Linen-Blend Twill Blazer - Men - Neutrals
fields.description: Salle PrivÃ©e 's 'Ross' blazer is just the style you'll want to have to hand for warm-weather eventsIt's tailored from lightweight cotton and linen-blend twill and has a slim, unstructured shapeTeam it with the matching Gehry trousers, or wear it to smarten up a tee and jeansShown here with SALLE PRIVÃE polo shirt, Brunello Cucinelli jeans, TOM FORD bootsThis item is small to sizeSee Size & Fit notes.
fields.material: shell: 71% cotton / 29% linen/body linning: 55% polyester / 45% vicose/ sleeve linning: 55% polyester / 45%viscosehorn - buffalo

fields.product_name: SALLE PRIVÃE - Black Lunt Slim-Fit Cashmere Blazer - Men - Black
fields.description: Salle PrivÃ©e founder Mr Patrick Munsters doesn't follow a typical business model, instead he does things his own way â making wardrobe classics that'll last forever, rather than seasonal piecesThis Italian-made 'Lunt' blazer is spun from cashmere that's incredibly soft, breathable and insulatingIt's tailored with tidy notch lapels and a sleek single-breasted close that'll streamline your profileShown here with Anderson & Sheppard trousers, Berluti shirt, TOM FORD shoes, TOM FORD tie.
fields.material: 100% Cashmire Body Lining 100%viscose Sleeve Lining 55% polyster45%viscose

fields.product_name: Sid Mashburn - Virgil No. 2 Slim-Fit Garment-Dyed Cotton and Wool-Blend Hopsack Blazer - Men - Neutrals
fields.description: Sid Mashburn chose the cotton and wool-blend hopsack for this 'Virgil' blazer because of its open leno weave that wears really nicely" over timeGarment-dyed beige, it's cut slim, half-lined in Bemberg and fully canvassed for a comfortable fit that feels customWear it with: Sid Mashburn Shirt, Brunello Cucinelli Loafers.

fields.product_name: Sid Mashburn - Checked Silk, Linen and Wool-Blend Blazer - Men - Green
fields.description: Sid Mashburn's tailoring follows the rule of thumb wherein a slim cut and natural shoulder is prioritised over heavy structureThis blazer is woven from a blend of silk, linen and wool in a pastel pink, yellow and navy check that feels at once thoroughly modern and classicWear it with: Sid Mashburn Trousers, Sid Mashburn Sweater, George Cleverley Shoes, Hugo Boss Socks.

fields.product_name: Sid Mashburn - Slim-Fit Checked Cotton-Hopsack Blazer - Men - Blue
fields.description: Sid Mashburn's unstructured blazer has an eye-catching checked pattern, but the understated navy and white colour palette makes it super versatileIt's tailored from Italian cotton-hopsack that's ideal for warm weather and designed with soft, natural shouldersWear it with: Loro Piana Shirt, Loro Piana Trousers, Brunello Cucinelli Loafers, Brunello Cucinelli Wallet.

fields.product_name: Sid Mashburn - Kincaid No. 1 Slim-Fit Striped Cotton-Seersucker Blazer - Men - Blue
fields.description: Sid Mashburn's striped cotton-seersucker blazer is the ideal way to wear tailoring throughout the summer monthsDesigned with high-gorge notch lapels, it's been cut slim in Italy and partially lined to create a more natural shoulderWear it with white trousers or the matching shorts for more casual eventsWear it with: Sid Mashburn Shirt, Loro Piana Trousers, J.MWeston Shoes, Loro Piana BeltSmall to sizeSee Size & Fit notes.

fields.product_name: TAKAHIROMIYASHITA TheSoloist. - Mickey Mouse Slim-Fit AppliquÃ©d Embroidered Wool-Blend Gabardine Blazer - Men - Black
fields.description: This isn't the first time Mr Takahiro Miyashita has worked Mickey Mouse into his collections, the Disney-themed capsule for his other label, NUMBER (N)INE, sold out in record speedTAKAHIROMIYASHITA TheSoloist.'s blazer has been tailored slim in Japan from wool-blend gabardine and embroidered all over with the iconic character's silhouetteIt's detailed with glossy stripes at the sleeve to match the embossed gold buttonsWear it with: SAINT LAURENT Trousers, SAINT LAURENT Shirt, SAINT LAURENT Boots, MAPLE Bracelet.

fields.product_name: TAKAHIROMIYASHITA TheSoloist. - Mickey Mouse AppliquÃ©d Wool-Blend Gabardine Blazer - Men - Black
fields.description: TAKAHIROMIYASHITA TheSoloist.'s blazer isn't your typical tailored pieceDetailed with cool military-inspired patches and stripes on the sleeves, it's been made in Japan from wool-blend gabardine and has a pair of pockets and iconic Mickey Mouse appliquÃ© at the backIt's cut slightly loose for a comfortable fitWear it with: Rick Owens Trousers, Rick Owens T-shirt, Rick Owens Boots, Tom Wood Necklace.

fields.product_name: TOM FORD - O'Connor Slim-Fit Unstructured Cashmere Blazer - Men - Black
fields.description: TOM FORD's 'O'Connor' suit is one of Mr James Bond's go-to's, versions are worn by Mr Daniel Craig in Spectre and the upcoming film No Time to DieThis slim-fit suit jacket is Italian-tailored from woven cashmere, so it drapes really effortlessly.

fields.product_name: TOM FORD - Shelton Slim-Fit Prince of Wales Checked Wool and Silk-Blend Blazer - Men - Gray
fields.description: Mr Tom Ford says the secret to a good suit is a structured silhouette that makes your waist and hips appear smaller, I like a strong shoulder and a generous lapel", he explainsFitting his precise requirements, this blazer is cut from Prince of Wales-checked wool and silk-blend and fully lined for a smooth fit.

fields.product_name: TOM FORD - O'Connor Slim-Fit Unstructured Cashmere Blazer - Men - Brown
fields.description: TOM FORD's blazer is spun from luxuriously soft cashmere in an unstructured, slim-fitting silhouetteIt has sharp notched lapels and is left unlined so you can neatly layer over button-down shirtsMid-wash jeans will look great with the sophisticated camel hue.

fields.product_name: TOM FORD - O'Connor Slim-Fit Houndstooth Wool, Mohair and Silk-Blend Blazer - Men - Gray
fields.description: If you're looking for a reason to invest in TOM FORD's 'O'Connor' suit, we can give you 007, it's a staple cut worn by Mr Daniel Craig across the film franchiseThis jacket is tailored for a slim fit from wool, mohair and silk-blend woven in a traditional houndstooth check.

fields.product_name: TOM FORD - O'Connor Slim-Fit Wool and Mohair-Blend Blazer - Men - Black
fields.description: Mr Tom Ford is rarely seen out of a suit and he is his own fit model, which is why his tailoring is so flatteringThis handsome black blazer is cut from a textured wool and mohair-blend and detailed with gleaming golden buttons.

fields.product_name: TOM FORD - O'Connor Slim-Fit Wool and Mohair-Blend Blazer - Men - Blue
fields.description: A black suit is Mr Tom Ford's personal uniform of choice, which goes some way to explaining why his tailoring is such a treatThis handsome blazer is cut from a textured wool and mohair-blend and detailed with gleaming golden buttons.

fields.product_name: TOM FORD - Slim-Fit Leather-Trimmed Suede Blazer - Men - Black
fields.description: TOM FORD's blazer is a fresh take on traditional tailoring, it's been crafted in Italy from supple suede and has a throat latch, a cool detail borrowed from biker jacketsIt's cut slim, trimmed with leather and lined in smooth satin for a comfortable fitWear it with: TOM FORD Sweater, TOM FORD Trousers, TOM FORD Boots, Tom Ford Timepieces Watch.

fields.product_name: Thom Sweeney - Navy Curzon Slim-Fit Wool Blazer - Men - Blue
fields.description: Navy Basketweave Wool Blazer, Slim Fit, Notched Lapels, Buttoned Cuffs, Chest Pocket, Two Flap Pockets, Double Vents, Half Lined, Two Button Fastening, 100% Wool; Lining: 100% Viscose, Dry Clean, Comes With A Dust BagThe wool used for this Thom Sweeney blazer is lightly textured and has a slightly open construction so it's a great choice for summer eventsThe slim fit is elegant and refinedWear it with a linen shirt for an informal approach, or a cotton Oxford and silk tie for something a bit smarterKeep it formal with a Thom Sweeney shirt, Huntsman trousers, Drake's tie, Drake's pocket square and John Lobb shoesGo casual with a Boglioli shirt, Dolce & Gabbana chinos and J.MWeston shoes.

fields.product_name: The Row - Black Michel Slim-Fit Cashmere Blazer - Men - Black
fields.description: The Row is named after venerable London tailoring destination Savile Row, so you should rightfully expect pieces like this 'Michel' blazer to be so well madeCut for a slim fit from fluid cashmere, it has a felted undercollar, pad-stitched lapels and a partial satin lining for ease of movementWear it with a crisp button-down or a simple white teeShown here with The Row trousers, The Row T-shirt, Common Projects sneakers.

fields.product_name: The Row - Slater Slim-Fit Cotton-Blend Twill Blazer - Men - Black
fields.description: The Row's 'Slater' blazer has been tailored in Italy from cotton-blend twill that's spun with cashmere for a smooth handleThe lightly padded shoulders and wide lapels create a broadening effect in an understated way.

fields.product_name: Theory - Clinton Unstructured Seersucker Blazer - Men - Blue
fields.description: Seersucker is a classic summer suiting fabric for good reason, not only does the slightly puckered fabric look smart without pressing, it's also naturally breathable and coolingTheory's 'Clifton' blazer is tailored in a neat single-breasted profile and left unlined for lightnessLayer it over a simple button-down or tee on warm daysWear it with: Acne Studios T-shirt, Acne Studios Trousers, Common Projects Sneakers, Acne Studios Cardholder.

fields.product_name: Thom Browne - Striped MelangÃ© Cotton Blazer - Men - Gray
fields.description: Many creatives have picked a signature shade and really ran with it â take Prince and the colour purple as an exampleFor Mr Thom Browne, grey has been a key part of his design palette since the very first collectionTailored from slightly stretchy cotton, this unstructured blazer is made even easier to distinguish thanks to the striped sleeveIt has three buttons, notch lapels and a felted undercollarWear it with: Thom Browne Trousers, TOM FORD Sweater, Thom Browne Shoes, Thom Browne Sunglasses.

fields.product_name: Thom Browne - Slim-Fit Unstructured Striped Cotton-Twill Blazer - Men - Brown
fields.description: Thom Browne's blazer is personalised with the brand's signature grosgrain trims and four stripes at the sleeveIt's been expertly tailored in Japan from durable cotton-twill and unlined through the body to make it as weightless and easy to slip over a shirt as possibleWear it with: Thom Browne Shirt, Prada Trousers, Thom Browne Shoes, Thom Browne Cardholder.

fields.product_name: The Row - Navy Michel Slim-Fit Cotton and Cashmere-Blend Blazer - Men - Blue
fields.description: Despite only launching its first full men's collection last season, The Row is responsible for some of the most luxurious and well-executed tailoring in the businessThis 'Michel' blazer has been made in Japan from a cotton and cashmere-blend with a soft, smooth handle and has padded shoulders to define the slim, single-breasted shapeThe consideration for detail is meticulous, from the functioning kissing buttoned cuffs to the pick-stitching that traces the notch lapelsShown here with Berluti shirt, Berluti trousers, Common Projects sneakers.

fields.product_name: The Row - Grey Walter MÃ©lange Silk and Cashmere-Blend Blazer - Men - Gray
fields.description: The Row borrows its name from London's renowned suiting mecca, so it's no surprise its tailoring is so expertly craftedThis 'Walter' blazer is cut from a fluid silk and cashmere-blend and has notch lapels, two front pockets and a double vent for a little extra roomIt's butterfly-lined, meaning it'll glide seamlessly over buttoned shirts.

fields.product_name: Thom Browne - Slim-Fit Unstructured Striped Cotton-Twill Blazer - Men - Blue
fields.description: Thom Browne's tailoring always feels unique, the brand is known for its avant-garde approach to suitingThis blazer is cut from navy cotton-twill in a slim, unstructured shape that'll mould comfortably to your torsoIt's detailed at the sleeve with the brand's signature quartet of white stripesWear it with: Thom Browne Trousers, Thom Browne Shirt, Thom Browne Shoes, Thom Browne Cardholder.

fields.product_name: Valentino - Woven Blazer - Men - Black
fields.description: Valentino's blazer makes a breeze of summertime formality â the technical fabric is woven to provide sufficient structure without adding too much warmthDesigned in a classic single-breasted profile, it has a straight, boxy shape through the body and gently sloped shouldersWear it with tonal trousers and a printed shirtWear it with: Valentino Trousers, SAINT LAURENT Boots, Valentino Cardholder, Valentino Hat.

fields.product_name: Vetements - Oversized Leather Blazer - Men - Black
fields.description: Tailoring is a focal point of Vetements' AW20 collection and this blazer showcases the collective's ability to make even the most classic pieces feel so fresh and coolWorn by a Mike Tyson lookalike at the show, it's cut from particularly supple leather in the brand's trademark oversized fit and fully lined for easy layeringWear it with: Vetements T-shirt, Maison Margiela Shirt, Vetements Jeans, Balenciaga Boots.

fields.product_name: Vetements - Virgin Wool-Blend Jacquard Blazer - Men - Green
fields.description: Vetements' tailoring is always distinctive, this blazer is precisely pattern-cut for a more pronounced profile than a classic styleMade from virgin wool-blend jacquard, it's boxy in shape and has wide-spread lapels, which you can exaggerate by fastening the buttons through the frontWear it with a tee or rollneck underneath for a contemporary take on suitingWear it with: Vetements T-Shirt, Balenciaga Trousers, Balenciaga Boots.

fields.product_name: adidas Consortium - 424 Embroidered Striped Poplin Blazer - Men - Black
fields.description: Fusing smart tailoring with cool sporty details, adidas Consortium's blazer is designed in collaboration with LA-based label 424It's made from black mid-weight poplin and embroidered with both houses' emblems in contrasting red to match the signature three stripes on the sleevesThe peak lapels keep the regular silhouette looking sharpWear it with: adidas Consortium Trousers, 424 T-shirt, adidas Consortium Sneakers, adidas Consortium Baseball Cap.

fields.product_name: Brunello Cucinelli - Shearling-Trimmed Cashmere Bomber Jacket - Men - Neutrals
fields.product_category: Clothing > Cashmere > Cashmere Coats and Jackets
fields.description: In muted neutrals, Brunello Cucinelli's bomber jacket has timeless appealIt's made from soft cashmere, padded for warmth and has a detachable shearling collarFasten the throat latch on particularly cold days.

fields.product_name: Brunello Cucinelli - Pinstriped Cashmere and Cotton-Blend Bomber Jacket - Men - Blue
fields.product_category: Clothing > Cashmere > Cashmere Coats and Jackets
fields.description: Brunello Cucinelli's neat pinstriped jacket will have you looking put-together even on days away from the officeIt's been made in Italy from a cashmere and cotton-blend and styled after bombers with a minimal baseball collarWear it with: Brunello Cucinelli Sweatpants, Brunello Cucinelli Sneakers.

fields.product_name: Ermenegildo Zegna - Cashmere Bomber Jacket - Men - Gray
fields.product_category: Clothing > Cashmere > Cashmere Coats and Jackets
fields.description: Ever wonder if a sweatsuit passes for Casual Friday attire? We advise leaving the hoodie at home, instead opting for pieces that are equally plush and smart, like this Ermenegildo Zegna bomber jacketIt's made from smooth, insulating cashmere that's a pleasure to wear, lightly padded for extra warmth and features two handy zipped pockets to hold small kit.

fields.product_name: Ermenegildo Zegna - Cashmere Bomber Jacket - Men - Blue
fields.product_category: Clothing > Cashmere > Cashmere Coats and Jackets
fields.description: Ermenegildo Zegna has been innovating fabrics ever since the brand was first founded in 1910This jacket has been made in Italy from water-repellent cashmere which will lock in warmth and also offer some resilience to light showersItâs padded for insulation and has an elasticated hem and cuffs to define the fit.

fields.product_name: Loro Piana - Cashmere Jacket - Men - Blue
fields.product_category: Clothing > Cashmere > Cashmere Coats and Jackets
fields.description: Loro Piana is renowned for its exceptional fabrics, like the supple cashmere used to make this jacketCrafted at the brand's Italian atelier, it's designed with a streamlining covered placket, comfortable ribbing lining the collar and an elasticated hem for a neat fit.

fields.product_name: Loro Piana - Reversible Storm System Shell and Cashmere Bomber Jacket - Men - Blue
fields.product_category: Clothing > Cashmere > Cashmere Coats and Jackets
fields.description: Blue Storm SystemÂ® Shell And Cashmere, Elasticated Cuffs And Hem, Two Front Welt Pockets, Two Internal Pockets, Two-way Zip Fastening, Fabric1: 100% Polyamide; Fabric2: 100% Cashmere; Membrane: 100% Polyurethane, Dry Clean, Made In ItalyLoro Piana's jacket can be worn two ways, on the soft cashmere side or turned to the breathable shell reverse, which has been treated to be both water and wind resistantIt's finished with an elasticated hem and cuffs to temper the relaxed shapeShown here with Loro Piana sweater, Ermenegildo Zegna trousers, Ermenegildo Zegna T-shirt, John Lobb sneakers.

fields.product_name: Loro Piana - Cashmere Bomber Jacket - Men - Blue
fields.product_category: Clothing > Cashmere > Cashmere Coats and Jackets
fields.description: Loro Piana's bomber jacket is treated with the label's Rain SystemÂ® technology to repel wind and water, which makes it an ideal layer all year longMade from plush navy cashmere, it's fitted with two spacious front pockets and a smart suede throat latch that'll help keep out the chill.

fields.product_name: Loro Piana - Cashmere Bomber Jacket - Men - Neutrals
fields.product_category: Clothing > Cashmere > Cashmere Coats and Jackets
fields.description: Loro Piana only uses the most beautiful fabrics, so even its everyday pieces feel luxuriousThis bomber jacket is made from soft cashmere â sourced from the remote uplands of Mongolia â and treated to ensure it's completely waterproofIt's trimmed with suede along the pockets as a thoughtful final detail.

fields.product_name: The Row - Trevor Double-Faced Cashmere Bomber Jacket - Men - Black
fields.product_category: Clothing > Cashmere > Cashmere Coats and Jackets
fields.description: The Row designs with restraint, emphasising the quality of the cuts and fabrics over everything elseThis 'Trevor' bomber jacket has been crafted in Italy from plush, double-faced cashmere in a relaxed shape that accommodates layers underneathIt fastens with horn buttons and has midnight-blue ribbed trims.

fields.product_name: Brunello Cucinelli - Cashmere Polo Shirt - Men - Red
fields.description: By selecting the finest cashmere, Brunello Cucinelli achieves the softest handle for this polo shirtDesigned with a traditional placket topped with mother-of-pearl buttons, it's ribbed at the edges for reinforcement and definitionWear it with: Canali Trousers, Brunello Cucinelli T-shirt, Brunello Cucinelli Sneakers, IWC SCHAFFHAUSEN Watch.

fields.product_name: Kingsman - Knitted Cashmere Polo Shirt - Men - Burgundy
fields.description: Whether it's smart tailoring or classic knitwear, you can rely on Kingsman for qualityThis polo shirt has been made in Scotland from soft cashmere and fastens with lustrous mother-of-pearl buttons.

fields.product_name: Kiton - Cashmere and Silk-Blend Half-Placket Hoodie - Men - Blue
fields.description: Impressive attention to detail and high-quality fabrics are at the core of Kiton's modus operandi, and this hoodie is a great example of bothDesigned to layer comfortably, it's been handcrafted in Italy from a soft, lightweight cashmere and silk-blend and has tonal horn buttons subtly engraved with a signature 'K'.

fields.product_name: Loro Piana - Cashmere-Blend Zip-Up Hoodie - Men - Blue
fields.description: Loro Piana's zip-up hoodie is made from a cashmere-blend with a plush loosely knit interior, so it's really soft and feels great against skinIt's threaded with a drawstring through the hood and has a two-way zip fastening for easy layering.

fields.product_name: TOM FORD - Slim-Fit Cashmere and Silk-Blend Polo Shirt - Men - Neutrals
fields.description: TOM FORD's polo shirt has been finely knitted in Italy from a soft, lightweight cashmere and silk-blendIt has a slim shape that makes for easy layering and polished buttons for a refined finishWear it with: The Row Trousers, TOM FORD Boots, TOM FORD Bracelet, Tom Ford Timepieces Watch.

fields.product_name: TOM FORD - MÃ©lange Cashmere Polo Shirt - Men - Gray
fields.description: TOM FORD's long-sleeved polo shirt is the epitome of casual eleganceIt has been expertly spun in Italy from light-grey mÃ©lange cashmere in a comfortable, relaxed fit and fastens with tonal mother-of-pearl buttons for a clean, streamlined lookWear it with: TOM FORD Trousers, TOM FORD Jacket, SAINT LAURENT Shoes, TOM FORD Bracelet.

fields.product_name: TOM FORD - Slim-Fit Cashmere Hoodie - Men - Brown
fields.description: There will always be a time and a place to wear this TOM FORD hoodieDesigned to fit slim, it's been expertly knitted in Italy from soft, mid-weight cashmere and has a matching drawstring to keep it smart and streamlined.

fields.product_name: Brunello Cucinelli - MÃ©lange Cashmere and Cotton-Blend Zip-Up Sweatshirt - Men - Neutrals
fields.description: Whether you wear it solo or with the matching trousers, Brunello Cucinelli's zip-up sweatshirt makes a comfortable, year-round layerIt's knitted from a plush cashmere and cotton-blend, fitted with a bomber jacket-inspired ribbed collar and detailed with two handy pockets for your essentialsTry it with a tee or polo shirt on low-key weekends.

fields.product_name: Brunello Cucinelli - Pinstriped Cashmere and Cotton-Blend Sweatpants - Men - Blue
fields.description: Brunello Cucinelli's sweatpants are a comfy alternative to chinos, yet still look smartMade in Italy from a smooth cashmere and cotton-blend, they're fitted with a drawstring waistband for easy adjustments and feature pinstripes that borrow from classic tailoringWear it with: Brunello Cucinelli T-shirt, Brunello Cucinelli Sneakers.

fields.product_name: Brunello Cucinelli - Cashmere and Wool-Blend Zip-Up Hoodie - Men - Gray
fields.description: If anyone knows how to make superior loungewear, it's Mr Brunello Cucinelli, not only does he hold strong beliefs about the value of downtime, but he's also a master of cashmereSpun from a plush blend of the fibre and wool, this comfortable zip-up hoodie is tipped with contrasting ribbing.
