fields.product_name: Brunello Cucinelli - Pinstriped Cashmere and Cotton-Blend Hoodie - Men - Blue
fields.description: Brunello Cucinelli always opts for premium fabrics, ensuring everything from a suit to loungewear is of impeccable qualityIdeal for low-key days, this hoodie is made from a cashmere and cotton-blend and designed with smart pinstripes borrowed from tailoringWear it with: Brunello Cucinelli Sweatpants, Brunello Cucinelli Sneakers.

fields.product_name: Burberry - Cashmere-Blend Zip-Up Hoodie - Men - Black
fields.description: Loungewear should be as comfortable as possible, which is why Burberry's hoodie is made from the softest of cashmere yarnsBlended for flex and resilience, it has a relaxed profile and is subtly embroidered with the label's latest logo at the chestWear it with the matching sweatpants.

fields.product_name: Club Monaco - Waffle-Knit Cashmere Hoodie - Men - Gray
fields.description: Club Monaco's hoodie is specially designed for the summer, it'll come in handy on chilly nights and when the AC is blasting full-tiltIt's waffle-knitted from soft, pale-grey cashmere and has comfortable pouch pocketsWear it with: Velva Sheen T-shirt, Mr PTrousers, Veja Sneakers.

fields.product_name: Dolce & Gabbana - Cashmere Zip-Up Hoodie - Men - Black
fields.description: Dolce & Gabbana's hoodie is made from luxurious cashmere in a zip-up shape you'll be able to layer over your favourite T-shirtIt's finished with ribbed trims at the cuffs and hem for a neater fitThanks to the classic black hue, it'll slot seamlessly into the rest of your loungewear collectionWear it with: Givenchy T-Shirt, Givenchy Sweatpants, Givenchy Sneakers, Givenchy Messenger.

fields.product_name: Fear of God for Ermenegildo Zegna - Cashmere Hoodie - Men - Neutrals
fields.brand: Fear of God for Ermenegildo Zegna
fields.description: What do you get if you combine Fear of God's laid-back silhouettes with Ermenegildo Zegna's exceptional craftsmanship? The duo's highly anticipated collaborative range, which redefines luxury staplesThis hoodie is knitted entirely from plush off-white cashmere and has a relaxed shape, wide ribbed trims at the cuffs and hem give it a little structureWear it with: Fear of God for Ermenegildo Zegna Trousers, Fear of God for Ermenegildo Zegna Jacket, Fear of God for Ermenegildo Zegna T-Shirt, Fear of God for Ermenegildo Zegna Sneakers.

fields.product_name: Gabriela Hearst - Jean Paul Cashmere and Silk-Blend Zip-Up Hoodie - Men - Gray
fields.description: High-quality basics are essential in any man's wardrobe, especially if they're as versatile as this grey 'Jean Paul' hoodie from Gabriela HearstIt's spun from a luxurious blend of cashmere and silk for a supremely soft handle.

fields.product_name: Gabriela Hearst - Jean Paul Cashmere and Silk-Blend Zip-Up Hoodie - Men - Multi
fields.description: High-quality basics are essential in any man's wardrobe, especially if they're as versatile as this navy and burgundy 'Jean Paul' hoodie from Gabriela HearstIt's spun from a luxurious blend of cashmere and silk for a supremely soft handle.

fields.product_name: Kingsman - Brushed-Cashmere Zip-Up Hoodie - Men - Blue
fields.description: EXCLUSIVE AT MR PORTERKingsman's zip-up hoodie is knitted from soft, mid-weight brushed-cashmere, so it's a particularly comfortable choiceIt has a relaxed profile and is embroidered at the chest with the brand's emblemTeam it with the matching sweatpantsWear it with: Kingsman Sweatpants, Kingsman T-shirt, Common Projects Sneakers.

fields.product_name: Loro Piana - Cashmere and Silk-Blend Zip-Up Hoodie - Men - Gray
fields.description: Loro Piana goes to great lengths to ensure its fabrics are of the highest quality, even for more laid-back designsAs comfortable as it is versatile, this 'Portland' zip-up hoodie has been made in Italy from a soft cashmere and silk-blend and has a handy two-way zip that makes layering easyShown here with Loro Piana jacket, TOM FORD T-shirt.

fields.product_name: Loro Piana - Julien Checked Cashmere Robe - Men - Blue
fields.description: Loro Piana's robe is made from weighty cashmere and has a tidy straight silhouette and shawl collarThe trio of deep patch pockets (which are perfectly aligned with the checked pattern) will hold your phone or reading glasses.

fields.product_name: Massimo Alba - Slim-Fit Cashmere Sweatshirt - Men - Gray
fields.description: Mr Massimo Alba founded his namesake label after working at several renowned cashmere brands, so he has extensive knowledge and skill when it comes to the fibreKnitted in Italy from soft yarns, this sweater is dyed a versatile charcoal shade and framed with ribbing at the edges.

fields.product_name: Massimo Alba - Cashmere Hoodie - Men - Blue
fields.description: Cashmere is Massimo Alba's specialty, so you'll be hard-pressed to find another sweater as soft as this hoodieIt has been made in Italy for a relaxed fit to ensure it sits comfortably over T-shirtsSave yours for relaxed weekendsWear it with: Massimo Alba T-shirt, TOM FORD Jeans, Officine Creative Sneakers, IWC SCHAFFHAUSEN Watch.

fields.product_name: Mr P. - Double-Faced Cashmere Sweatshirt - Men - Gray
fields.description: EXCLUSIVE AT MR PORTERWe sought out some of the most skilled artisans in the world to craft Mr P.'s latest collection, this sweater shows just how high the bar is setIt's been handmade in Italy from soft, double-faced cashmere that's lightly brushed and teased, so it feels impressively lightWear it with: Mr PTrousers, Mr PT-shirt, Mr PSneakers, Mr PSocks.

fields.product_name: Ralph Lauren Purple Label - Cashmere Hoodie - Men - Brown
fields.description: Ralph Lauren Purple Label is known for its superior Italian craftsmanship and luxurious fabrications, this hoodie is a prime example of bothIt's knitted entirely from soft, lightweight cashmere and threaded with a drawstring through the hoodWear it with: Canali Trousers, TOM FORD T-Shirt, Brunello Cucinelli Sneakers.

fields.product_name: Rick Owens - Tapered Boiled Cashmere Sweatpants - Men - Brown
fields.description: Rick Owens focuses heavily on perfecting the fabric and fit of every piece, as you'll see from these sweatpantsThey're cut from boiled cashmere that have a dense, more felt-like handle compared to the untreated fibre, and come in a tapered profile with the brand's signature elongated drawstrings at the waistbandWear it with: Rick Owens Jacket, Rick Owens T-shirt, Rick Owens Sneakers, LAUD Ring.

fields.product_name: Rick Owens - Oversized Boiled Cashmere Hoodie - Men - Brown
fields.description: Mr Rick Owens calls this hoodie his brand's forever style, so expect that once it's in your wardrobe it'll be there for the long haulDesigned for an oversized fit, it's been made in Italy from cashmere that's been boiled in various different washes to achieve its incredibly soft handleThe elongated drawstrings are a brand signatureWear it with: Rick Owens Sweater, Balenciaga Trousers, Rick Owens Sneakers, Bottega Veneta Ring.

fields.product_name: TOM FORD - Leather-Trimmed Cashmere-Blend Zip-Up Hoodie - Men - Neutrals
fields.description: TOM FORD crafts its loungewear with just as much care and attention to detail as it does its exquisite suiting and runway collectionsPerfect for casual days at home or running errands, this comfortable hoodie is spun from an exceptionally soft cashmere-blend in a relaxed shapeIt's trimmed with faux leather and zips through the frontWear it with: TOM FORD Sweatpants, Maison Margiela T-shirt, TOM FORD Sneakers, Mr PSocks.

fields.product_name: The Row - Harry Cashmere Zip-up Hoodie - Men - Gray
fields.description: The Row specialises in investment-worthy, timeless essentials that you'll reach for oftenThis 'Harry' zip-up hoodie is spun from fine-gauge cashmere and has subtle ribbed trimsWear it layered over slim T-shirtsWear it with: The Row Sweatpants, The Row T-shirt, Common Projects Sneakers, Le Gramme Ring.

fields.product_name: The Row - Harry Cashmere Zip-Up Hoodie - Men - Black
fields.description: Comfort and quality are of the utmost important to The Row, even when it comes to loungewear staples like this 'Harry' hoodieIt's been spun in Italy from premium cashmere for an easy, relaxed fitWear it with the 'Felix' sweatpants or try it under a smart blazer.

fields.product_name: StÃ¼ssy - Camp Collar Logo-Print Cotton-Blend Shirt - Men - Black
fields.product_category: Clothing > Casual Shirts > Camp Collar Shirts
fields.description: StÃ¼ssy's camp collar shirt is modelled after oversized logo-print styles from the '90sIt's made from a cotton-blend printed with a blazing chromed exhaust pipe taking place of the 'Y in the logoWear yours with trousers and jeans alikeWear it with: Wacko Maria Trousers, Carhartt WIP T-shirt, Converse Sneakers, Vans Socks.

fields.product_name: AMIRI - Dupont Falling Camp-Collar Printed Silk-Twill Shirt - Men - Black
fields.product_category: Clothing > Casual Shirts > Camp Collar Shirts
fields.description: AMIRI's 'Dupont Falling' shirt is inspired by retro holiday shirts from the '50sIt's been made in Italy from silk-twill and designed with a camp collar to enhance the vintage lookThe printed motif features cascading lighters and lit cigarsWear it with: Sunspel Tank top, AMIRI Jeans, AMIRI Sneakers, David Yurman Necklace.

fields.product_name: AMIRI - Camp-Collar Floral-Print Silk-Twill Shirt - Men - Multi
fields.product_category: Clothing > Casual Shirts > Camp Collar Shirts
fields.description: EXCLUSIVE AT MR PORTERMr Mike Amiri says his inspiration comes from the energy of Woodstock '69 by way of his own West Coast roots â the result is unabashedly rock 'n' roll with a touch of California coolThis silk-twill shirt is designed to appear as though it's spliced together from an assortment of vintage Hawaiian stylesIt's cut with a retro camp collar and a relaxed, boxy profile.

fields.product_name: AMIRI - Camp-Collar Printed Silk-Twill Shirt - Men - Black
fields.product_category: Clothing > Casual Shirts > Camp Collar Shirts
fields.description: EXCLUSIVE AT MR PORTERAMIRI's latest collection celebrating Woodstock's 50th anniversary features imagery inspired by the festival's collective idealsThis boxy camp-collar shirt is cut from fluid silk-twill and printed with a pair of egrets, symbolising peace and harmonyWear it with: AMIRI Jeans, AMIRI Sneakers, Martine Ali Keyring, AMIRI Hat.

fields.product_name: AMIRI - Camp-Collar Printed Silk-Twill Shirt - Men - Pink
fields.product_category: Clothing > Casual Shirts > Camp Collar Shirts
fields.description: EXCLUSIVE AT MR PORTEREvery season, AMIRI expands its roster of prints and patterns with refined motifs like the seahorses and florals on this camp-collar shirtThe silk-twill makes for a particularly good summer wardrobe addition since it's cooling and lightWear it with: AMIRI Jeans, AMIRI Hoodie, AMIRI Boots, AMIRI Hat.

fields.product_name: AMIRI - Camp-Collar Embroidered Silk-Satin Shirt - Men - Black
fields.product_category: Clothing > Casual Shirts > Camp Collar Shirts
fields.description: AMIRI's silk-satin shirt recalls retro bowling styles with its relaxed camp-collar profile and piped edgesIt's embroidered with calligraphy on the chest and back which reads, 'Always Loving You'.

fields.product_name: Vilebrequin - Camp-Collar Printed Cotton and Linen-Blend Shirt - Men - Yellow
fields.product_category: Clothing > Casual Shirts > Camp Collar Shirts
fields.description: Vilebrequin believes, A manâs degree of elegance is often proportional to the quality of his shirt"This one is made from a premium cotton and linen-blend and covered with a lighthearted palm leaf and banana printIt's picture perfect resortwear.

fields.product_name: WTAPS - Camp-Collar Printed Cotton Shirt - Men - White
fields.product_category: Clothing > Casual Shirts > Camp Collar Shirts
fields.description: Japanese streetwear giant WTAPS often draws inspiration from contemporary sub-cultures throughout historyModelled after traditional Hawaiian styles, this tropical shirt is cut from breathable cotton featuring pin-up girl artwork that was popular in the '40sThe boxy shape and camp collar add to its laid-back, vintage appeal.

fields.product_name: visvim - Irving Camp-Collar Logo-Embroidered Printed Twill Shirt - Men - Black
fields.product_category: Clothing > Casual Shirts > Camp Collar Shirts
fields.description: Mr Hiroki Nakamura of visvim often draws inspiration from classic Americana in his designsCut with a relaxed silhouette, this 'Irving' shirt has an oversized vintage-style logo and a retro camp-collar, playing up its '50s bowling vibeWear it with: WTAPS Sweatpants, Undercover T-Shirt, Vans Sneakers, Miansai Necklace.

fields.product_name: visvim - Camp-Collar Printed Voile Shirt - Men - Black
fields.product_category: Clothing > Casual Shirts > Camp Collar Shirts
fields.description: visvim's Mr Hiroki Nakamura has long been fascinated with vintage clothes and often incorporates characteristics from old pieces into new designsModelled on retro bowling styles, this shirt has a camp collar and is printed with a monochrome lattice patternThe fluid voile hangs softly and doesn't cling, so it's great in warm weatherWear it with: Levi's Vintage Clothing Jeans, Yuketen ShoesSmall to sizeSee Size & Fit notes.

fields.product_name: visvim - Camp-Collar Embroidered Striped Cotton Shirt - Men - Red
fields.product_category: Clothing > Casual Shirts > Camp Collar Shirts

fields.product_name: Anderson & Sheppard - Linen Shirt - Men - Green

fields.product_name: Balenciaga - Oversized Logo-Print Cotton-Poplin Shirt - Men - Yellow

fields.product_name: Beams F - Grandad-Collar Linen Shirt - Men - Brown

fields.product_name: Barena - Cotton-Chambray Half-Zip Shirt - Men - Blue

fields.product_name: Beams Plus - Button-Down Collar Cotton-Chambray Shirt - Men - Blue

fields.product_name: Beams Plus - Camp-Collar Cotton-Corduroy Shirt - Men - Green

fields.product_name: Beams Plus - Camp-Collar Linen-Blend Shirt - Men - White

fields.product_name: Belstaff - Denim Shirt - Men - Blue

fields.product_name: Bellerose - Luther Wool-Blend Flannel Overshirt - Men - Blue

fields.product_name: Mr P. - Virgin Wool-Twill Blouson Jacket - Men - Black

fields.product_name: A.P.C. - Laurel Houndstooth Woven Bomber Jacket - Men - Gray

fields.product_name: SAINT LAURENT - Teddy Leather-Trimmed Wool Bomber Jacket - Men - Black

fields.product_name: TOM FORD - Wool Bomber Jacket - Men - Blue

fields.product_name: Theory - City Shell Bomber Jacket - Men - Brown
fields.product_category: Clothing > Coats And Jackets > Bomber Jackets

fields.product_name: WTAPS - Drifters Logo-AppliquÃ©d Cotton-Twill Bomber Jacket - Men - Black

fields.product_name: Balenciaga - Logo-Embroidered Denim Jacket - Men - Black

fields.product_name: Reese CooperÂ® - Logo-AppliquÃ©d Distressed Denim Jacket - Men - Blue
fields.product_category: Clothing > Coats And Jackets > Denim Jackets

fields.product_name: Loewe - Paula's Ibiza Patchwork Denim Jacket - Men - Blue

fields.product_name: A.P.C. - Denim Jacket - Men - Blue

fields.product_name: AMIRI - Distressed Printed Denim Trucker Jacket - Men - Blue

fields.product_name: AMIRI - Patchwork Satin-Trimmed Denim Trucker Jacket - Men - Black
fields.product_category: Clothing > Coats And Jackets > Denim Jackets
fields.description: AMIRI always takes such an artful approach to designing its denim piecesThis black trucker jacket is panelled with satin scarf patches along the sleeves for a patchwork look and distressed by hand with rips, abrasions and fadingWear it with: Sunspel Tank top, AMIRI Jeans, AMIRI Boots, Tom Wood Necklace.

fields.product_name: Moncler - Edgard Quilted Shell Down Jacket - Men - Green

fields.description: Army-green Shell, Designer Emblem, Front Zipped Pockets, Striped Grosgrain Trims, Drawstring Hem, Two-way Zip Fastening, 100% Polyamide; Trim: 69% Polyester, 31% Cotton; Padding: 90% Down, 10% Feathers (goose), Dry CleanIt can be tough navigating the city during the cold months â you spend days moving between the frosty outdoors and stuffy interiors, which is why you need outerwear that locks in warmth without feeling weightyFit for the job, Moncler 's 'Edgard' jacket is cut from lightweight quilted shell filled with insulating down and feathers and has drawstring ties at the hem that can be tightened to prevent heat lossShown here with Moncler sweater, Acne Studios jeans, Acne Studios T-shirt, Moncler sneakers.

fields.product_category: Clothing > Coats And Jackets > Down Jackets

They have an elasticated waistband that makes the design that much more comfortableSimply cover the detail with your shirt or sweater's hem to keep the look smartWear it with: Mr PBoots, Mr PScarf, Mr PSocks, Le Gramme Ring.

fields.description: A.P.C.'s signature 'Petit New Standard' jeans are about as classic as it getsIn a light-blue wash, this slim-fit pair is cut from mid-weight denim and designed to comfortably break in the more you wear themThey go with just about everything, so we bet it'll happen in no timeWear it with: A.P.CShirt.

fields.product_name: A.P.C. - Petit Standard Slim-Fit Dry Selvedge Denim Jeans - Men - Blue
fields.description: Indigo Dry Selvedge Denim, Belt Loops, Five Pockets, Button Fastenings, 100% Cotton, Machine WashClean, classic design is never a passing fad, which is why A.P.C.'s Petit Standard jeans are a perennial favourite at MR PORTER HQThey feature minimal detailing and come in a slim fit, making them easy to pair with any and everythingCrafted from premium Japanese dry selvedge denim, they'll serve you well for years, developing a unique patina as they break inShown here with AMI T-shirt, Folk jacket, Converse sneakers, Luis Morais braceletThis item is small to size; see Size & Fit notes.

fields.product_name: AMIRI - MX1 Ultra Skinny-Fit Distressed Panelled Stretch-Denim Jeans - Men - Blue
fields.description: Mr Mike Amiri finds endless inspiration in the LA music sceneThese 'MX-1' jeans are cut from supple denim in an 'ultra skinny' fitThey're distressed, whiskered and faded by hand, and have navy suede panelsWear it with: AMIRI Shirt, Sunspel Tank top, AMIRI Sneakers, David Yurman Necklace.

fields.product_name: Acne Studios - Slim-Fit Stretch-Denim Jeans - Men - Black
fields.description: Black jeans can feel smarter than typical blue pairs, so you'll find styles like Acne Studios' ideal for evenings out and dinner datesThey're cut for a neat slim fit from soft cotton denim that's blended with stretch for comfort.

fields.product_name: Acne Studios - River Slim-Fit Tapered Stretch-Denim Jeans - Men - Blue
fields.description: Acne Studiosâ jeans are slim-fit and tapered, so they'll work well with sneakers and boots alikeTake note of thoughtful construction details, like signature pink stitching at the logo patch and back pocketsWear it with: Isabel Marant Sweater, Our Legacy Sneakers, Acne Studios Hat, A.P.CNecklaceSmall to sizeSee Size & Fit notes.

fields.product_name: Acne Studios - River Cropped Slim-Fit Denim Jeans - Men - Black
fields.description: Acne Studios ' 'River' jeans are designed to look like a pair that's been faithfully worn, they're cut from soft cotton-blend denim that's woven with just a touch a stretch for comfort, and dyed the label's 'Used Black' washThe cropped shape is great for showing off your favourite kicksShown here with Acne Studios jacket, Acne Studios T-shirt, Balenciaga sneakers.

fields.product_name: Acne Studios - Max Slim-Fit Denim Jeans - Men - Blue
fields.description: Acne Studios ' 'Max' jeans are expertly whiskered and faded to make them look authentically broken-in â the effect isn't too heavy-handed, so they're smart enough to wear out to lunch or in the eveningThe denim is slightly stretchy to make the slim fit more comfortableShown here with Acne Studios shirt, Acne Studios sweater, Acne Studios sneakers.

fields.product_name: Acne Studios - Two-Tone Distressed Denim Jeans - Men - Gray
fields.description: EXCLUSIVE AT MR PORTERAcne Studios' jeans are an ode to the '90s, made from rigid denim washed for vintage appealThey have a comfortable mid-rise waist and are cut straight through the legsThe elongated belt loops and pink patch at the back are hallmarks of the brandWear it with: Acne Studios Shirt, Velva Sheen Tank top, Acne Studios Sneakers.

fields.product_name: AMI - Washed-Denim Jeans - Men - Black
fields.description: AMI designs pieces the sort of pieces that after a few weeks of ownership, you wonder how you ever managed beforeThese straight-leg jeans are treated and laundered to create subtle fading and whiskering through the wash, so they resemble a well-worn pairThe sturdy denim will soften down with wear for an even more comfortable handleWear it with: AMI Sweater, Acne Studios T-shirt, DrMartens Shoes, MAPLE Ring.

fields.product_name: AMIRI - Skinny-Fit Distressed Stretch-Denim Jeans - Men - Blue
fields.description: AMIRI's denim is crafted using artisanal techniques to achieve the artful distressing that the brand is known forThis skinny pair is cut from faded blue stretch-denim and has a rock 'n' roll-inspired slashed kneeWear them with the label's printed tees or sweatshirtsWear it with: AMIRI T-Shirt, Converse Sneakers, AMI Bracelet.

fields.product_name: AMIRI - Slim-Fit Distressed Embroidered Denim Jeans - Men - Blue
fields.description: AMIRI achieves the rip-and-repair finishing of its jeans by hand so no two are identical, and this pair is made to look like it's really been through the wringerThey're cut from a murky mid-blue denim with visible abrasions, fading and slashes for a thoroughly distressed appearanceWear it with: AMIRI Sweatshirt, AMIRI Boots, Bunney Bracelet, Alexander McQueen Ring.

fields.product_name: Acne Studios - River Stretch-Denim Jeans - Men - Black
fields.description: Acne Studios' jeans make for a cool alternative to your classic indigo pairsCut from grey stretch-denim, they're designed in a slim profile and lightly whiskered for a broken-in feel.

fields.product_name: Acne Studios - Max Slim-Fit Stretch-Denim Jeans - Men - Blue
fields.description: Mr Jonny Johansson launched Acne Studios in the late '90s by sending 100 pairs of jeans out to creatives in Stockholm, and they've been the label's speciality ever sinceCut with a slim fit through the legs, these are made from 11oz denim with just enough stretchThe 'Blue Black' wash looks a little smarter than faded styles.

fields.product_name: Acne Studios - Slim-Fit Denim Jeans - Men - Black
fields.description: Black Stretch-denim, Belt Loops, Five Pockets, Button And Zip Fastening, 94% Cotton, 5% Polyester, 1% Elastane, Machine Wash, Designer Wash: Stay Black, Made In ItalyWhen it comes to jeans, Mr Jonny Johansson reckons that having something robust and versatile is key, and this pair by Acne Studios is just thatThey're made from comfortable denim and come in the label's sensibly named 'Stay Black' wash that resists fadingShown here with Acne Studios jacket, Acne Studios T-shirt, Maison Margiela sneakers, Acne Studios bag, Acne Studios socks.

fields.product_name: Acne Studios - Max Slim-Fit Distressed Denim Jeans - Men - Blue
fields.description: These jeans are cut in Acne Studios' 'Max' fit, the brand's slim, straight optionThey have a bit of stretch, so they're both easy to move in and resilient, and are distressed at the kneesShown here with Acne Studios T-shirt, Acne Studios shirt, Acne Studios sneakers, Pantherella socks.

fields.product_name: Fendi - Perforated Wool Sweater - Men - White
fields.description: Fendi's sweater has been knitted in Italy using an open-stitch technique, creating a perforated check across the surface, be playful with the coloured shirt you layer underneath and opt for solids over patternsIt's cut from soft wool for a comfortable fitWear it with: The Row Trousers, Givenchy Sneakers.

fields.product_name: Fendi - Logo-Intarsia Knitted Sweater - Men - Brown
fields.description: Fendi's sweater features the distinctive 'Zucca' monogram, created by Mr Karl Lagerfeld in the '60s, it was originally used to line the interiors of the brand's travel trunksThe striped ribbed crew neckline and hem give structure to the profileWear it with: Givenchy Trousers, Givenchy Sneakers.

fields.product_name: Fendi - Slim-Fit Logo-Jacquard Wool-Blend Sweater - Men - Black
fields.description: Fendi's sweater fades from black to stone, revealing its signature Zucca logo around the cuffs and hemIt's knitted from a soft wool-blend in a slim fit and finished with ribbed trims for definitionWear it with: Givenchy Trousers, Prada Shoes, Fendi Messenger Bag, Fendi Glasses.

fields.product_name: Fear of God for Ermenegildo Zegna - Knitted Wool Half-Placket Sweater - Men - Gray
fields.brand: Fear of God for Ermenegildo Zegna
fields.description: Part of the much-anticipated collaborative line between Fear of God and Ermenegildo Zegna, this half-placket sweater is the golden mean between a warming knit and a classic HenleySpun from wool for a fine and mid-weight handle, it's bordered by ribbed trims and finished with the capsule's logo tab at the backWear it with: Fear of God for Ermenegildo Zegna Trousers, Fear of God for Ermenegildo Zegna Jacket, Fear of God for Ermenegildo Zegna Shoes, Fear of God for Ermenegildo Zegna Belt.

fields.product_name: Folk - Junction Ribbed Cotton Sweater - Men - Neutrals
fields.description: The distinct ribbing of Folk's 'Junction' sweater runs both vertically and horizontally, giving it cool definition and textureIt's spun from cotton that's nice and breathable, but the heavy gauge provides insulation, tooThe soft beige colour will work with any tailoring or denimWear it with: Officine Generale Trousers, Converse Sneakers.

fields.product_name: Gabriela Hearst - Juan Donegal Cashmere Sweater - Men - Gray
fields.description: Gabriela Hearst's 'Juan' sweater is knitted using a traditional Irish Donegal technique that creates painterly flecks across the surfaceIt's made from plush cashmere in a relaxed profile with comfortable raglan shouldersWear it with: Lemaire Trousers, Common Projects Sneakers, Bottega Veneta Bag, FALKE Socks.

fields.product_name: Gabriela Hearst - Lawrence Cashmere Sweater - Men - Black
fields.description: Ms Gabriela Hearst's farm-to-design process begins with sourcing materials from her family's 17, 000-acre ranch in Uruguay, which cuts down on any excess impact and gives her pieces a homespun qualityKnitted in a substantial chunky gauge from cashmere, this 'Lawrence' sweater has a slouchy shape that allows for easy layeringWear it with: The Row Sweatpants, FRAME T-Shirt, Mr PSneakers.

fields.product_name: Gabriela Hearst - Juan Donegal Cashmere Sweater - Men - Green
fields.description: Gabriela Hearst's 'Juan' sweater is knitted using a traditional Irish Donegal technique that creates painterly flecks across the surfaceIt's made from plush cashmere in a relaxed profile with comfortable raglan shouldersWear it with: The Row Trousers, Prada T-shirt, Common Projects Sneakers, Bremont Watch.

fields.product_name: Gabriela Hearst - Palco Slim-Fit Virgin Wool Sweater - Men - Burgundy
fields.description: The simplicity of this 'Palco' sweater says so much about the importance of high-quality fabrics to Gabriela HearstIt's been knitted in Italy from ultra smooth burgundy virgin wool and finished with finely ribbed trims that bring definition and durabilityWear it with: Saman Amel Trousers, Officine Creative Shoes, Tod's Bracelet.

fields.product_name: Gabriela Hearst - Charlet Cashmere Rollneck Sweater - Men - Blue
fields.description: Gabriela Hearst's clothing is restrained in design, with the focus on quality craftsmanship and materialsThis 'Charlet' rollneck sweater has been spun in Italy from premium cashmere in an easy-to-style navy shade.

fields.product_name: Gabriela Hearst - Charlet Cashmere Rollneck Sweater - Men - Neutrals
fields.description: Gabriela Hearst's clothing is restrained in design, with the focus on quality craftsmanship and materialsThis 'Charlet' rollneck sweater has been spun in Italy from premium cashmere in an easy-to-style neutral ivory shade.

fields.product_name: Gabriela Hearst - Lawrence Cashmere Sweater - Men - Neutrals
fields.description: Ms Gabriela Hearst's farm-to-design process begins with sourcing materials from her family's 17, 000-acre ranch in Uruguay, which cuts down on any excess impact and gives her pieces a homespun qualityKnitted in a substantial chunky gauge from cashmere, this 'Lawrence' sweater has a slouchy shape that allows for easy layering.

fields.product_name: Gabriela Hearst - Cashmere and Silk-Blend Sweater - Men - Blue
fields.description: Ms Gabriela Hearst works with family-run mills in Italy to ensure the finest qualityThis sweater is knitted from a sumptuous cashmere and silk-blend and designed to look as though it's layered, giving it texture and a more casual, laid-back vibe.

fields.product_name: Gabriela Hearst - Lawrence Cashmere Sweater - Men - Gray
fields.description: Gabriela Hearst 's sweater is exactly what you'll want to reach for when cold weather hitsThis cosy style has been hand-knitted from Italian cashmere by artisans from Manos del Uruguay, a non-profit organisation that provides work for underprivileged womenThe slouchy, loose fit allows for extra layers underneathShown here with The Row trousers, Common Projects sneakers.

fields.product_name: Gabriela Hearst - Slim-Fit Virgin Wool Sweater - Men - Pink
fields.description: Ms Garbriela Hearst grew up on a ranch in Uruguay, and says it was that childhood that led her to focus on fabrics and craftsmanshipKnitted by hand in Italy, this crew-neck sweater is made from the softest virgin wool and framed with neatly ribbed trimsThe light shade of pink and fine handle mean it'll work with many different outfitsShown here with Gabriela Hearst trousers, Common Projects sneakers.

fields.product_name: Gabriela Hearst - Slim-Fit Virgin Wool Sweater - Men - Purple
fields.description: Ms Gabriela Hearst works with family-run mills in Italy because she knows that sometimes it takes more than one generation to create an exceptional productThis slim-fit sweater is consciously made from the finest Italian virgin woolIt's lightweight but insulating enough to keep you warm if there's a chill in the airWear it with the label's trousersShown here with Common Projects sneakers.

fields.product_name: Gabriela Hearst - MÃ©lange Cashmere Sweater - Men - Blue
fields.description: Ms Gabriela Hearst works with the best materials, craftsmen and mills she can source, it's a conscious process she likes to call 'honest luxury.' This thick sweater is knitted from soft, insulating cashmere in a regular cut enhanced by raglan shoulder seams to make it easy to layerThe flecked mÃ©lange finish ensures it will go with just about everything in your wardrobeShown here with Gabriela Hearst shirt, Gabriela Hearst suit trousers, Common Projects sneakers.

fields.product_name: Gabriela Hearst - MÃ©lange Cashmere Sweater - Men - Gray
fields.description: Ms Gabriela Hearst 's appreciation for a slower design process can be attributed to her pastoral childhood growing up on her father's ranch in Uruguay, that lifestyle allowed her to appreciate taking the time to make things with care and attention to detailHand-knitted from chunky-gauge cashmere, this 'Juan' sweater has comfy raglan sleeves and substantial ribbed trims that enhance the relaxed shapeThe flecked yarns are neutral tone, which makes it so easy to styleShown here with The Row trousers, Gabriela Hearst shirt, Common Projects sneakers.

fields.product_name: Giorgio Armani - Slim-Fit Cashmere-Blend Rollneck Sweater - Men - Blue
fields.description: Giorgio Armani's rollneck sweater is a worthy investment that you'll come back to time and againSpun from soft cashmere enriched with a touch of stretch, it's designed to fit slim through the bodyWear it alone or to underpin a smart blazerWear it with: Dries Van Noten Trousers, Brunello Cucinelli Sneakers, Oliver Peoples Sunglasses.

fields.product_name: Giorgio Armani - Cable-Knit Cashmere, Mohair and Silk-Blend Sweater - Men - Neutrals
fields.description: Giorgio Armani's sweater has an open-knit design that really highlights the chunky cablesIt's been crafted in Italy from a soft cashmere, mohair and silk-blend and is finished with substantial ribbed trims to hold its shapeWear it with: Bottega Veneta Trousers, Ãlvaro Sandals, Le Gramme Bracelet, Bottega Veneta Tote bag.

fields.product_name: Givenchy - Logo-Jacquard Wool-Blend Sweater - Men - Black
fields.description: Monochrome doesn't have to mean simple if Givenchy's sweater is anything to go byIt's knitted from an insulating wool-blend and jacquard-woven with the label's 'ChaÃ®ne' motifThe crew neck is classic and comfortableWear it with: Givenchy Trousers, Givenchy Sneakers, Givenchy Ring, Givenchy Messenger.

fields.product_name: Giorgio Armani - Slim-Fit Quilted Virgin Wool-Blend Sweater - Men - Blue
fields.description: Giorgio Armani's sweater is quilted in a zigzag pattern for both texture and warmthIt's been spun in Italy from a soft, breathable virgin wool-blend is designed to fit close, so you can layer it underneath an unstructured blazer.

fields.product_name: Givenchy - Logo-AppliquÃ©d Intarsia Wool-Blend Sweater - Men - Green
fields.description: Givenchy's intarsia sweater is decorated with meandering flowers and flocks of birds, but toughened up in a military palette of army-green and black with contrasting elbow padsIt's knitted from a substantial wool-blend and finished with the brand's emblem on the hem in soft-touch rubberWear it with: Valentino T-shirt, SAINT LAURENT Jeans, SAINT LAURENT Boots, MAPLE Ring.

fields.product_name: Givenchy - Logo-Intarsia Merino Wool Sweater - Men - Black
fields.description: Givenchy's sweater references the house's heritageIt's knitted from fine black merino wool and features an intarsia front and centre showcasing the address of the brand's Paris HQ, where it's resided since the late 1950sWear it with: Givenchy Sweatpants, Givenchy Sneakers.

fields.product_name: Givenchy - Logo-Intarsia Cotton Sweater - Men - Black
fields.description: While Ms Clare Waight Keller has made a number of changes since taking the helm at Givenchy , the brand's iconic graphic motifs and name-bearing pieces remain relativity untouchedThis sweater is intarsia-knitted from weighty wool in the label's signature black, white and red palette and has a relaxed cutShown here with Givenchy trousers, Givenchy sneakers, Givenchy pouch.

fields.product_name: Givenchy - Logo-Intarsia Cotton Sweater - Men - Multi
fields.description: Although Givenchy's iconic logo has remained relatively unchanged since the brand's inception in 1952, Creative Director Ms Clare Waight Keller tweaks it a little each season â this time it has a glitchy, buffering feelIntarsia-knitted from breathable cotton, this sweater has a comfortable fit and ribbed trims that neaten the shape.

fields.product_name: Gucci - Distressed Leopard Jacquard Sweater - Men - Brown
fields.description: Gucci's Mr Alessandro Michele is renowned for his eclecticism, celebrating and savouring each piece of clothing and every accessory in his collectionMade from pure wool, this leopard sweater is lightly distressed and carefully finished to resemble a thrifted gemWear it with: Gucci Jeans, Gucci Polo shirt, Gucci Shoes, Gucci Socks.

fields.product_name: Gucci - Striped Logo-Embroidered Cotton Sweater - Men - Neutrals
fields.description: Inspired by traditional equestrian attire, Gucci's sweater has been knitted from cotton for a thick handleThree stripes finish each sleeve in the brand's signature colours, corresponding the 'G' moniker at the chestThe crew neckline is ribbed and bound and matches the hem and cuffsWear it with: Gucci Shirt, Gucci Jeans, Gucci Shoes, Prada Socks.

fields.product_name: Anderson & Sheppard - Slim-Fit Pleated Linen Trousers - Men - Blue
fields.description: Anderson & Sheppard spent over a century on Savile Row and has such an intuitive understanding of fabrics and fitsDesigned to be as comfortable as a bespoke pair, these pleated trousers have been cut for a relaxed slim fit in Italy from mid-weight linen and feature both buckled waist tabs and unfinished hems for adjustmentsSmall to sizeSee Size & Fit notes.

fields.product_name: Anderson & Sheppard - Pleated Linen Trousers - Men - Neutrals
fields.description: Savile Row tailor Anderson & Sheppard models these trousers after traditional military styles, note the adjustable cummerbund-style waistbandCut in Italy from naturally lightweight linen, they're pleated through the front for a roomier fit and have unfinished hems to alter the break.

fields.product_name: Anderson & Sheppard - Pleated Linen Trousers - Men - Green
fields.description: Savile Row tailor Anderson & Sheppard models these trousers after traditional military styles, note the adjustable cummerbund-style waistbandCut in Italy from naturally lightweight linen, they're pleated through the front for a roomier fit and have unfinished hems to alter the break.

fields.product_name: Anderson & Sheppard - Pleated Linen Trousers - Men - Red
fields.description: Savile Row tailor Anderson & Sheppard models these trousers after traditional military styles, note the adjustable cummerbund-style waistbandCut in Italy from naturally lightweight linen, they're pleated through the front for a roomier fit and have unfinished hems to alter the break.

fields.product_name: Beams F - Linen Drawstring Trousers - Men - Green
fields.description: Beams F's pieces combine American, European and Japanese influences, placing a particular emphasis on quality fabrics and precise craftsmanshipThese straight-leg trousers are made from breathable linen in an army-green shade and finished with pressed creases for a smart appearanceWear it with: Beams F Shirt, J.MWeston Shoes, Rubinacci Bracelet, Mulberry Wallet.

fields.product_name: Beams F - Linen Drawstring Trousers - Men - Neutrals
fields.description: Beams F's pieces combine American, European and Japanese influences, placing a particular emphasis on quality fabrics and precise craftsmanshipThese straight-leg trousers are made from breathable linen in a light-beige shade and finished with pressed creases for a smart appearanceWear it with: Beams F Blazer, MAN 1924 Shirt, Ermenegildo Zegna Socks, Le Gramme Bracelet.

fields.product_name: Boglioli - Slim-Fit Linen Suit Trousers - Men - Pink
fields.description: A tailoring specialist since the '70s, Boglioli is a dab hand at relaxed suiting, as these trousers demonstrateThey're cut from breezy linen in a neat, slim-leg shape and come in a warm pink hueDon't worry about the fabric crinkling, it only adds to the casual eleganceWear it with: Saman Amel Polo shirt, Officine Creative Sandals.

fields.product_name: Blue Blue Japan - Indigo-Dyed Tapered Pleated Linen Trousers - Men - Blue

fields.product_name: Canali - Kei Slim-Fit Linen and Wool-Blend Suit Trousers - Men - Blue
fields.description: Canali's trousers follow a strict manufacturing process, whereby each piece is individually assembled before final checks by experts are conductedCut on the 'Kei' block, this pair has been made in Italy from a water-resistant linen and wool-blend that offers comfort during warmer months and provides a soft and fluid drape.

fields.product_name: Caruso - Pleated Linen and Silk-Blend Twill Suit Trousers - Men - Neutrals
fields.description: EXCLUSIVE AT MR PORTERThe cream shade of Caruso's suit trousers makes them ideal for destination weddings and al fresco celebrationsTailored from lightweight linen and silk-blend twill, they have pressed creases along the front of the straight legsWear it with the matching jacket and brown loafersWear it with: Caruso Jacket, John Lobb Shoes.

fields.product_name: Club Monaco - Grant Slim-Fit Linen Trousers - Men - Red
fields.description: Club Monaco's 'Grant' trousers are great for summertime social events and casual days at the officeCut for a slim fit from dusty brick linen, they have a lightweight, breathable handle and work just about anytime you'd otherwise reach for chinosWear it with: Mr PSweater, Converse Sneakers.

fields.product_name: Club Monaco - Grant Slim-Fit Linen Trousers - Men - Blue
fields.description: Club Monacoâs 'Grant' trousers are great for summertime social events and casual days at the office alikeCut for a slim fit from navy linen, they have a lightweight, breathable handle and work just about anytime you'd otherwise reach for jeansWear it with: Club Monaco Jacket, Mr PT-shirt, NN07 Shirt, adidas Originals Sneakers.

fields.product_name: De Petrillo - Mergellina Slim-Fit MÃ©lange Linen Suit Trousers - Men - Gray
fields.description: Named after the coastal section of Naples, De Petrillo's pleated 'Mergellina' suit trousers are meant to be worn in warm-weather locales with the matching jacketThey've been cut slim in Italy from naturally lightweight linen and have adjustable waist tabs to personalise the fit.

fields.product_name: De Petrillo - Tapered Linen Drawstring Trousers - Men - Green
fields.description: EXCLUSIVE AT MR PORTERThere are a number of things to love about linen, not least that it helps keep you cool and looks good both freshly pressed or nicely crinkledCut from the breathable cloth, De Petrillo's trousers are tailored for a neat taper through the leg and have a drawstring waistband for flexibilityWear it with: Valstar Jacket, De Petrillo Shirt, J.Crew T-shirt, Brunello Cucinelli Sneakers.

fields.product_name: De Petrillo - Tapered Pleated Herringbone Linen Trousers - Men - Brown
fields.description: EXCLUSIVE AT MR PORTERAdding herringbone to your wardrobe is a fine way to incorporate some texture into your outfitsWoven in the pattern, De Petrillo's linen trousers are cut in a tapered, mid-rise fit and pleated at the front to emphasise the carrot-like profileHave the unfinished hems taken up to your exact measurementsWear it with: De Petrillo Blazer, De Petrillo Shirt, J.MWeston Shoes.

fields.product_name: De Bonne Facture - Tapered Linen Drawstring Trousers - Men - Blue

fields.product_name: Drake's - Pleated Linen Suit Trousers - Men - Blue
fields.description: Drake's Creative Director Mr Michael Hill creates pieces that exude a sense of relaxed elegance", like these pleated suit trousersTailored in Italy from breathable navy linen, they're cut with roomy straight legs and have buttoned side tabs to adjust the fitWear it with: Drake's Sweatshirt, Drake's T-shirt, J.MWeston Loafers.

fields.product_name: Dunhill - Slim-Fit Linen Suit Trousers - Men - Blue

fields.product_name: Ermenegildo Zegna - Tapered Linen Suit Trousers - Men - Blue
fields.description: After purchasing his fatherâs looms in 1910, Mr Ermenegildo Zegna founded the family-run brand with a focus on quality fabricsThese smart trousers are tailored from breathable linen and cut for a tapered fitWear them with the matching suit jacket for warm-weather eventsWear it with: The Row Sweater, Loro Piana Sneakers.

fields.product_name: Ermenegildo Zegna - Tapered Linen Suit Trousers - Men - Neutrals
fields.description: After purchasing his fatherâs looms in 1910, Mr Ermenegildo Zegna founded the family-run brand with a focus on quality fabricsThese smart trousers are tailored from breathable linen and cut for a tapered fitWear them with the matching suit jacket for warm-weather events.

fields.product_name: Favourbrook - Kirtling Windsor Linen Trousers - Men - Blue
fields.description: Favourbrook is firmly rooted in tradition, but it's the considered tweaks that make its tailoring stand out from the restThese 'Evering Windsor' trousers are impeccably cut from breezy linen in a sky-blue hue with neatly pressed creases through the frontThe hems are left unfinished so you can alter them for the perfect break.

fields.product_name: Favourbrook - Kirtling Windsor Linen Trousers - Men - Neutrals
fields.description: Dressing smartly in warm weather needn't be a challenge, Favourbrook's relaxed tailoring will certainly make it a breezeThese 'Kirtling Windsor' trousers are made from naturally cooling linen with crisp pressed creases through the front, while the unfinished hems allow for alterations.

fields.product_name: Favourbrook - Kirtling Windsor Linen Trousers - Men - Orange
fields.description: Favourbrook says its styles are rooted in tradition but by no means constrained by it, " which is fitting when you note the vibrant hue and geometric pattern woven into these suit trousersDesigned as part of a three-piece set, this slim-fit pair is tailored from lightweight linen and has pressed creases.

fields.product_name: Frescobol Carioca - Linen and Cotton-Blend Drawstring Trousers - Men - Blue
fields.description: Frescobol Carioca's lightweight trousers are just the ticket for poolside lunches or summer days in the officeCut from a fluid blend of linen and cotton, this straight-leg pair is slightly cropped and features a drawstring waistband so you can get the fit spot on.

fields.product_name: Giuliva Heritage - Pleated Herringbone Linen Suit Trousers - Men - Blue
fields.description: EXCLUSIVE AT MR PORTERGiuliva Heritage's herringbone suit trousers are an ideal option for summer as they're cut from breathable linen that'll feel comfortable on balmy daysImmaculately tailored in Italy, they're cut straight through the leg and fitted with elegant front pleatsWear yours with the matching jacket and tasselled loafersWear it with: Giuliva Heritage Jacket, Brunello Cucinelli Loafers.

fields.product_name: Hartford - Tanker Slim-Fit Tapered Pleated Linen Drawstring Trousers - Men - Green
fields.description: Hartford's 'Tanker' trousers are just as versatile as jeans or chinos but much more comfortable to wear, thanks to the adjustable drawstring waistMade from lightweight linen, they have a tapered, slim fit and stitched pleats at the frontWear them at the weekend or for casual days in the officeWear it with: Hartford Shirt, Converse Sneakers, NN07 Socks, NN07 Tote.

fields.product_name: Hartford - Troy Slim-Fit Linen-Chambray Drawstring Trousers - Men - Green
