fields.description: Y-3's shorts are a comfortable choice for relaxing at home or running errands on your days offThey're made from breathable mÃ©lange cotton-jersey, threaded with a drawstring through the shell waistband and topped with three pockets for your essentialsWear it with: WTAPS T-shirt, adidas Originals Sneakers, MAPLE Necklace, WTAPS Backpack.

fields.product_name: Y-3 - Wide-Leg Shell-Trimmed Loopback Cotton-Jersey Drawstring Shorts - Men - Black
fields.description: All of the Y-3 pieces from the ongoing collaboration between Mr Yohji Yamamoto and adidas have a cool sportswear feelThese comfortable wide-leg shorts are made from mid-weight loopback cotton-jersey and have a shell-trimmed elasticated waistband with an adjustable drawstring.

fields.product_name: adidas Consortium - SPEZIAL Standish Shell Cargo Shorts - Men - Green
fields.description: adidas Cosortium's 'SPEZIAL' line pays tribute to European football clubs of the '80s, particularly terrace cultureThese 'Standish' shorts are made from technical shell and fitted with roomy cargo pockets for a military-inspired feelWear yours with a logo-print tee from the rangeWear it with: adidas Consortium T-shirt, adidas Originals Sneakers, StÃ¼ssy Socks, Herschel Supply Co BagSmall to sizeSee Size & Fit notes.

fields.product_name: adidas Consortium - Human Made Grosgrain-Trimmed Printed Cotton-Twill Shorts - Men - Blue
fields.description: adidas Consortium's latest collaboration with Human Made serves up plenty of vintage references, tapping into brand founder Nigo's love of classic American styleThese track-inspired shorts are made from cotton-twill and feature retro side stripes along with a heart logoWear it with: adidas Consortium T-Shirt, adidas Consortium Sneakers, adidas Originals Socks, Le Gramme Bracelet.

fields.product_name: adidas Consortium - Pharrell Williams Tie-Dyed Loopback Cotton-Jersey Drawstring Shorts - Men - Green
fields.description: Mr Pharrell Williams' latest collaboration with adidas Consortium celebrates individuality and identity, the graphic tie-dyed print on these shorts features swirling lines resembling a thumbprintThey're made from soft loopback cotton-jersey and have an elasticated drawstring waistband for comfortWear it with: Acne Studios T-shirt, adidas Originals Sneakers, Acne Studios Bucket Hat, Acne Studios Wallet.

fields.product_name: adidas Consortium - SPEZIAL Heswall Logo-AppliquÃ©d Nylon Shorts - Men - Neutrals
fields.description: adidas Consortium's latest 'SPEZIAL' drop is largely inspired by the vintage holdalls that were customised with patches by 1970s Northern Soul fansThese straight-leg 'Heswall' shorts are made from lightweight technical shell and detailed with two of the signature appliquÃ©sWear it with: adidas Consortium T-Shirt, adidas Originals Sneakers, Le Gramme Ring, Ray-Ban Sunglasses.

fields.product_name: adidas Consortium - Pharrell Williams Embroidered French Cotton-Terry Shorts - Men - Black
fields.description: Mr Pharrell Williams' fashion credentials read like those of a seasoned designer, so it's no wonder that brands like adidas Consortium are keen to borrow his know-howThese French cotton-terry shorts have a straight-leg and feature a drawstring waistband so you can adjust the fitThe minimal detailing means you can wear them in a range of outfitsWear it with: adidas Consortium Hoodie, adidas Originals T-shirt, Suicoke Sandals, adidas Originals Socks.

fields.product_name: adidas Consortium - Pharrell Williams Embroidered French Cotton-Terry Shorts - Men - Gray
fields.description: Mr Pharrell Williams' fashion credentials read like those of a seasoned designer, so it's no wonder that brands like adidas Consortium are keen to borrow his know-howThese French cotton-terry shorts have a straight-leg and feature a drawstring waistband so you can adjust the fitThe minimal detailing means you can wear them in a range of outfitsWear it with: adidas Consortium Sweatshirt, adidas Originals T-shirt, Suicoke Sandals, adidas Originals Socks.

fields.product_name: adidas Consortium - Pharrell Williams Embroidered French Cotton-Terry Shorts - Men - Orange
fields.description: Mr Pharrell Williams' fashion credentials read like those of a seasoned designer, so it's no wonder that brands like adidas Consortium are keen to borrow his know-howThese French cotton-terry shorts have a straight-leg and feature a drawstring waistband so you can adjust the fitThe minimal detailing means you can wear them in a range of outfitsWear it with: adidas Consortium T-shirt, Suicoke Sandals, adidas Originals Socks, adidas Originals Hat.

fields.product_name: adidas Originals - Wide-Leg Logo-Embroidered MÃ©lange Loopback Cotton-Jersey Shorts - Men - Gray
fields.description: adidas Originals' 'Essentials' range includes the pieces you need for training, as well as those relaxing days in-betweenThese shorts are made from cotton-jersey with a sweat-wicking looped backing and have a wide-leg profile and elasticated drawstring waistThey're embroidered with the brand's 'Trefoil' logo in contrasting threadsWear it with: adidas Originals T-Shirt, adidas Originals Sneakers, adidas Consortium Socks, Le Gramme Bracelet.

fields.product_name: adidas Originals - Logo-Print Tie-Dyed Cotton-Jersey Shorts - Men - Yellow
fields.description: Perfect for lounging or trips to the gym, adidas Originals' shorts are cut from mid-weight cotton-jersey and have an adjustable drawstring waistThey're tie-dyed with bright splashes of yellow, red and green, and printed with an AdiPRENE logo at the left leg, a reference to the brand's innovative sneaker technologyWear it with: adidas Originals T-shirt, Nudie Jeans Hoodie, adidas Originals Sneakers, Tom Wood Bracelet.

fields.product_name: adidas Originals - Adiplore Logo-AppliquÃ©d Woven Shorts - Men - Black
fields.description: adidas Originals' 'Adiplore' range is full of sporty, practical pieces inspired by the great outdoorsCut from a lightweight, recycled fabric, these roomy shorts have an elasticated drawstring waistband and secure zipped pocketsThe colourful mountain appliquÃ© features the geographical coordinates of the label's HQ in Herzogenaurach, Germany.

fields.product_name: adidas Originals - Essential Logo-Embroidered Cotton-Jersey Shorts - Men - Black
fields.description: adidas Originals' shorts will slot seamlessly into your casual wardrobe, they're perfect for wearing around the house, to the gym and everything in betweenMade from soft cotton jersey, they have an elasticated drawstring waist and are embroidered with the recognisable 'Trefoil' emblem that debuted in the '70sWear it with: adidas Originals T-shirt, adidas Originals Hoodie, adidas Originals Sneakers.

fields.product_name: adidas Originals - R.Y.V. Shell-Trimmed Loopback Cotton-Jersey Drawstring Shorts - Men - Gray
fields.description: adidas Originals' 'R.Y.V.' shorts are comfortable for lounging at home and have practical pockets that come in handy while travelling or running errands at the weekendThey're cut for a roomy fit from 'Dove Grey' loopback cotton-jersey and detailed with contrasting black shell.

fields.product_name: adidas Originals - Adiplore AppliquÃ©d Cotton-Twill Drawstring Cargo Shorts - Men - Neutrals
fields.description: adidas Originals describes its 'Adiplore' shorts in three words: utilitarian, minimalist and practicalModelled on archival outdoors styles, this pair is cut from breathable cotton-twill, set on an elasticated drawstring waistband and has a generous shape through the legsThe snap-fastening pockets are ideal for stowing essentials so you can go without a bagWear it with: adidas Originals T-shirt, adidas Originals Sneakers, Le Gramme Bracelet, adidas Originals Socks.

fields.product_name: adidas Originals - Adiplore AppliquÃ©d Cotton-Twill Drawstring Cargo Shorts - Men - Black
fields.description: adidas Originals describes its 'Adiplore' shorts in three words: utilitarian, minimalist and practicalModelled on archival outdoors styles, this pair is cut from breathable cotton-twill, set on an elasticated drawstring waistband and has a generous shape through the legsThe snap-fastening pockets are ideal for stowing essentials so you can go without a bagWear it with: adidas Originals Sweatshirt, adidas Originals T-shirt, adidas Originals Sneakers, adidas Originals Socks.

fields.product_name: Club Monaco - Maddox Cotton-Seersucker Shorts - Men - Black
fields.description: Club Monaco has several shorts in its 'Essentials' lineup, with the 9 inseam 'Maddox' style being the longestThis version is made from breathable cotton-seersucker and tailored for a neat straight-leg fitWear it with: Club Monaco Shirt, Mr PT-shirt, Mulo Shoes, Ray-Ban Sunglasses.

fields.product_name: De Petrillo - Slim-Fit Cotton-Blend Shorts - Men - White
fields.description: EXCLUSIVE AT MR PORTERThe neutral white shade of De Petrillo's shorts make them perfect for summerAs you'd expect from the Neapolitan house, they're impeccably tailored for a slim fit from a crisp cotton-blendThe cuffs are neatly turned-up for a classic finishWear it with: De Petrillo Shirt, Ãlvaro Sandals.

fields.product_name: Gucci - Wide-Leg Pleated Birdseye Wool Shorts - Men - Brown
fields.description: Gucci 's AW19 show featured a number of heritage-style pieces, like these smart wide-leg shortsMade in Italy, they're cut from wool woven in a classic birdseye pattern and have double pleats at the front which create a little extra room across the lapTuck in your shirt or polo to make the most of their shapeShown here with Gucci shirt, Gucci sneakers, Gucci ring.

fields.product_name: Beams F - Slim-Fit Cotton and Linen-Blend Twill Suit - Men - Brown
fields.description: Beams F combines European, American and Japanese influences in its impeccable tailoringCut from a dark-brown cotton and linen-blend twill, this slim-fit suit jacket has a felted undercollar, kissing buttoned cuffs and partial lining for a bit of structureThe trousers are left with unfinished hems, so you can customise the breakSmall to sizeSee Size & Fit notes.

fields.product_name: Boglioli - Blue Dover Slim-Fit Virgin Wool Suit - Men - Gray
fields.description: A finely crafted suit is a key component of a modern gent's wardrobe, and Boglioli 's version embodies generations of tailoring expertiseCut in the Brescia region of Northern Italy from pure virgin wool, this design has a slim fit that's smart but not restrictiveThe grey hue will pair well with any colour pocket square or tie in your collection.

fields.product_name: Boglioli - Blue Dover Slim-Fit Virgin Wool Suit - Men - Blue
fields.description: Midnight-blue Virgin Wool, Jacket: Notch Lapels, Non-functioning Buttoned Cuffs, Chest Welt Pocket, Two Front Welt Pockets, Double Vent, Three Internal Pockets, Fully Lined, Trousers: Belt Loops, Five Pockets, Pressed Creases, Partially Lined, Two Button Jacket, Button And Zip-fastening Trousers, 100% Virgin Wool; Lining1: 69% Acetate, 31% Cupro; Lining2: 100% Acetate, Dry Clean, Made In ItalyEsteemed Italian brand Boglioli demonstrates its aptitude for sleek tailoring with this 'Dover' suitImpeccably crafted from pure virgin wool, this slim-fit two-piece has a rich midnight-blue hue, handsomely offset by dark-brown buttonsThe notch lapels and pressed creases give it a classic look, while the unfinished trouser hems can be altered to your preferred length.

fields.product_name: Burberry - Slim-Fit Wool and Mohair-Blend Suit - Men - Black
fields.description: Burberry tends to keep things traditional when it comes to the fabrics and techniques used for its impeccable tailoringThis classic black suit is made from a fluid wool and mohair-blend that hangs nicelyThe jacket has smart notch lapels and a full lining for easy layering, while the trousers are cut slim and left with unfinished hems so you can adjust the length to your preference.

fields.product_name: Ermenegildo Zegna - Slim-Fit Trofeo Wool and Linen-Blend Suit - Men - Gray
fields.description: Ermenegildo Zegna's spent the best part of a century researching and developing fabrics and the 'Trofeo' treatment is one of its most innovative discoveries yet, not only does it give the brand's tailoring a silky feel, but it makes the designs pretty much wrinkle-resistant, tooMade from a soft wool and linen-blend, this slim-fit suit comes with a single-breasted jacket that's fitted with plenty of pockets, while the trousers are left with unfinished hems so you can customise the breakWear it with: Prada T-shirt, Brunello Cucinelli Sneakers, Ermenegildo Zegna Backpack.

fields.product_name: Ermenegildo Zegna - Slim-Fit Wool and Linen-Blend Suit - Men - Blue
fields.description: Ermenegildo Zegna's spent the best part of a century researching and developing fabrics and the 'Trofeo' treatment is one of its most innovative discoveries yet â not only does it give the brand's tailoring a silky feel, but it makes the designs pretty much wrinkle-resistant, tooMade from a soft wool and linen-blend, this slim-fit suit comes with a single-breasted jacket that's fitted with plenty of pockets, while the trousers are left with unfinished hems so you can customise the break.

fields.product_name: Ermenegildo Zegna - Navy Slim-Fit Sharkskin Wool Suit - Men - Blue
fields.description: A two-piece to travel in, Ermenegildo Zegna suit is tailored from superior sharkskin wool that disguises creases and requires little maintenance after repeated wearThe jacket is canvassed and fully lined for structure, while the trousers have unfinished hems for bespoke alterations.

fields.product_name: Ermenegildo Zegna - Navy Slim-Fit Cashmere and Silk-Blend Suit - Men - Blue
fields.description: Ermenegildo Zegna's suit is made from a cashmere and silk-blend cloth that's fluid, slightly lustrous and quite lightweightThe jacket has softly padded shoulders for some gentle structure, high notch lapels and a comfortable double ventCut in a tidy slim profile, the trousers are unhemmed so you can have them tailored to your specifications.

fields.product_name: Ermenegildo Zegna - Grey Slim-Fit Brushed Cashmere and Cotton-Blend Suit - Men - Black
fields.description: Ermenegildo Zegna's suit is cut from a rich blend of cashmere and cotton, though less structured than you might be used to, it's the perfect blend of softness and breathabilityTry it with a rollneck sweater or even more casually, a plain tee.

fields.product_name: Ermenegildo Zegna - Midnight-Blue Slim-Fit Wool-Twill Suit - Men - Blue
fields.description: Midnight-blue Wool-twill, Jacket: Notch Lapels, Felted Undercollar, Lightly Padded Shoulders, Designer Emblem, Non-functioning Buttoned Cuffs, Chest Welt Pocket, Two Front Flap Pockets, Double Vent, Four Internal Pockets, Fully Lined, Trousers: Belt Loops, Five Pockets, Notched Waistband, Pressed Creases, Unfinished Hems, Two Button Jacket, Button And Zip-fastening Trousers, 100% Wool; Jacket Lining: 100% Rayon Cupro; Trouser Lining: 100% Rayon Viscose, Dry CleanErmenegildo Zegna is fanatical about using the best raw materials, so much so that it hosts an annual awards ceremony to scout out the finest wool availableThis slim-fit suit is impeccably tailored from midnight-blue twill and has light shoulder padding to subtly broaden your frameThe jacket has plenty of internal pockets for pens and business cards, making it great for meetings and networking eventsShown here with Ermenegildo Zegna shirt, Berluti shoes, Anderson & Sheppard pocket square, Ermenegildo Zegna tie.
fields.material: fabric:100% wool / lining: 100% rayonButtons : corozo from Ecuador

fields.product_name: Ermenegildo Zegna - Slim-Fit Silk and Wool-Blend Suit - Men - Neutrals
fields.description: The pick stitching and mottled horn buttons on Ermenegildo Zegna's suit are both hallmarks of well-made tailoringCut on the 'City' block, it's made from a blend of silk and wool yarns so it has a soft, lightweight handleThe jacket has structured padded shoulders, while the trousers hems are left unfinished, so you can customise the break.

fields.product_name: Ermenegildo Zegna - Slim-Fit Wool Suit - Men - Blue
fields.description: Ermenegildo Zegna started as a humble cloth mill in the Alps and is still celebrated today for its exceptional fabricsThis suit is made from breathable wool, so it can be worn in both warmer and cooler climesThe jacket has a double vent to avoid creasing after being seated, while the trouser hems are left unfinished for a customisable breakWear it with: Ermenegildo Zegna Shirt, TOM FORD Shoes, TOM FORD Tie, TOM FORD Pocket Square.

fields.product_name: Ermenegildo Zegna - Slim-Fit Silk and Wool-Blend Suit - Men - Gray
fields.description: The pick stitching and mottled horn buttons on Ermenegildo Zegna's suit are both hallmarks of well-made tailoringCut on the 'City' block, it's made from a blend of silk and wool yarns so it has a soft, lightweight handleThe jacket has structured padded shoulders, while the trousers hems are left unfinished, so you can customise the break.

fields.product_name: Gucci - Slim-Fit Embroidered Prince of Wales Checked Wool Suit - Men - Gray
fields.description: Mr Alessandro Michele spends so much time delving into Gucci's rich archives and it shows, the bee embroidered on this two-piece suit was taken from designs that were first released by the brand back in the '70sTailored in Italy from Prince of Wales checked wool that's lined in blush satin, the blazer has neat notch lapels and horn buttons, while the trousers are cut straight and left with unfinished hems so you can personalise them to your measurements.

fields.product_name: Hugo Boss - Huge/Genius Checked Wool Suit - Men - Blue
fields.description: Whether you're after a new suit for a personal event or to refresh your workwear, you can guarantee that Hugo Boss' tailoring is up to the jobThis version of its 'Huge/Genius' two-piece is made from tonal-blue checked virgin wool and cut in sharp slim fitThe shoulders are lightly padded for structure and the trousers left unhemmed for alterationsWear it with: TOM FORD Shirt, Hugo Boss Shoes, Hugo Boss Tie, Le Gramme Bracelet.

fields.product_name: Hugo Boss - Hutson Slim-Fit Wool, Linen and Silk-Blend Suit - Men - Gray
fields.description: Hugo Boss has a reputation for tailoring impeccably cut suits, and this three-piece 'Hutson' set proves whyIt's made from a wool, linen and silk-blend that you'll find is the ideal weight for year-round wear, and includes a slim-fit blazer, waistcoat and neatly pressed trousersAll you need is one of the label's crisp white shirts to finish it offWear it with: TOM FORD Shirt, J.MWeston Shoes, TOM FORD Tie, Kingsman Pocket Square.

fields.product_name: Kingsman - Harry's Navy Super 120s Wool Suit - Men - Blue
fields.description: Navy Super 120s Wool And Cashmere-blend, Jacket: Peak Lapels, Functioning Buttoned Cuffs, Chest Welt Pocket, Two Front Flap Pockets, Double Vent, Three Internal Pockets, Fully Canvassed, Fully Lined, Trousers: Adjustable Side Tabs, Two Front Slash Pockets, Double-breasted Buttoned Jacket, Hook And Zip-fastening Trousers, 99% Wool, 1% Cashmere, Dry CleanEXCLUSIVE AT MR PORTERIn Kingsman: The Secret Service , Mr Colin Firth's on-screen spy, Mr Harry Hart, proclaimed The suit is a modern gentleman's armour, and the Kingsmen the new knightsBearing the motto in mind, this impeccable double-breasted style is the perfect uniform for any refined dresserThis handsome example is made from a navy super 120s wool, sourced from the iconic William Halstead mill, a purveyor of fine fabrics since 1875Cut in a slim fit, this two-piece exudes qualityShown here with Kingsman shirt, Kingsman shoes, Kingsman cufflinks, Kingsman pocket square, Kingsman tieThis item is small to size; see Size & Fit notes.

fields.product_name: Kingsman - Harry's Navy Pinstriped Super 120s Wool Suit - Men - Blue
fields.description: Navy And Light-grey Super 120s Wool, Jacket: Peak Lapels, Felted Undercollar, Functioning Buttoned Cuffs, Chest Welt Pocket, Two Front Flap Pockets, Double Vent, Three Internal Pockets, Fully Canvassed, Fully Lined, Trousers: Adjustable Side Tabs, Two Front Slash Pockets, Back Buttoned Welt Pocket, Partially Lined, Double-breasted Buttoned Jacket, Hook And Zip-fastening Trousers, 100% Wool; Lining: 100% Cupro, Dry CleanEXCLUSIVE AT MR PORTERThis double-breasted Kingsman suit has been made using all the tailoring expertise you'd expect from a made-to-measure designThe jacket is fully canvassed and the armholes are cut high for a sharp silhouetteBroad peak lapels and a slightly shortened length create the most flattering fitA slim and straight trouser profile and pinstripes elongate the legs, while the selvedge trim on the inside of the pockets demonstrates impeccable attention to detailThe luxurious wool cloth is sourced from the UK-based William Halstead millShown here with Kingsman shirt, Kingsman shoes, Kingsman pocket square, Kingsman tie, Kingsman cufflinksThis item is small to size; see Size & Fit notes.

fields.product_name: Maison Margiela - Black Wool Suit - Men - Black
fields.description: You're unlikely to ever look dishevelled in Maison Margiela's suit, the blazer's collar and notch lapels are sewn into place to keep them at a crisp foldThis two-piece set has been tailored in Italy from black wool and minimally detailed with no more than the brand's signature four white stitchesWear it with: SAINT LAURENT Rollneck, Balenciaga Loafers, Maison Margiela Tote Bag, Luis Morais Bracelet.

fields.product_name: Paul Smith - Grey A Suit To Travel In Soho Slim-Fit Wool Suit - Men - Black
fields.description: Sir Paul Smith tested his 'A Suit To Travel In' collection by enlisting gymnasts and free runners to prove the design's flexibility and durabilityThis black two-piece is made from high-twist worsted wool that has natural bounce and recovery, making it resistant to creasesThe jacket is cut in the brand's signature 'Soho' fit which leaves room through the chest and is tailored through the waist and hem, while the trousers are straightTrust it to still look sharp after a flight or taxi to your next appointmentShown here with Emma Willis shirt, Church's shoes, Paul Smith pocket square, Drake's tie.

fields.product_name: Paul Smith - Grey A Suit To Travel In Soho Slim-Fit Wool Suit - Men - Blue
fields.description: Navy Wool, Jacket: Notch Lapels, Felted Undercollar, Lightly Padded Shoulders, Non-functioning Buttoned Cuffs, Chest Welt Pocket, Two Front Flap Pockets, Double Vent, Two Internal Pockets, Fully Lined, Trousers: Belt Loops, Four Pockets, Pressed Creases, Partially Lined, Two Button Jacket, Hook, Button And Zip-fastening Trousers, 100% Wool; Lining: 100% Viscose, Dry Clean, Made In ItalyIn 2015, Paul Smith proved the crease-resistant properties of its 'A Suit to Travel In' by allowing the Olympic gymnast to perform his medal-winning moves while wearing oneMade from high-twist wool yarns, this slim-fit style will spring back into shape no matter the stress you put it under, whether that be long-haul plane rides or dashing between meetings in the back of a cabWe consider it the business traveller's secret weapon.Shown here with Burberry Shirt, Officine Creative Shoes, Brioni Tie and a Paul Smith Shoes & Accessories Pocket square.

fields.product_name: Paul Smith - Grey A Suit To Travel In Soho Slim-Fit Wool Suit - Men - Gray
fields.description: Charcoal Wool, Jacket: Notch Lapels, Felted Undercollar, Lightly Padded Shoulders, Non-functioning Buttoned Cuffs, Chest Welt Pocket, Two Front Flap Pockets, Double Vent, Two Internal Pockets, Fully Lined, Trousers: Belt Loops, Four Pockets, Pressed Creases, Partially Lined, Two Button Jacket, Hook, Button And Zip-fastening Trousers, 100% Wool; Lining: 100% Viscose, Dry Clean, Made In ItalyMr Paul Smith has revolutionised tailoring with his incredibly wearable 'A Suit To Travel In'Crafted in Italy from charcoal wool, it is cut in the label's popular 'Soho' block for a slim fit that doesn't feel restrictiveTreated to be remarkably crease-resistant it will help you maintain a polished look, even after long-haul flightsShown here with Canali shirt, Church's shoes, Drake's pocket square, Kingsman tie.

fields.product_name: Sid Mashburn - Cotton-Poplin Suit - Men - Neutrals
fields.description: Sid Mashburn designed this suit to be dressed-up, but not fussed-up", so feel free to skip the tie and team it with low-top sneakersTailored in Italy from lightweight cotton-poplin, it features a three-roll-two jacket with slub-effect notch lapels and straight-leg trousers that have unfinished hems to customise the break.

fields.product_name: Sid Mashburn - Grey-Green Kincaid No 3 Wool Suit - Men - Green
fields.description: Sid Mashburn's grey-green suit is a smart way to stand out in a sea of navy and blackIt's tailored for a slim fit from high-twist wool that's breathable and naturally wrinkle-resistant, and has a three-layer canvassed construction that creates comfortable structure through the bodyThis item is small to sizeSee Size & Fit notes.

fields.product_name: Sid Mashburn - Kincaid No. 3 Slim-Fit Stretch-Cotton Seersucker Suit - Men - Blue
fields.description: Sid Mashburn's 'Kincaid' suit jacket is tailored with the brand's special three-layer canvassing for structure and to create a custom fit over timeIt's cut slim from Italian cotton-seersucker that has a little stretch, and comes with matching trousers you can alter to your preferred breakWear it with: Loro Piana Shirt, J.MWeston Shoes, Loro Piana Belt, Le Gramme BraceletSmall to sizeSee Size & Fit notes.

fields.product_name: Kingsman - Oxford Slim-Fit Prince of Wales Checked Wool Waistcoat - Men - Brown
fields.description: EXCLUSIVE AT MR PORTERKingsman's waistcoat is woven with a classic Prince of Wales check, a nod to British heritage stylesInspired the Duke of Oxford's attire in The King's Man , it's tailored from mid-weight wool and has a smooth satin lining/The neat pointed hem sits just over the waistband of the matching trousersWear it with: Kingsman Suit trousers, Kingsman Cardigan, Kingsman Shirt, Kingsman Boots, Kingsman Tie.

fields.product_name: Paul Smith - Soho Slim-Fit Wool Suit Trousers - Men - Gray
fields.description: Paul Smith's dark-grey 'Soho' trousers will provide a nice reprieve from standard black and work with so many different suit-and-tie combinationsThey've been tailored in Italy from pure wool for a slim fit and left with unfinished hems that can be altered to your exact specificationsWear it with: Paul Smith Jacket, Emma Willis Shirt, Paul Smith Shoes, Kingsman Tie.

fields.product_name: A.P.C. - Slim-Fit Virgin Wool-Flannel Suit Trousers - Men - Blue
fields.description: Quality classics are A.P.C.'s domainThese trousers are tailored from Italian flannel that's spun from virgin wool, making them more resistant to stains and wrinkles than traditional textilesPressed creases emphasise the slim cutWear it with: A.P.CPolo shirt, Velva Sheen T-shirt, AMI Sneakers.

fields.product_name: Alexander McQueen - Slim-Fit Wool-Jacquard Suit Trousers - Men - Black
fields.description: When they catch the right light, you'll notice Alexander McQueen's trousers are woven with a motif of Scottish thistle across their surface, an homage to the roots of the founderThey have been tailored in Italy from wool-jacquard with concealed fastenings and pressed with sharp creasesWear it with: Alexander McQueen Jacket, Alexander McQueen Shirt, Alexander McQueen Shoes.

fields.product_name: Alexander McQueen - Navy Slim-Fit Wool and Mohair-Blend Suit Trousers - Men - Blue
fields.description: Alexander McQueen's suit trousers are a wise investment, whether you wear them solo or with the matching jacketTailored slim in Italy from a lightweight wool and mohair-blend, they have neat pressed creases and unfinished hems to customise the break.

fields.product_name: Alexander McQueen - Navy Slim-Fit Silk-Satin Jacquard-Trimmed Wool and Mohair-Blend Suit Jacket - Men - Blue
fields.description: From the razor-sharp cuts to the delicate floral motif jacquard-woven onto the silk-satin lapels, this suit jacket showcases Alexander McQueen's tailoring expertiseIt's been cut slim in Italy from a mid-weight wool and mohair-blend and has lightly padded shoulders for structureWear it with the matching trousers.

fields.product_name: Alexander McQueen - Slim-Fit Floral-Print Silk and Wool-Blend Suit Trousers - Men - Neutrals
fields.description: It's hardly a surprise that the flowers printed on Alexander McQueen's trousers are so artistic â the brand has long championed natural motifs and interprets them in imaginative ways every seasonDesigned to be paired with the matching jacket, these wool and silk-blend trousers have a good drape and tidy slim fitHave the unfinished hems taken up to your exact measurementsWear it with: Alexander McQueen Jacket, Alexander McQueen Shirt, Alexander McQueen Sneakers, Alexander McQueen Bracelet.

fields.product_name: Alexander McQueen - Slim-Fit Wool and Mohair-Blend Trousers - Men - Blue
fields.description: With the brand's roots in tailoring, it's no surprise that the shape of Alexander McQueen's trousers is spot onThey're made from a fluid blend of wool and mohair, which hangs neatly and won't crinkle too easilyThe hems are unfinished, so you can personalise the length according to the shoes you're most likely to wear with themWear it with: Alexander McQueen Shirt, Alexander McQueen Boots.

fields.product_name: Kingsman - Arthur Harrison Slim-Fit Wool Suit Trousers - Men - Blue
fields.description: EXCLUSIVE AT MR PORTERDesigned to be worn with the matching jacket, Kingsman's suit trousers are made from mid-weight navy wool sourced from Yorkshire-based mill Arthur HarrisonThey're fitted with buckled side adjusters so you can forgo a belt, and the hems are left unfinished for easy alterationsWear it with: Kingsman Jacket, Kingsman Shirt, Kingsman Shoes, Kingsman Tie.

fields.product_name: Kingsman - Conrad Slim-Fit Herringbone Wool Suit Trousers - Men - Gray
fields.description: EXCLUSIVE AT MR PORTERKingsman's suit trousers are named after the impeccably dressed agent Conrad in the latest prequel to the film franchise, The King's Man , set during WWIRecalling early 1900s styles, they have been tailored in Italy from William Halstead British wool and adjust with buckled waist tabsWear it with: Kingsman Suit jacket, Kingsman Shirt.

fields.product_name: Kingsman - Oxford Slim-Fit Prince of Wales Checked Wool Waistcoat - Men - Green
fields.description: EXCLUSIVE AT MR PORTERThe Kingsman films continually reference Britain's sartorial heritage, so it's only right that this collection does, tooInspired the Duke of Oxford's attire in The King's Man , this tweed waistcoat comes in earthy tones and has a rugged textureThe classic satin back features an adjustable strap so you can perfect the fitWear it with: Kingsman Suit trousers, Kingsman Shirt, Kingsman Boots, Kingsman Tie.

fields.product_name: Kingsman - Conrad Slim-Fit MÃ©lange Wool Suit Trousers - Men - Blue
fields.description: EXCLUSIVE AT MR PORTERWith its agency hidden in a Savile Row tailors, Kingsman has exacting standards when it comes to suitingThese trousers are the same as those worn by agent Conrad in the latest film, The King's Man , set in the early 1900sThey're cut from mÃ©lange wool with adjustable waist tabs and sharply pressed creasesWear it with: Kingsman Jacket, Kingsman Waistcoat, Kingsman Shirt, Kingsman Boots, Kingsman Tie, TOM FORD Pocket square.

fields.product_name: Kingsman - Conrad Slim-Fit MÃ©lange Wool and Satin Waistcoat - Men - Blue
fields.description: EXCLUSIVE AT MR PORTERKingsman's latest film makes a highly convincing case for the dapper sartorialism circa the early 1900sA replica of a style worn by agent Conrad, this waistcoat is part of a three-piece suit, panelled from mÃ©lange wool with a satin backWear it with: Kingsman Jacket, Kingsman Trousers, Kingsman Shirt, Kingsman Boots, Kingsman Tie, TOM FORD Pocket square.

fields.product_name: Kiton - Grey Slim-Fit Micro-Puppytooth Cashmere, Linen and Silk-Blend Suit Trousers - Men - Gray
fields.description: Kiton combines the exceptional design skills of high-end brands with bespoke tailoring know-how, which is why its suiting is some of the most admired in the worldMade by hand in its Naples workshop (including the spinning of the fabric) from a cashmere, linen and silk-blend, these slim micro-puppytooth trousers have such a soft handleThey're partially lined at the knees and are unhemmed so you can get the length adapted.

fields.product_name: Kiton - Slim-Fit Puppytooth Cashmere Suit Trousers - Men - Blue
fields.description: Kiton is deeply rooted in Naples â not only does it draw on the region's signature soft tailoring, but almost every artisan employed in its workshop is a localThese puppytooth cashmere trousers are cut slim from the label's custom, mid-weight cashmere and left unhemmed, so you can have them altered.

fields.product_name: Kiton - Slim-Fit Puppytooth Cashmere, Virgin Wool, Silk and Linen-Blend Suit Trousers - Men - Multi
fields.description: It takes 25 hours to make one of Kiton's suits, and that's not including the spinning of the fabric, which the brand does itselfTailored entirely by hand in a slim silhouette, these cashmere, virgin wool, silk and linen-blend trousers have such a soft and fluid drape to themThey're finished with marble-effect buttons and left unhemmed so you can perfect the lengthWear them with the matching jacket.

fields.product_name: Lardini - Slim-Fit Cotton and Silk-Blend Suit Trousers - Men - Green
fields.description: EXCLUSIVE AT MR PORTERThe construction of Lardini's trousers is informed by the traditional crafting techniques used in Italy's Le Marche regionCut from a cotton and silk-blend, they have a slim profile detailed with crisp pressed creases and unfinished hemsWear yours with the matching suit jacket and a light shirtWear it with: Lardini Jacket.

fields.product_name: Lardini - Slim-Fit Cotton and Silk-Blend Suit Trousers - Men - Brown
fields.description: EXCLUSIVE AT MR PORTEROur 'Italian Artisans' edit is inspired by the kind of things guys wear on the Amalfi coast, Milanese streets and banks of Lake Como, so naturally there's plenty of relaxed tailoring in the mixThese cotton and silk-blend trousers have a neat slim fit and unfinished hems, so you can customise the breakWear them as a suit with the matching blazer.

fields.product_name: Lardini - Slim-Fit Cotton-Blend Corduroy Suit Trousers - Men - Black
fields.description: Lardini's garments capture the timelessness and ease of Italian style, the brand is inspired by the seaside town of Ancona, where it's headquarteredThese black suit trousers are cut slim from soft cotton-blend corduroy and have unfinished hems to customise the breakWear it with: Lardini Jacket, Dries Van Noten Sweater, J.MWeston Shoes, Dries Van Noten Necklace.

fields.product_name: Lardini - Slim-Fit Pleated Cotton-Blend Poplin Suit Trousers - Men - Brown
fields.description: EXCLUSIVE AT MR PORTERDesigned to be worn with the matching blazer, Lardini's suit trousers are made from cotton-blend poplin that's light enough to wear all-year roundTailored for a neat slim fit, they have stitched pleats along the front and taper slightly at the anklesThe unfinished hems mean you can customise the break over your favourite shoes.

fields.product_name: MP Massimo Piombo - Slim-Fit Pleated Stretch-Cotton Twill Suit Trousers - Men - Brown
fields.description: MP Massimo Piombo designs suiting that exudes a relaxed sense of eleganceThese trousers are made from cotton-twill that's woven with a hint of stretch to make them more flexible, and pleated at the front for added shapeWear them with the matching jacketLarge to sizeSee Size & Fit notes.

fields.product_name: Maximilian Mogg - Slim-Fit Cotton-Seersucker Suit Trousers - Men - Black
fields.description: Maximilian Mogg is passionate about classic tailoringDesigned to be worn with the matching jacket, these suit trousers are cut for a slim fit from mid-weight cotton-seersucker and have side adjusters, so you can skip the beltThe unfinished hems allow for a custom break.

fields.product_name: Nanushka - Ron Slim-Fit Belted Checked Seersucker Suit Trousers - Men - Green
fields.description: Nanushka's latest offering features a number of separates that can be mixed and matched with other pieces in the collectionThese 'Ron' trousers are cut from checked seersucker in a slim, dropped-seat profile with a sporty drawstring waistbandPair yours with the matching jacket for a relaxed take on suitingWear it with: Nanushka Shirt, NN07 T-Shirt, Yuketen Sandals, WANT LES ESSENTIELS Tote.

fields.product_name: Paul Smith - Soho Slim-Fit Wool and Cashmere-Blend Suit Trousers - Men - Blue
fields.description: Paul Smith's 'Soho' suit trousers are tailored from a wool and cashmere-blend that's breathable enough to transition through seasons, so you can wear them year-roundLined for comfort, this pair has pressed creases and unfinished hemsWear it with: Paul Smith Shirt, Paul Smith Jacket, J.MWeston Shoes, IWC SCHAFFHAUSEN Watch.

fields.product_name: Gucci - Logo-Print Loopback Cotton-Jersey Hoodie - Men - Black
fields.description: The inspiration for Gucci's ever-popular logo hoodies actually comes from '80s-era bootleg versionsCut from loopback cotton-jersey in the house's Italian atelier, this one is printed with the brand's moniker, the iconic horsebit motif and the word 'Boutique'.

fields.product_name: Gucci - Oversized Webbing-Trimmed Loopback Cotton-Jersey Hoodie - Men - Neutrals
fields.description: This oversized hoodie is cut from loopback cotton-jersey and trimmed with logo-jacquard stripes along each arm, which instantly distinguish it as a Gucci designWear it with sweatpants, shorts or a pair of well-washed jeansWear it with: Balenciaga Trousers, Gucci Shoes, Gucci Socks, Gucci Sunglasses.

fields.product_name: Gucci - Oversized Webbing-Trimmed Loopback Cotton-Jersey Hoodie - Men - Gray
fields.description: This oversized hoodie is cut from loopback cotton-jersey and trimmed with logo-jacquard stripes along each arm, which instantly distinguish it as a Gucci designWear it with sweatpants, shorts or a pair of well-washed jeansWear it with: Gucci Shorts, Gucci Shoes, Gucci Bucket hat, Gucci Sunglasses.

fields.product_name: Gucci - Oversized Logo-Print MÃ©lange Loopback Cotton-Jersey Hoodie - Men - Gray
fields.description: Gucci's logo designs are consistently inconsistent from one season to the next so you'll always get an original pieceThe version on this mÃ©lange cotton-jersey hoodie places the brand's emblem around a disc and threads the interlocking GG betweenThe oversized fit gives it a relaxed, slouchy appearanceWear it with: Gucci T-shirt, Gucci Shorts, Gucci Sneakers, Gucci Socks.

fields.product_name: Gucci - Oversized Printed Loopback Cotton-Jersey Hoodie - Men - Green
fields.description: Fashion is a mask, " Mr Alessandro Michele said of Gucci's AW19 collection, as this hoodie quite literally representsDesigned for a generous fit, it's made from loopback cotton-jersey and features a cat-eared disguise at the front, complete with spiked whiskersIt's also printed with "the mask as a cut between the visible and the invisible" at the back, a further interpretation of the designer's thoughtsShown here with Prada trousers, Gucci shirt, Gucci sneakers, Gucci ring.

fields.product_name: Gucci - Logo-Print MÃ©lange Loopback Cotton-Jersey Hoodie - Men - Gray
fields.description: Gucciâs hoodie is printed with a large vertical logo running down the sideMade from mid-weight mÃ©lange loopback cotton-jersey, itâs cut for a relaxed fit with dropped shoulders and a roomy drawstring hood.

fields.product_name: Gucci - Oversized Logo-Print Loopback Cotton-Jersey Hoodie - Men - Gray
fields.description: Kitsch Hawaiian-inspired imagery is a key theme throughout Gucci's AW20 pre-collectionThe vibrant motif on this loopback cotton-jersey hoodie feels wholly '80s, so it'll look cool with blue denim or sweatpantsWear it with: Gucci Shorts, Gucci Sneakers, MAPLE Ring, Gucci Socks.

fields.product_name: Gucci - Striped Cotton-Blend Chenille Hoodie - Men - Black
fields.description: Taking cues from '90s tracksuits, this Gucci hoodie is made from incredibly soft cotton-blend chenille and fully lined for added warmthIt's decorated with the brand's signature red and green stripes and embroidered with the logo at the left-hand cuff.

fields.product_name: Gucci - Disney Webbing-Trimmed Printed Loopback Cotton-Jersey Hoodie - Men - Neutrals
fields.description: Between 1928 and 1933, Disney and Gucci catapulted themselves into recognition thanks to the creation of two motifs, one was Mickey Mouse, the other, a monogram stylised from mirrored GGs, and both feature on this cotton-jersey hoodie (with Minnie in tow)It's bound to be a hot commodity among collectors so don't leave it in your basket for too long.

fields.product_name: Gucci - Logo-AppliquÃ©d Cotton-Jersey Zip-Up Hoodie - Men - Multi
fields.description: The 'Game' logo on Gucci's hoodie is inspired by the design of old-school sports kitIt's been made in Italy from chevron colour-block cotton-jersey and has a soft fleece backingSkip the sweats and wear yours with pressed trousersShown here with Gucci trousers, Sies Marjan T-shirt, Gucci sneakers.

fields.product_name: Gucci - Logo-Jacquard Wool and Cashmere-Blend Zip-Up Hoodie - Men - Blue
fields.description: Gucci's zip-up hoodie is spun from a wool and cashmere-blend that's equally warm and soft, and jacquard-knitted with the brand's red-on-navy 'GG' emblemIt's threaded with a white drawstring through the hood that matches the contrast piping.

fields.product_name: Gucci - Printed Loopback Cotton-Jersey Hoodie - Men - Neutrals
fields.description: Considering how quickly Gucci 's logo T-shirt usually sells out, we imagine this matching hoodie won't be hanging around for longIt's been made in Italy from loopback cotton-jersey that's breathable but will do a good job of keeping you warm, tooWear yours at the weekend with everything from tailored trousers to distressed jeansShown here with Gucci jacket, Gucci trousers, Gucci loafers.

fields.product_name: Gucci - The Face Oversized Logo-Print MÃ©lange Loopback Cotton-Jersey Hoodie - Men - Gray
fields.description: It's fitting that Gucci 's Mr Alessandro Michele is collaborating with The Face to celebrate its highly anticipated revival, he read the cult British magazine religiously during the '90sPrinted with the logo, this oversized hoodie has been made in Italy from mid-weight loopback cotton-jersey and has an embroidered designer emblem at the sleeveShown here with Gucci jeans, Gucci shoes, Gucci socks.

fields.product_name: Gucci - Webbing-Trimmed Tech-Jersey Zip-Up Hoodie - Men - Red
fields.description: Mr Alessandro Michele always includes tracksuits in Gucci 's collections, and he's dipped into the house's archives to give this hoodie an authentic '80s feelIt's made from red tech-jersey and trimmed with webbing stripes woven with the brand's iconic 'GG' motifShown here with Gucci shorts, Gucci T-shirt, Gucci sneakers.

fields.product_name: Gucci - AppliquÃ©d Logo-Print Loopback Cotton-Jersey Hoodie - Men - Pink
fields.description: Multicoloured Loopback Cotton-jersey, Drawstring Hood, Multicoloured AppliquÃ©s, Ribbed Trims, 100% Cotton, Made In ItalyGucci 's loopback cotton-jersey hoodie has been made in Italy with not just one, but three distinct brand signatures: two logos and an intricately embroidered dragon appliquÃ© along the shoulderIt's cut for a loose fit and is slightly long in the sleeves, so it feels particularly relaxed and comfyShown here with Gucci trousers, Gucci sneakers.

fields.product_name: Gucci - Logo-Embroidered Loopback Cotton-Jersey Hoodie - Men - Black
fields.description: The preppy tennis racket emblem on Gucci 's hoodie is Mr Alessandro Michele's latest archival revivalThis relaxed style is cut from loopback cotton-jersey and also emblazoned with the label's moniker and interlocking 'GG'sTeam it with the house's logo-jacquard trousersShown here with Gucci T-shirt, Gucci sneakers.

fields.product_name: Gucci - Embroidered Loopback Cotton-Jersey Hoodie - Men - Black
fields.description: Mr Alessandro Michele cherry-picked a line by Mr William Wordsworth for this hoodie, which reads And then my heart with pleasure fills and dances with daffodils", and surrounds Gucci 's snake and crystal-decked skull from the SS19 collectionTalk about an aesthetic clashIt's been made in Italy from loopback cotton-jersey and cut in a loose fitShown here with Gucci sweatpants, Gucci sneakers.

fields.product_name: Gucci - Logo-Print Loopback Cotton-Jersey Hoodie - Men - Blue
fields.description: Gucci 's hoodie is faded and treated for a mottled, sun-bleached finishCut from soft loopback cotton-jersey, it's cut in a comfortably loose shape and printed with a washed-out archival 'GG' logo across the frontShown here with Prada trousers, Gucci shoes.

fields.product_name: Gucci - Printed Loopback Cotton-Jersey Hoodie - Men - Black
fields.description: The cartoonish lamb that graces Gucci's hoodie is a recurring motif throughout the house's AW19 collectionThis style is cut from loopback cotton-jersey in a roomy fit and printed with a sizable logo, the signature 'GG' insignia also details the animal's back legShown here with Gucci trousers, Gucci sneakers.

fields.product_name: Gucci - Oversized Logo-AppliquÃ©d Cotton-Blend Velvet Half-Zip Track Jacket - Men - Brown
fields.description: Mr Alessandro Michele packs each Gucci collection with so many eclectic references, but old-school sportswear is one of his favouritesCut from cotton-blend velvet, this track jacket is inspired by styles from the '80sIt's appliquÃ©d with a retro emblem and has a pair of front pockets.
fields.material: 85% Cotton /  / 15% Polyamide / Embroidery: 100% Polyester / Lining: 100% Silk

fields.product_name: Hugo Boss - Stretch-Cotton Jersey Zip-Up Hoodie - Men - Gray
fields.description: Hugo Boss' hoodie is perfect for relaxing at home in or wearing out to grab coffee, team it with a plain tee and sweatpantsIt's cut from grey mÃ©lange cotton-jersey blended with a little flexible stretch, and has comfortable raglan sleevesWear it with: J.Crew T-shirt, Sunspel Sweatpants, Converse Sneakers, Le Gramme Bracelet.

fields.product_name: Hugo Boss - Stretch-Cotton Jersey Zip-Up Hoodie - Men - Blue
fields.description: Hugo Boss ' zip-up hoodie is a comfy option for when you're headed out to brunch or coffeeIt's made from soft stretch-cotton jersey and has raglan sleeves for a little extra room across the shoulders â just what you need to ensure smooth layering, tooShown here with Hugo Boss sweatpants, Hugo Boss T-shirt.

fields.product_name: Isabel Marant - Miley Logo-Flocked MÃ©lange Fleece-Back Cotton-Blend Jersey Hoodie - Men - Gray
fields.description: Everything about Isabel Marant's light-grey mÃ©lange 'Miley' hoodie is sized up a bit, from the relaxed fit to the flocked logo and the wide drawstringsIt's cut from fleece-back cotton-blend jersey that's soft and insulatingWear it with: SÃ©fr Jeans, Converse Sneakers, Isabel Marant Belt, Isabel Marant Necklace.

fields.product_name: James Perse - Tie-Dyed Loopback Supima Cotton-Jersey Zip-Up Hoodie - Men - Blue
fields.description: EXCLUSIVE AT MR PORTERJames Perse is known for its high quality basics, like this zip-up hoodieCrafted from soft loopback Supima cotton-jersey, it's expertly tie-dyed and comfortable enough to wear for both crisp mornings at the beach and cool evenings by the bonfire.

fields.product_name: James Perse - Supima Cotton-Jersey Hoodie - Men - Gray
fields.description: Charcoal Loopback Supima Cotton-jersey, Drawstring Hood, Front Pouch Pockets, Zip Fastening, 100% Supima Cotton, Machine WashJames Perse is renowned for the superior quality of its casual basicsThis zip-up hoodie is cut from lightweight Supima cotton-jersey that's washed for softness, so it'll feel like an old favourite from the first wearShown here with James Perse T-shirt, Nudie Jeans jeans, Common Projects sneakers, Miansai bracelet.

fields.product_name: James Perse - Supima Cotton-Jersey Hoodie - Men - Blue
fields.description: Storm-blue Loopback Slub Supima Cotton-jersey, Drawstring Hood, Front Pouch Pockets, Zip Fastening, 100% Supima Cotton, Machine Wash, Designer Colour: DeepIn 1991, Mr James Perse was so fanatical about baseball caps that when he designed his own line, they were quickly snapped up by local LA record labels and film crewsJudging by the washed storm-blue colour, slubbed finish and sheer quality of this soft loopback Supima cotton-jersey hoodie, it's safe to say the designer has perfected another bit of essential casual wearKeep it simple with a white tee and dark jeansShown here with A.P.Cjeans, A.P.CT-Shirt, Converse sneakers.

fields.product_name: James Perse - Supima Cotton-Jersey Hoodie - Men - Black
fields.description: Black Supima Cotton-jersey, Drawstring Hood, Front Pouch Pockets, Zip Fastening, 100% Supima Cotton, Machine WashEmbody James Perse 's effortless California cool in this comfortable Supima cotton-jersey hoodieLightweight and ideal for layering, it's a great pick in any weatherSlip yours on over a crew neck after the gym or under a bomber jacket on weekendsShown here with James Perse T-shirt, Officine Generale trousers, Converse sneakers, Paul Smith bracelet.

fields.product_name: JW Anderson - Colour-Block Fleece-Back Cotton-Jersey Hoodie - Men - Green

fields.product_name: John Elliott - Beach Tie-Dyed Loopback Cotton-Jersey Hoodie - Men - Yellow
fields.description: John Elliott uses a new 'Marble Mix' process to give some of its most popular designs, like this 'Beach' hoodie, a cool tie-dyed effectCrafted from start to finish in Kojima, Japan, it's cut from loopback cotton-jersey, carefully folded and then dipped into various colours to create the unique 'Smarties' finishWear it with: WTAPS Trousers, John Elliott T-shirt, Vans Sneakers, WTAPS Cardholder.

fields.product_name: John Elliott - Beach Tie-Dyed Loopback Cotton-Jersey Hoodie - Men - Multi
fields.description: John Elliott uses a new 'Marble Mix' process to give some of its most popular designs, like this this 'Beach' hoodie, a cool tie-dyed effectCrafted from start to finish in Kojima, Japan, it's cut from loopback cotton-jersey, carefully folded and then dipped into various colours to create the unique 'Shasta' finishWear it with: John Elliott Jeans, John Elliott T-shirt, Nike Sneakers, MASTERMIND WORLD Keyring.

fields.product_name: John Elliott - Villain Slim-Fit Loopback Cotton-Jersey Hoodie - Men - Gray
fields.description: Grey MÃ©lange Loopback Cotton-blend Jersey, Zipped Sides, Ribbed Trims, Internal Pouch Pocket, 75% Cotton, 25% Polyester; Trim: 48% Cotton, 48% Polyester, 4% Polyurethane, Machine WashA grey hoodie is such a useful item to own, whether you chuck it on at the weekend or use as a building block for streetwear-inspired outfitsJohn Elliott 's 'Villain' style has a stepped hem and chunky black zips at the sidesIt's made from cotton-jersey with a soft looped backing and cut fairly slim so it's good for layeringShown here with John Elliott sweatpants, Acne Studios T-shirt, John Elliott jacket, Nike sneakers.

fields.product_name: John Elliott - Villain Slim-Fit Loopback Cotton-Jersey Hoodie - Men - Black
fields.description: Mr John Elliott is vigilant during the production process, he repeatedly goes over every single detail and re-creates samples until they're perfect, resulting in cool, impeccably made piecesThis 'Villain' hoodie is cut from substantial loopback cotton-jersey and has silver-tone side zips that conceal an interior pouch pocketWear it with: Some Ware T-shirt, Acne Studios Jeans, Common Projects Sneakers, Martine Ali Necklace.

fields.product_name: Moncler - Grosgrain-Trimmed Loopback Cotton-Jersey and Shell Zip-Up Hoodie - Men - Red
fields.description: Moncler's sporty loopback cotton-jersey hoodie features a drawstring shell hood and two-way zip fasteningCoordinate the logo-woven grosgrain trims to the matching track pants.

fields.product_name: Moncler Genius - Undefeated 2 Moncler 1952 Logo-Print Fleece-Back Cotton-Jersey Hoodie - Men - Black

fields.product_name: Moncler Genius - Awake NY 2 Moncler 1952 Logo-Print Loopback Cotton-Jersey Hoodie - Men - Gray
fields.description: Moncler Genius partners with different brands every season to come up with something fresh, and for SS20, it's joined forces with Awake NYThis soft fleece-back cotton-jersey hoodie is printed with both brands' emblems and has moulded drawstring tips bearing the label's signature colour palette.

fields.product_name: Moncler Genius - 7 Moncler Fragment Logo-Embroidered Printed Cotton-Jersey Hoodie - Men - Black
fields.description: The fourth drop of the Moncler Genius and fragment collaboration shows just how well both labels create cool brandingMade in Italy from cotton-jersey, this sweatshirt is embroidered with serif monikers at the chest, printed with serial numbers at the sleeve and features their logos on the drawstring ties and pouch pocket.

fields.product_name: Moncler Genius - Awake NY 2 Moncler 1952 Logo-Print Loopback Cotton-Jersey Hoodie - Men - Black

fields.product_name: Moncler Genius - 5 Moncler Craig Green Logo-Print Cotton-Jersey Hoodie - Men - Green

fields.product_name: Moncler Genius - 5 Moncler Craig Green Shell-Panelled Jersey Hoodie - Men - Yellow

fields.product_name: Neighborhood - Mr Cartoon Printed Loopback Cotton-Jersey Hoodie - Men - Black

fields.product_name: Neighborhood - Mr Cartoon Printed Loopback Cotton-Jersey Hoodie - Men - Blue
fields.description: Neighborhood's latest collaboration with Mr Cartoon is titled 'Uncle Toons Mart' after one of the tattoo artist's most famous charactersCut from loopback cotton-jersey, this hoodie is printed with a white-on-black storefront graphicItâs fitted with a roomy pouch pocket for your phone and threaded with a drawstring through the hoodWear it with: Neighborhood T-shirt, WTAPS Sweatpants, Nike Sneakers.

fields.product_name: Nike - MÃ©lange Fleece-Back Cotton-Blend Jersey Hoodie - Men - Gray
fields.description: Part of Nike's 'Essentials' range, this hoodie is cut from mÃ©lange cotton-jersey, it's backed in soft fleece, but you can layer a T-shirt underneath for extra warmth tooThe drawstring hood and ribbed trims complete the loose shape, and it's finished with the iconic 'Swoosh'Wear it with: Nike Shorts, Nike Sneakers, WTAPS Hat, Les Girls Les Boys Socks.

fields.product_name: Nike - Club Logo-Embroidered Fleece-Back Cotton-Blend Jersey Hoodie - Men - Blue
fields.description: Nike's 'Club' hoodie is a cult classic among pro athletes and streetwear aficionados alikeIt's cut from fleece-back cotton-blend jersey and simply accented with the brand's signature logo-embroidery at the chestWear it with: Carhartt WIP Trousers, StÃ¼ssy Socks, Neighborhood Wallet, Nike Hat.

fields.product_name: Nike - Sportswear Taped Cotton-Blend Tech Fleece Zip-Up Hoodie - Men - Black
fields.description: This zip-up hoodie is made from Nike's mid-weight cotton-blend Tech Fleece that's really insulating without adding bulkDesigned to layer comfortably, it's detailed with tonal taping and has a slightly taller collar to help lock in warmth.

fields.product_name: Nike - NRG Fleece-Back Cotton-Blend Jersey Hoodie - Men - Gray
fields.description: Nike focuses on creating good quality basics like this 'NRG' hoodie, which is important considering the amount of wear they'll getMade from substantial cotton-blend jersey, it has a fleece lining to trap warmth and drawstring ties to tighten the hoodWear it with: Carhartt WIP Trousers, Carhartt WIP T-shirt, Carhartt WIP Gilet, Nike Sneakers.

fields.product_name: Nike - Logo-Print MÃ©lange Fleece-Back Cotton-Blend Jersey Hoodie - Men - Gray

fields.product_name: Nike - ACG NRG Logo-Embroidered Fleece-Back Cotton-Blend Jersey Hoodie - Men - Blue

fields.product_name: Nike - MÃ©lange Fleece-Back Cotton-Blend Jersey Zip-Up Hoodie - Men - Gray

fields.product_name: SAINT LAURENT - Custar 45 Leather Chelsea Boots - Men - Black
fields.description: SAINT LAURENT's 'Custar 45' boots have a Western feel, thanks to the almond-shaped toe, Cuban heel and pull tabsThis pair has been made in Italy from supple leather that ages beautifully with wear, while the elasticated panel means they'll slip on effortlesslyWear them with the label's skinny jeansWear it with: SAINT LAURENT T-shirt, SAINT LAURENT Sweater, SAINT LAURENT Jeans, SAINT LAURENT Tote.

fields.product_name: SAINT LAURENT - James 60 Leather Chelsea Boots - Men - Black
fields.description: SAINT LAURENT's 'James' Chelsea boots are the kind of pair that'll be in your wardrobe for the long haulConstructed in Italy from supple leather, they have squared-off toes and are set on a 60mm Cuban heelThey break at the perfect height for wearing with the label's skinny jeans or slim trousersWear them with: SAINT LAURENT T-shirt, Enfants Riches DÃ©primÃ©s Jacket, SAINT LAURENT Scarf, Dries Van Noten Bracelet.

fields.product_name: SAINT LAURENT - Wyatt Leather Chelsea Boots - Men - Black
fields.description: SAINT LAURENT revisits its signature 'Wyatt' boots in so many new colourways and fabrications each season, but this versatile black leather pair is perhaps the wisest investmentThey've been impeccably made in Italy with elasticated side panels and are set on Cuban heelsThey break at the perfect height to wear with the brand's skinny-fit jeans or tailored trousers.

fields.product_name: Santoni - Polished-Leather Monk-Strap Boots - Men - Brown
fields.description: Give smart outfits a casual edge with Santoni's polished-leather monk-strap bootsThey'll work just as well with tailoring as brogues or Derbies, but feel that much coolerWear them with: Altea Sweater, Sid Mashburn Blazer, Rubinacci Trousers, Rubinacci Bracelet.

fields.product_name: Santoni - DÃ©gradÃ© Polished-Leather Chelsea Boots - Men - Blue
fields.description: Santoni has been handcrafting shoes since 1975, each one is a product of traditional craftsmanshipSet on Goodyear-welted soles, these Chelsea boots are made from polished-leather in shades of black and blue to create a cool dÃ©gradÃ© effectThe zip fastening means they're easy to get on and offWear it with: Prada Trousers, Dries Van Noten Sweater, Le Gramme Bracelet, Tom Wood Ring.

fields.product_name: SALLE PRIVÃE - Walter Leather Chelsea Boots - Men - Black
fields.description: Black Leather, Pull Tabs, Elasticated Sides, Leather Linings And Goodyear-welted Soles, Come With Dust Bags, Made In ItalyMade famous by The Beatles and The Rolling Stones, Chelsea boots are still a study in style and practicality todaySalle PrivÃ©e 's 'Walter' pair has been crafted in Italy from smooth leather and finished with Goodyear-welted soles to ensure they'll really stand the test of timeShown here with TOM FORD jacket, TOM FORD jeans, TOM FORD T-shirt.

fields.product_name: TOM FORD - Hainaut Polished-Leather Chelsea Boots - Men - Black
fields.description: TOM FORD's 'Hainaut' Chelsea boots have been crafted in Italy from black leather that's buffed and polished to an elegant sheenThe discreet elasticated side panels mean they're really easy to slip in and out ofShown here with TOM FORD jacket, TOM FORD trousers, TOM FORD sweater, TOM FORD beltThis item is small to sizeSee Size & Fit notes.

fields.product_name: TOM FORD - Edgar Cap-Toe Polished-Leather Chelsea Boots - Men - Black
fields.description: TOM FORD's 'Edgar' Chelsea boots are on the smarter side, meaning they'll go well with slim, dark suitingThey're made from polished-leather and have discreet cap-toe detailing.

fields.product_name: Loro Piana - Open Walk Nubuck Boots - Men - Brown
fields.description: Loro Piana's boots take their name from their patented opening, which is fitted with concealed elastics for ultimate comfort and flexibilityHandcrafted from soft but durable nubuck, they have a streamlined design that suits casual or smarter outfits alikeWear it with: Loro Piana Jacket, Anderson & Sheppard T-shirt, Loro Piana Jeans.

fields.product_name: Loro Piana - Open Walk Nubuck Boots - Men - Blue
fields.description: Loro Piana's boots take their name from their patented opening, which is fitted with concealed elastics for ultimate comfort and flexibilityHandcrafted from soft but durable nubuck, they have a streamlined design that suits casual or smarter outfits alikeWear it with: Loro Piana Sweater, Brunello Cucinelli Jacket, Loro Piana Trousers, Loro Piana Socks.

fields.product_name: Connolly - Suede Desert Boots - Men - Brown
fields.description: Connolly's desert boots have been made in Italy from brown suede with a supple leather backing, so they'll comfortably mould to your feet with wearThe rubber-crepe soles provide support and stabilityShown here with Barena sweater, Barena jacket, Jean Shop jeans.

fields.product_name: Connolly - Suede Desert Boots - Men - Blue
fields.description: Connolly's version of the classic desert boot is a little smarter than most, so you can wear them with tailored trousers as well as jeansSet on comfortable and lightweight rubber-crepe soles, they have supple navy suede uppers and fasten with tonal lacesShown here with Mr Psweater, Mr Pcoat, Mr Psocks.
fields.material: fabric / inner:fabric&rubber / sole:rubber:Upper: Fabric / Inner: Fabric & Rubber / Sole: Rubber/inner - leather / sole - rubber

fields.product_name: J.M. Weston - Suede Desert Boots - Men - Blue
fields.description: Mr Miles Davis was always a snappy dresser and J.M.Weston is channelling his iconic style into its latest collectionThese desert boots have been expertly crafted in France from smooth, supple suede and are set on rubber soles patterned with chevron stripes for flexibility and tractionShown here with Drake's shirt, Etro chinos, Drake's blazer, Brunello Cucinelli pocket square.

fields.product_name: J.M. Weston - Suede Desert Boots - Men - Brown
fields.description: J.M.Weston has been in the shoemaking game since the 1800s, and these desert boots really showcase its expertiseMade in France from supple suede, this pair is set on chevron-patterned rubber soles that are particularly flexible and provide exceptional gripThe label recommends storing them with wooden shoe trees inside to absorb any excess moisture and preserve the carefully crafted shapeShown here with Brunello Cucinelli jeans, Officine Generale coat, Mr Pcardigan.

fields.product_name: Kingsman - George Cleverley Suede Chukka Boots - Men - Brown
fields.description: Kingsman has worked with London-based footwear label George Cleverley since the very start of the movie franchise, Mr Colin Firth and Sir Michael Caine both wore exclusive shoes in the first installment, The Secret ServiceThese dark-brown chukka boots have been crafted in the UK from slightly distressed rough-out suede and minimally detailed, so they'll go well with tailored trousersWear it with: Kingsman Suit.

fields.product_name: Loro Piana - Walk and Walk Cashmere-Lined Suede Boots - Men - Brown
fields.description: The name of Loro Piana's 'Walk and Walk' boots is pretty self-explanatory, they're designed to be comfortable for long days on your feetDesigned with hand-stitched vamps, they've been crafted in Italy from soft suede that's treated with a water-repellent, stain-resistant finishSoft cashmere linings help trap warmth, while durable rubber soles provide plenty of gripShown here with Loro Piana jeans, Loro Piana rollneck.

fields.product_name: Loro Piana - Open Walk Full-Grain Leather Boots - Men - Green
fields.description: For six generations, we have been working with the best raw materials available on earth, " Loro Piana's Chairman Mr Sergio Loro Piana told usThese boots have been handcrafted in Italy from soft full-grain leather that's naturally water-repellent and coated with a further water-resistant finishThey have elasticated inserts to make them easy to slip on and off, and are lined in smooth leather so they feel as comfortable as your favourite sneakers, only smarterWear it with: Loro Piana Sweater, Loro Piana Coat, TOM FORD Trousers.
fields.material: fabric / inner:fabric&rubber / sole:rubber:Upper: Fabric / Inner: Fabric & Rubber / Sole: Rubber-suede / sole-rubber

fields.product_name: Loro Piana - Open Walk Leather Boots - Men - Brown
fields.description: Loro Piana's chukka-inspired 'Open Walk' boots have been crafted in Italy from water-resistant leather and are set on high-traction rubber soles that ensure you won't come a cropper on slippery surfacesHidden elasticated straps keep this sleek pair in place.

fields.product_name: Loro Piana - Open Walk Full-Grain Leather Boots - Men - Blue
fields.description: These 'Open Walk' boots were one of the first shoes Loro Piana debuted when it opened its NYC pop-up, and remain one of the label's best-sellersModelled after desert styles, they're crafted with supple full-grain leather uppers that are treated for a waterproof finish and fitted with elasticated inserts, so they're easy to get on and off.

fields.product_name: Loro Piana - Open Walk Cashmere-Trimmed Full-Grain Leather Boots - Men - Brown
fields.description: Loro Piana's 'Open Walk' boots are one of the house's best-selling styles, since their debut, they've been issued in a variety of shades and fabricsThis dark-brown pair is made from full-grain leather that's treated for a water-repellent finish and trimmed with beige cashmere along the collars for superior comfortWear it with: Loro Piana Coat, Loro Piana Sweater, Loro Piana Trousers.

fields.product_name: Mr P. - Heath Full-Grain Leather Chore Boots - Men - Black
fields.description: DESIGNED BY MR PORTERWe put stock into the pieces that last at Mr P., favouring a tough-wearing pair of chore boots like our signature 'Heath' styleThey're made from hardy full-grain leather, set on Goodyear-welted Danite rubber soles and fitted with supple linings that'll only get softer with wearWear them with: Mr PSweater, Mr PJeans, Velva Sheen T-shirt, Mr PSocks.

fields.product_name: Mr P. - Larry Suede Desert Boots - Men - Blue
fields.description: EXCLUSIVE AT MR PORTERA shoe as rich in heritage as the desert boot deserves a place in your wardrobe, and Mr P.'s 'Larry' version comes in storm-blue suede that'll fit in well with lots of the clothes you already ownLined in leather, they're set on serrated rubber soles for good grip.

fields.product_name: nonnative - Officer Suede Desert Boots - Men - Neutrals
fields.description: nonnative's 'Officer' desert boots are a good trade if you're usually happiest in sneakers, they're that bit smarter but not quite formalInspired by traditional military styles, they've been made in Italy from brownish-beige suede and set on durable rubber-crepe solesWear it with: nonnative Trousers, nonnative T-shirt, nonnative Shirt, MAPLE Ring.

fields.product_name: visvim - Voyageur Shaman Fringed Suede Boots - Men - Brown
fields.description: Mr Hiroki Nakamura fuses artisanal techniques with cool details to create visvim 's footwearMade from suede and set on durable VibramÂ® rubber soles, these boots have fringed collars, traditional moccasin stitching and smooth leather linings that'll mould to the shape of your feetShown here with visvim jeans, visvim T-shirt, KAPITAL cardigan.
fields.material: fabric / inner:fabric&rubber / sole:rubber:Upper: Fabric / Inner: Fabric & Rubber / Sole: Rubber-leatherinner-leathersoles-leather/ruber

fields.product_name: visvim - Beuys Trekker Folk Leather-Trimmed Suede Boots - Men - Brown
fields.description: visvim 's 'Beuys Trekker Folk' boots are hand-stitched from sand suede and have a mocassin-inspired silhouetteSet on rubber-crepe soles, they're detailed with tassel-trimmed laces, dark-brown leather trims and contrasting stitchingMatch the rugged look with a pair of cuffed jeansShown here with Beams jeans, Remi Relief T-shirt, Junya Watanabe jacket.

fields.product_name: visvim - Beuys Trekker Folk Leather-Trimmed Suede Boots - Men - Black
fields.description: visvim 's 'Beuys Trekker Folk' boots are handmade from faded black suede, with care given to even the smallest detailsThey have tasseled laces, cushioned rubber-crepe soles and a moccasin-inspired silhouetteWear yours with cuffed jeansShown here with Blue Blue Japan T-shirt, RRL Shirt, Levi's jeans.

fields.product_name: Grenson - Fred Leather Brogue Boots - Men - Black
fields.description: Black Leather (calf), Pull Tabs, Leather Linings, Goodyear-welted Rubber Lug Soles, Lace-upSet on sturdy Goodyear-welted rubber lug soles, Grenson 's 'Fred' boots are built to lastThe robust pair is finished with brogue detailing for rakish appeal and hiking-inspired features like eyelet lacing, which provides optimal supportShown here with Folk jacket, A.P.Cjeans, Margaret Howell T-shirt, Miansai bracelet.
