fields.product_name: Brunello Cucinelli - MÃ©lange Wool- and Leather-Trimmed Nubuck Boots - Men - Neutrals
fields.description: Brunello Cucinelli's Italian-made boots are modelled after classic hiking styles and look refined enough for casual lunches in the cityDesigned with rubber lug soles that provide durability and traction, they have beige nubuck uppers with tonal leather trims, antiqued gold eyelets and padded wool collars for comfort.

fields.product_name: Officine Creative - Character Leather Desert Boots - Men - Burgundy
fields.description: Character', the style name of these boots, speaks to Officine Creative's artisanal hand-craftsmanshipThey're cut from tanned leather that's particularly smooth and suppleWear them with: Officine GÃ©nÃ©rale Jacket, Mr PRollneck, Officine GÃ©nÃ©rale Trousers, Tod's Bracelet.

fields.product_name: Grenson - Joseph Cap-Toe Pebble-Grain Leather Boots - Men - Black
fields.description: Grenson has manufactured footwear for over a century and a half, and was the first shoemaker to employ Goodyear welting like that on these 'Joseph' bootsThey're made from leather and lined with supple hide that's breathable and comfortable to wearThe pebble-grain finish, toecaps and lug soles mean they're really durable, tooWear them with: Incotex Rollneck, Mr PJeans, Mr PJacket, WANT LES ESSENTIELS Wallet.

fields.product_name: Grenson - Brady Shearling-Lined Full-Grain Leather Hiking Boots - Men - Brown
fields.description: Grenson's 'Brady' hiking boots are designed for comfort and performance, whether you're hitting the trails or venturing into townCrafted from durable full-grain leather, they have insulating shearling linings and lightweight rubber-lug solesThe 'G' last is slightly wider than standard to accommodate thicker socksWear them with: Armor Lux Jacket, Mr PSweater, Mr PJeans, Mr PSocks.

fields.product_name: Acne Studios - Bertrand Leather Boots - Men - Brown
fields.description: Acne Studios' 'Bertrand' boots combine the best parts of hiking and streetwear stylesMade from sturdy leather, they're set on stacked rubber lug soles and have contrasting rope laces threaded right down to the toesWear it with: 1017 ALYX 9SM Jacket, Prada Trousers, Prada Sweater, Les Girls Les Boys Socks.

fields.product_name: Alexander McQueen - Leather Boots - Men - Black
fields.description: Alexander McQueen personalises traditional Battalion boots with chunky rubber soles that are curved and ridged for extra tractionMade in Italy from smooth leather, they feature the British brand's emblem on the tongues and pull tabs.

fields.product_name: Alexander McQueen - Exaggerated-Sole Suede and Patent Croc-Effect Leather Boots - Men - Black
fields.description: Alexander McQueen's version of the classic army boot rests on signature exaggerated soles, lifted from its best-selling sneakersThey've been made in Italy from a combination of smooth and croc-effect leather with suede trims, and decorated with traditional brogueingWear yours with everything from cargo trousers to suiting as the brand intendedWear them with: Alexander McQueen Shirt, Alexander McQueen Trousers.

fields.product_name: Balenciaga - Tractor Logo-Debossed Leather Boots - Men - Black
fields.description: Balenciaga likes to experiment with the shape of its shoesTake these black 'Tractor' leather boots for example, they have a rugged combat-style profile defined by solid round toes and chunky gripped rubber soleThe brand's emblem is debossed just below the tonal lacesWear it with: Acne Studios Jeans, Balenciaga Sweater, Maison Margiela Coat.

fields.product_name: Balenciaga - Strike Croc-Effect Leather Boots - Men - Black
fields.description: Bold footwear is a Balenciaga signature â just think of the cult favourite 'Triple S' sneakersDesigned with exaggerated round toes, these 'Strike' combat boots are made from glossy croc-effect leather and have heavy-duty rubber lug soles embossed with the brand name.

fields.product_name: Balenciaga - Strike Leather Boots - Men - Black
fields.description: Balenciaga knows how to make a shoe stand outThese boots have been made in Italy from leather and designed with rounded toes guarded by logo-stamped rubber wallsThey're set on chunky lug soles that won't slip, so you'll want to be wearing them when the weather takes a turnShown here with Balenciaga jacket, Off-White T-shirt, Balenciaga jeans.

fields.product_name: Brunello Cucinelli - Shearling-Lined Leather and Nubuck Boots - Men - Brown
fields.description: Both functional and classic, Brunello Cucinelli's boots are the kind you'll get plenty of wear out of over the yearsMade in Italy from smooth brown leather and nubuck, they're lined with insulating shearling that'll keep your feet toasty on chillier daysThe robust rubber lug soles are built to last.

fields.product_name: Brunello Cucinelli - Shearling-Lined Full-Grain Leather Chukka Boots - Men - Brown
fields.description: Whoever first thought of lining shoes with sheepskin was nothing short of a visionary, in our opinion, at leastBrunello Cucinelli's chukka boots have been handcrafted in Solomeo, Italy, from soft full-grain leather and fitted with plush, warming shearlingThe VibramÂ® soles offer high levels of resilienceWear it with: Brunello Cucinelli Trousers, Brunello Cucinelli Polo shirt, Le Gramme Bracelet.

fields.product_name: J.M. Weston - Leather Derby Boots - Men - Brown
fields.description: These Derby boots have been handcrafted in J.MWeston's French factory using vegetable-tanned leather from the Tannerie BastinIn a dark shade of brown, they have traditional apron toes, butted seams at the heel counters and durable, gripped rubber soles.

fields.product_name: John Lobb - Burrow Leather Boots - Men - Black
fields.description: John Lobb's leather 'Burrow' boots have been handmade in Northampton using traditional methods of craftsmanship, they've passed through many expert hands in a process that requires over 190 steps to completeThey're Goodyear-welted for a lifetime of wear and have EVA rubber-lug soles for grip.

fields.product_name: John Lobb - Alder Burnished-Leather Boots - Men - Brown
fields.description: Inspired by a 1940s ski boot style preserved in John Lobb 's extensive archives, these 'Alder' boots are crafted from durable leather that's burnished in two-tone 'Parisian' and 'Caviar Museum' brown shadesThey're set on Goodyear-welted rubber soles and finished with bellows tongues to help keep the elements outShown here with Canali sweater, TOM FORD jacket, Tod's jeansThis item is large to sizeSee Size & Fit notes.

fields.product_name: John Lobb - Alder Full-Grain Leather Boots - Men - Black
fields.description: John Lobb has extensive archives, dating all the way back to 1849, and that's where the inspiration for this leather 'Alder' style comes fromThey're modelled after 1940s ski boots, have weather-resistant leather uppers, storm welts, bellows tongues and rubber-lug solesShown here with Incotex shirt, Canali trousers, Brunello Cucinelli coat.

fields.product_name: Kingsman - George Cleverley Taron Cap-Toe Roughout Leather Boots - Men - Brown
fields.description: EXCLUSIVE AT MR PORTERGeorge Cleverley is an icon amongst fellow British shoemakers, all the craftsmen of his eponymous label undertake an apprenticeship that lasts five years to ensure the brand's exceptional standards are upheldCreated exclusively for Kingsman, these classic 'Taron' lace-up boots are constructed from tactile roughout leather and set on Dainite rubber soles that provide excellent traction.

fields.product_name: Kingsman - George Cleverley Cap-Toe Pebble-Grain Leather Boots - Men - Brown
fields.description: Chocolate Pebble-grain Leather (cow), Pull Tabs, Leather Linings, Dainite Rubber Soles, Lace-up, Come With Dust Bags, Made In The UkThanks to their toe caps, metal eyelets and hardy pebble-grain leather construction, these Kingsman boots will last you for years to comeThey'll instantly smarten up jeans or chinos, but since they have rubber Dainite soles they make a great option with your suit on rainy days, tooShown here with Kingsman suit, Kingsman shirt, Kingsman pocket square, Kingsman tie.

fields.product_name: Kingsman - George Cleverley Vaughn Buckled Nubuck Boots - Men - Brown
fields.description: EXCLUSIVE AT MR PORTERWhether in town or country, no Kingsman agent would be caught without the appropriate footwearInspired by the spy film series, these early 1900s-style mid-calf boots are fashioned from smooth nubuck and detailed with supportive buckles through the length of the legThey're made in collaboration with George CleverleyWear it with: Kingsman Cardigan, Kingsman Suit trousers, Kingsman Sweater, Kingsman Coat.

fields.product_name: Loro Piana - Laax Active Storm System Leather-Trimmed Wool-Blend Hiking Boots - Men - Gray
fields.description: A little snow won't stop you from heading out when you have Loro Piana's 'Laax Active' bootsThey've been made in Italy from a technical wool-blend that's treated with Storm SystemÂ® technology for a waterproof and wind-resistant finishThe resin-coated leather trims enhance durability, while the comfortable padded collars keep out moisture and coldShown here with Brunello Cucinelli jeans, Loro Piana jacket.
fields.material: Textile fibres 60% / Soft Leather 20% / Various Materials 20%

fields.product_name: Loro Piana - Walk and Walk Shearling-Lined Suede Boots - Men - Brown
fields.description: Loro Piana's boots are an equally refined and practical option when it comes to taking on the cold monthsThey're made from suede with elongated almond toes and gripped solesShearling linings will keep feet toasty even in plummeting temperatures.

fields.product_name: Loro Piana - Icer Walk Cashmere-Lined Water-Repellent Suede Boots - Men - Blue
fields.description: Loro Piana's 'Icer Walk' boots ensure autumn and winter's worst weather won't be a concern when you get dressedThey have been crafted in Italy from suede with a water and stain-resistant finish to protect from light rain and snow and are lined in cashmere for comfort and warmthFinished with non-slip rubber soles and comfortable triple padded collars, they're ideal for navigating slick city streets.
fields.material: Soft Leather 70% / Various Materials 20% / Textile fibres 10%

fields.product_name: Loro Piana - Laax Full-Grain Leather Boots - Men - Brown
fields.description: Loro Piana's 'Laax' boots are made from butter-smooth leather and finished with soft cashmere ankle cuffsThey rest on gripped rubber soles and come with four different shades of hiking-inspired laces so you can customise them to match whatever you're wearing.

fields.product_name: Loro Piana - Icer Walk Shearling-Lined Suede Boots - Men - Brown
fields.description: Loro Piana's 'Icer Walk' boots are made from chocolate-brown suede that's specially treated to repel water and stainsThey're lined in soft, insulating shearling that's fitted around the last for comfort and flexibilityThe durable rubber soles provide excellent traction on all types of terrain.

fields.product_name: Moncler - Ulderic Leather-Trimmed Shearling-Lined Nubuck Boots - Men - Brown
fields.description: EXCLUSIVE AT MR PORTERFounded in Monestier-de-Clermont, a small village nestled in the mountains near Grenoble, Moncler has a heritage steeped in making performance kit for expeditions and adventureThese shearling-lined nubuck 'Ulderic' boots are modelled on hiking styles and appropriate for the city, tooWear it with: Burberry T-shirt, Carhartt WIP Trousers, Moncler Coat, Moncler Backpack.

fields.product_name: Moncler - Striped Full-Grain Leather Boots - Men - Brown
fields.description: Moncler's boots are inspired by traditional hiking styles and made from full-grain leather that will wear wellThey have rubber soles that are substantial but not bulky, and are finished with the signature tricolour stripes as a nod to the brand's heritage.

fields.product_name: Valentino - Valentino Garavani Logo-Print Leather Boots - Men - Black
fields.description: Valentino Garavani's combat boots are printed with wet-look logos on the sidewalls for 180-degree curb appealThey've been made in Italy from smooth black leather with supple linings and rest on hefty rubber lug soles.

fields.product_name: Valentino - Valentino Garavani Logo-Debossed Leather Boots - Men - Black
fields.description: Valentino Garavani's lace-up boots are that elusive combination of refinement and true practicalitySet on substantial rubber soles, they're made from butter-smooth black leather and debossed with the brand's logo around the backUse the protective dust bags to store them while travelling.

fields.product_name: Vetements - Leather and Rubber-Trimmed Suede Boots - Men - Black
fields.description: Vetements boots are modelled on classic work styles, but refreshed in a way only the collective can doComplete with padded collars for an authentic feel, they're made from suede and set on robust rubber-lug soles detailed with the brand's moniker at each heelWear it with: Vetements T-shirt, Vetements Hoodie, Vetements Jeans, Prada Socks.

fields.product_name: visvim - Virgil Burnished-Leather Boots - Men - Brown
fields.description: visvim's 'Virgil' boots are made from thick, burnished-leather and set on Goodyear-welted VibramÂ® rubber soles that offer excellent tractionThey're a durable shoe that will hold up well through autumn and winter weather.

fields.product_name: Yuketen - Angler Leather-Trimmed Brushed-Suede Boots - Men - Black
fields.description: Yuketen's 'Angler' boots are modelled after the shoes worn by Maine's freshwater fishermen in the '50s and '60s, they're designed to be really durable and comfortable for long days on your feetHandcrafted from the label's thick 'flesh-out' suede, they're reinforced in the arches and heels to promote even weight distribution and have Goodyear-welted Italian Cortina rubber lug soles specifically created for balance and grip.

fields.product_name: Yuketen - Angler Leather-Trimmed Brushed-Suede Boots - Men - Brown
fields.description: Yuketen's 'Angler' boots are modelled after the shoes worn by Maine's freshwater fishermen in the '50s and '60s, they're designed to be really durable and comfortable for long days on your feetHandcrafted from brushed-suede and trimmed with leather, they're reinforced in the arches and heels to promote even weight distribution and have Goodyear-welted Italian Cortina rubber-lug soles specifically created for balance and gripWear it with: KAPITAL Jacket, KAPITAL T-shirt, OrSlow Trousers, Blue Blue Japan Scarf.

fields.product_name: Yuketen - Maine Guide 6 Eye Textured-Leather Boots - Men - Brown
fields.description: Mr Yuki Matsuda puts time and research into creating each pair of Yuketen shoes, the design for these 'Maine Guide' boots took about two decades to perfectThey're made from smooth and full-grain leather and set on thick Vibram rubber solesSteel shank reinforcements help distribute weight more evenly and provide superior support, so you'll be comfortable after long stints on your feetWear them with: Monitaly Cardigan, Beams Plus T-shirt, Folk Trousers, Timex Watch.

fields.product_name: Yuketen - Angler Leather Boots - Men - Brown
fields.description: We spend so much time on our feet that we can only endorse footwear which offers comfort, support and longevityYuketen's 'Angler' boots rest on quality 'Cortina' rubber lug soles and have leather uppers that are stitched and punched by hand on the brand's proprietary lastMade with a Goodyear construction, they have integrated steel shanks in the arch and heel to ensure the foundations stay in shape for years to comeShown here with Remi Relief T-shirt, visvim jacket, Chimala jeans, KAPITAL scarf.

fields.product_name: Yuketen - Maine Guide 6 Eye Smooth and Full-Grain Leather Boots - Men - Black
fields.description: Mr Yuki Matsuda puts time and research into creating each pair of Yuketen shoes, the design for these 'Maine Guide' boots took about two decades to perfectThey're made from smooth and full-grain leather and set on thick Vibram rubber solesSteel shank reinforcements help distribute weight more evenly and provide superior support, so you'll be comfortable after long stints on your feetWear them with: Monitaly Cardigan, Beams Plus T-shirt, Chimala Jeans, A.P.CTote.

fields.product_name: Alexander McQueen - Exaggerated-Sole Suede and Croc-Effect Leather Brogues - Men - Black
fields.description: Alexander McQueen's Derby shoes are modelled on classic brogues, only this pair features panels of suede contrasted by smooth and croc-effect leatherThey're decorated with traditional perforations and set on chunky rubber soles similar to its best-selling sneakersWear it with: Alexander McQueen Jacket, Alexander McQueen Trousers, Alexander McQueen Shirt.

fields.product_name: Christian Louboutin - A Mon Homme Leather Brogues - Men - Black
fields.description: Striking the right balance between your suit and accessories is crucial, and Christian Louboutin's 'A Mon Homme' brogues have just enough detail to garner interest without stealing itThey're made from supple black leather with elongated split toes and have signature red soles.

fields.product_name: Church's - Berlin Leather Wingtip Brogues - Men - Black
fields.description: It takes an average of eight weeks and more than 250 individual steps to produce a pair of Church's shoesSleek and timeless, these black brogues are crafted from premium leather and set on sturdy soles using a traditional GoodyearÂ® weltThe lustrous appearance is the result of the brand's unique polished binder treatment, which is applied at the tannery before the cobbling process beginsShown here with Ermenegildo Zegna suit, Ermenegildo Zegna shirt, TOM FORD tie.

fields.product_name: Dr. Martens - 3989 Two-Tone Leather Brogues - Men - Burgundy
fields.description: DrMartens' brogues are a little sportier than classic styles, meaning they'll work as well with jeans and chinos as pressed trousersSet on rubber soles, they're made from perforated leather in a two-tone bowling-inspired palette of black and burgundyWear it with: Neighborhood Shirt, JW Anderson Coat, Acne Studios Jeans, A.P.CRing.
fields.material: fabric / inner:fabric&rubber / sole:rubber:Upper: Fabric / Inner: Fabric & Rubber / Sole: Rubber /leather / lining:leather/fabric / sole:rubber

fields.product_name: Dr. Martens - Mono Leather Wingtip Brogues - Men - Black
fields.description: DrMartens' brogues are made from smooth leather decorated with classic wingtip perforationsThey're finished with monochrome stitching, grooved edges and have Goodyear-welted V18 soles that are streamlined but still durable and slip-resistant.

fields.product_name: Edward Green - Cadogan Burnished-Leather Brogues - Men - Brown
fields.description: So many steps go into crafting a pair of Edward Green shoes, and each is more impressive than the last, the soles alone are tanned for nine months in an oak, spruce and mimosa bark solution to boost comfort and durabilityThese 'Cadogan' brogues have been handmade in the label's Northampton factory from burnished leather and though they look streamlined, they'll comfortably fit wider feetShown here with Kingsman trousers, Kingsman jacket, Brunello Cucinelli shirt, Kingsman tie.
fields.material: fabric / inner:fabric&rubber / sole:rubber:Upper: Fabric / Inner: Fabric & Rubber / Sole: Rubber / lining and sole: leather

fields.product_name: Edward Green - Inverness Leather Wingtip Brogues - Men - Black
fields.description: Edward Green 's 'Inverness' brogues are much more streamlined than traditional styles, they're built using the brand's slim '82' last and feature wingtip perforations through the vampsThis pair has been made and hand-finished at the brand's Northamptonshire workshop from black leatherThe sturdy soles ensure they'll see you through formal occasions for years to comeShown here with Kingsman shirt, Kingsman suit, Turnbull & Asser tie.

fields.product_name: George Cleverley - Reuben Leather Wingtip Brogues - Men - Black
fields.description: To call George Cleverley one of the finest shoemakers in the business wouldn't be a stretch â clients have included Mr Clark Gable, Sir Winston Churchill, as well as members of both rock 'n' roll and actual royaltyThese 'Reuben' wingtip brogues are expertly handcrafted from smooth and sturdy black leather that's pinked and perforated across the uppersShown here with Hugo Boss shirt, Hugo Boss suit, Kingsman pocket square.

fields.product_name: George Cleverley - Adam Suede Brogues - Men - Brown
fields.description: Combining decorative broguing with the smart, streamlined silhouette of Oxfords, George Cleverley's 'Adam' shoes will make an impression with everything from tailoring to chinos and jeansThey're cobbled according to the brand's exacting standards from dark-brown suede and have tonal leather leathers.

fields.product_name: Grenson - Dylan Burnished-Leather Wingtip Brogues - Men - Brown
fields.description: Tan Burnished-leather (calf), Leather Linings, Rubber-trimmed Leather Soles, Lace-up, Come With Dust BagsIt takes eight weeks and over 200 individual steps to make a single pair of Grenson's shoes, each has to pass the brand's stringent quality standardsHand-painted for a subtle burnished finish, these tan leather 'Dylan' brogues are set on sturdy stacked soles that have rubber-trimmed heels for added gripComplement the colour with navy suitingShown here with; Paul Smith Shirt, Paul Smith Jacket, Paul Smith Trousers, Drake's Pocket square.
fields.material: fabric / inner:fabric&rubber / sole:rubber:Upper: Fabric / Inner: Fabric & Rubber / Sole: Rubber/inner/sole: leather

fields.product_name: Grenson - Stanley Leather Wingtip Brogues - Men - Brown
fields.description: Tan Leather, Burnished Toe Caps, Leather Lining And Soles, Lace-upFine brown leather brogues are a perennially stylish essentialDesigned to wear in for the perfect fit and look, this burnished tan Grenson pair will make a timeless investmentPart of the MR PORTER essentials.

fields.product_name: Grenson - Archie Leather Wingtip Brogues - Men - Brown
fields.description: Tan Leather (cow), Leather Linings, Goodyear-welted Rubber Lug Soles, Lace-upWe're firm believers that respectable adults need respectable shoesGrenson 's 'Archie' brogues are a choice pair, they're made from handsomely painted leather and Goodyear-welted to chunky rubber lug solesPinked trims are a traditional touch that prevents fraying and furthers their longevityShown here with Folk sweater, Aspesi jacket, A.P.Cjeans, Margaret Howell T-shirt.
fields.material: fabric / inner:fabric&rubber / sole:rubber:Upper: Fabric / Inner: Fabric & Rubber / Sole: Rubber/inner: leather / sole: rubber

fields.product_name: Grenson - Archie Leather Wingtip Brogues - Men - Black
fields.description: Grenson still draws on the traditional techniques it used to craft shoes in the 1860s, the process involves over 200 steps and can take 8 weeks to completeThese 'Archie' brogues are expertly made from leather and finished with wingtip perforationsThey're set on signature Goodyear-welted soles that'll last for years.

fields.product_name: Gucci - Dracma Leather Wingtip Brogues - Men - Black
fields.description: Traditionally brogue perforations were used to drain water from the feet of our Gaelic ancestors but the ones on Gucci's 'Dracma' pair are purely decorative and form the Italian house's iconic 'GG' monogram on the toe capsMade in Italy from lightly grained leather, they rest on a stacked heel for a little extra heightKeep yours pristine by storing them in the accompanying dust bags between wears and giving them a regular polish.

fields.product_name: Kingsman - George Cleverley Leather Brogues - Men - Black
fields.description: EXCLUSIVE AT MR PORTERUnlike traditional Oxfords or wingtips, you'll notice the neat broguing on these shoes forms the letter 'K' from Kingman's logoThey've been handmade by esteemed British label George Cleverley from smooth black leather that'll grow increasingly supple with wear.

fields.product_name: Kingsman - George Cleverley Leather Brogues - Men - Brown
fields.description: EXCLUSIVE AT MR PORTERGeorge Cleverley has an impressive list of clients, real and fictional, it's the brand of choice for the agents of the KingsmanThese brogues are handcrafted from brown leather and have Goodyear-welted soles, making them easy to repair years down the lineWear it with: Kingsman Suit jacket, Kingsman Suit trousers, Kingsman Shirt, Kingsman Pocket square.

fields.product_name: Officine Creative - Hopkins Cordovan Leather Longwing Brogues - Men - Black
fields.description: You'll find only the most classic styles in Officine Creative's collections, crafted using true time-honoured techniquesThese brogues are made from premium Cordovan leather, polished to a high-shine finish and set on a slight heelDetailed with 'longwing' perforations all around, they're intended to complement casualwear more so than formal suiting, so team them with chinos or jeans.

fields.product_name: Officine Creative - Hopkins Burnished-Leather Brogues - Men - Burgundy
fields.description: Officine Creative's 'Hopkins' brogues are just about as classic as they comeSet on sturdy leather and rubber soles for added grip, they've been crafted in Italy with supple burnished-leather uppers that are detailed with traditional wingtip perforationsComplement the rich burgundy hue with navy and black suitingWear it with: SÃ©fr T-shirt, MAN 1924 Suit jacket, Officine Generale Shirt, MAN 1924 Suit trousers.

fields.product_name: Paul Smith - Shaw Polished-Leather Brogues - Men - Brown
fields.description: Brogues are something of a signature for Paul SmithThis 'Shaw' pair is made from brown polished-leather, the colour is so deep, you'll only catch it under light.

fields.product_name: TOM FORD - Edgar Whole-Cut Polished-Leather Brogues - Men - Brown
fields.description: TOM FORD handcrafts shoes to the same exacting standard as its meticulous tailoringDetailed with classic perforations and medallion toes, these 'Edgar' brogues have been made in Italy from a single piece of polished-leather that'll develop a handsome patina over time.

fields.product_name: Thom Browne - Pebble-Grain Leather Longwing Brogues - Men - Black
fields.description: Combining elegance with practicality, these Thom Browne longwing brogues are set on lightweight rubber soles that won't wear out on your commuteThey've been expertly crafted in Italy from black pebble-grain leather and punctuated with grosgrain pull tabs in the label's distinctive tricolour stripesShown here with Thom Browne shirt, Thom Browne trousers, Thom Browne cardigan, Thom Browne pouch.

fields.product_name: Tricker's - Bourton Leather Wingtip Brogues - Men - Black
fields.description: Tricker's 'Bourton' brogues are a low-cut version of the country boots that put the brand on the map back in 1840As sturdy as the originals, this pair is made from smooth black leather detailed with wingtip broguing that's been hand-applied by the label's skilled artisansThe weatherproof, storm-welted Dainite rubber soles feel reassuringly solid underfoot.

fields.product_name: Officine Creative - Hopkins Cordovan Leather Derby Shoes - Men - Burgundy
fields.description: Mr Nazzareno Di Rosa founded Officine Creative in Montegranaro back in '69, now in the hands of Mr Roberto Di Rosa, the brand continues uses the same time-honoured techniquesExpertly made by artisans in the Italian workshop, these 'Hopkins' Derby shoes are assembled from burgundy Cordovan leather that's specially treated to achieve a lived-in patina.

fields.product_name: AMI - Leather Derby Shoes - Men - Black
fields.description: AMI's Derby shoes strike the perfect balance between classic and directionalThey're made from smooth leather and lace-up smartly at the frontThe chunky rubber soles are dramatically serrated, you'll see them best from the sidesWear it with: AMI Sweater, AMI Shirt, SÃ©fr Trousers, AMI Necklace.

fields.product_name: Alexander McQueen - Cap-Toe Smooth and Patent-Leather Derby Shoes - Men - Black
fields.description: Alexander McQueen's derby shoes aren't entirely traditional â they have chunky, exaggerated midsoles inspired by the label's cult-favourite sneakersDetailed with glossy patent-leather cap toes, they've been made in Italy from smooth black leather and stamped with silver designer emblems on the tongues.

fields.product_name: Alexander McQueen - Leather Derby Shoes - Men - Black
fields.description: If you live in Alexander McQueen's exaggerated-sole sneakers at the weekend, these derby shoes ought to be in your wardrobe for the working weekThey have smart leather uppers and rest on sporty moulded rubber basesWear it with: Alexander McQueen Jacket, Prada T-shirt, SAINT LAURENT Trousers.

fields.product_name: Balenciaga - Tractor Logo-Debossed Leather Derby Shoes - Men - Black
fields.description: Balenciaga's 'Tractor' Derby shoes are set on raised rubber tread soles, the chunky design detail has fast become a brand signatureThis pair has been made in Italy from smooth black leather and has debossed logos across the vampsWear them with both jeans and tailored trousersWear it with: Acne Studios Blazer, Balenciaga Sweater, Acne Studios Jeans, Balenciaga Wallet.

fields.product_name: Balenciaga - Logo-Detailed Patent-Leather Derby Shoes - Men - Black
fields.description: Balenciaga puts its stamp on traditional designs, quite literally, in the case of these Derby shoesMade in Italy from polished patent-leather, they're detailed with a silver-tone logo-engraved medallion and have seamless, angular heel counters.

fields.product_name: Brunello Cucinelli - Leather Derby Shoes - Men - Brown
fields.description: Mr Brunello Cucinelli often says his designs are intended to be passed down through the family, which is why these Derby shoes are set on hard-wearing VibramÂ® soles, the specially designed rubber has excellent traction and will last you yearsMade in Italy, this pair has sturdy leather uppers and linings that'll only get more supple over time.

fields.product_name: Brunello Cucinelli - Cap-Toe Suede Derby Shoes - Men - Brown
fields.description: Brunello Cucinelli's Derby shoes have been artisanally patinated, giving the suede a broken-in effect that'll only improve with timeThey're stitched with elegant capped toes and set on sturdy rubber lug soles.

fields.product_name: Bottega Veneta - Clear Sole Polished-Leather Derby Shoes - Men - Black
fields.description: The artful oversizing of Bottega Veneta's Derby shoes is a hallmark of Mr Daniel Lee's creative direction at the Italian houseThey're crafted in Italy from polished-leather, and grounded on a stacked rubber sole split black and transparentThe squared toe is another Lee signatureWear it with: Bottega Veneta Trousers, Bottega Veneta Polo shirt, Bottega Veneta Tote, Bottega Veneta Ring.

fields.product_name: Bottega Veneta - Leather Derby Shoes - Men - Black
fields.description: First and foremost a leather house, Bottega Veneta uses traditional techniques to construct the uppers of these classic DerbiesThey're polished for a handsome shine and rest on a slight heel with embedded lugs for grip.

fields.product_name: Church's - Oslo Polished-Leather Derby Shoes - Men - Black
fields.description: Church's 'Oslo' Derby shoes have been made at the brand's Northampton-based workshop on its 136 lastThey have polished black leather uppers and are set on Goodyear-welted soles that can be repaired as neededShown here with Thom Sweeney trousers, Paul Smith shirt, Canali tie.

fields.product_name: Common Projects - Leather Derby Shoes - Men - Black
fields.description: Common Projects' Derbies can be dressed up or down depending on where you're goingThey're made from polished black leather and designed in the classic, minimal profile that the brand championsThe signature gold serial numbers are an elegant point of differenceWear it with: Mr PJeans, Mr PJacket, Sunspel Polo shirt, Common Projects Pouch.

fields.product_name: Common Projects - Polished-Leather Derby Shoes - Men - Black
fields.description: Common Projects has made a name for itself crafting minimalist sneakers, but the brand is equally skilled when it comes to more formal styles, tooMade in Italy, these polished-leather Derby shoes are set on rubber-crepe soles and have almond-shaped toes that will look good with any trousersShown here with AMI trousers, AMI jacket, Margaret Howell shirt.

fields.description: Since DrMartens' creation in 1901, the label has built up an impressive back catalogue of stylesThese 'Smith' Derby shoes are cut from the brand's 'Vintage Smooth' leather, a retro-inspired version of its classic hideThey're set on the traditional sturdy Goodyear-welted soles and have air-cushioned insoles for comfort.

fields.product_name: Dr. Martens - Monkey Leather Derby Shoes - Men - Black

fields.product_name: Dr. Martens - 1461 Full-Grain Leather Derby Shoes - Men - Black
fields.description: Taking its place in history as the second shoe to come off DrMartens' production line, these '1461' Derbies replicate the original pair down to every stitchCrafted from tumbled leather that retains its natural grain and ages uniquely over time, they are built on the iconic AirWairâ¢ sole and reinforced with Goodyear welt stitching.

fields.product_name: Dr. Martens - Varley Leather Derby Shoes - Men - Black
fields.description: Each pair of DrMartens shoes is built to last, from the durable leather uppers to the Goodyear-welted AirWair solesThis 'Varley' style has been made in England in the brand's Wollaston factory and is fitted with cushioned leather insoles for comfort.

fields.description: DrMartens' shoes were originally born from the idea that footwear ought to be equally robust and comfortable, and the models today follow suitThese '2976' Chelsea boots are made from tumbled leather for a worn-in feel and set on Goodyear-welted soles that are heat-sealed at 700Â°C.

fields.product_name: Dr. Martens - Mono Leather Derby Shoes - Men - Black
fields.description: There are few shoes as durable or hardwearing as DrMartens' iconic Derbies â this three-eye 'Mono' pair combines that toughness with a smart low-profile shapeThey're made from smooth black leather and worked with matching stitching and lacesThe signature AirWairâ¢ soles are bouncy and slip-resistant, with thick treads that'll keep you steady.

fields.product_name: Dr. Martens - 1461 Ghillie Leather Derby Shoes - Men - Black
fields.description: DrMartens' 'Ghillie' Derby shoes are modelled on a pair the design team found while scouring vintage shopsThey're constructed from durable leather using Goodyear welting and feature all the brand's signatures, think grooved edges, yellow stitching and gripped air-cushioned soles.

fields.product_name: Dr. Martens - 1461 Leather Derby Shoes - Men - Burgundy
fields.description: Name a more iconic British shoe than DrMartens, we'll waitThese '1461' Derbies are made from durable leather that's dyed a classic 'Cherry Red' shade and set on the label's signature AirWairâ¢ soles that are both bouncy and slip-resistantTry yours with a pair of cuffed jeans.

fields.product_name: SAINT LAURENT - Wyatt Patent-Leather Derby Shoes - Men - Black
fields.description: SAINT LAURENT's 'Wyatt' Derbies are both smart and sufficiently rock 'n' roll with their elongated chisel-toe and glossed black finishThey've been made in Italy from patent-leather, with soft hide linings and sturdy solesWear it with: SAINT LAURENT Rollneck, Prada Trousers.

fields.product_name: SAINT LAURENT - Patent-Leather Derby Shoes - Men - Black
fields.description: When it comes to dressing for evening, a pair of sleek Derby shoes like SAINT LAURENT's are just the thingThis pair is impeccably made from patent-leather with supple linings for comfortWear it with: SAINT LAURENT Shirt, SAINT LAURENT Trousers.

fields.product_name: Tod's - Suede Derby Shoes - Men - Blue
fields.description: Tod's Derby shoes have been crafted in Italy from soft blue suede and set on signature gommino pebbled rubber soles for good tractionThey're lined in leather that'll only get softer with wearWe won't quote that song, but rest assured there's a good reason why The King was so keen to sing about not treading on themWear them with: Mr PShirt, Caruso Trousers, Brunello Cucinelli Jacket, Tod's Bracelet.

fields.product_name: Yuketen - Blucher Rocker Textured-Leather Derby Shoes - Men - Brown
fields.description: The blucher moccasin first became popular in the '60s across America and this 'Rocker' pair from Yuketen stays true to the originalSeven pieces of vegetable-tanned leather are hand-punched and sewn to contour naturally to your feet for comfortThey're topped with kiltie fringing and baseball stitching and rest on traditional crepe solesWear it with: Norse Projects T-shirt, nanamica Jacket, KAPITAL Jeans, Bottega Veneta Necklace.

fields.product_name: Yuketen - Textured-Leather Kiltie Derby Shoes - Men - Brown
fields.description: Tan Textured-leather, Removable Kiltie Panels, Leather Insoles, Rubber Soles, Lace-up, Come With Dust Bag, Designer Colour: Golden BrownThese Yuketen shoes combine elements from two casual styles â Derbies and moccasinsDetailed with kiltie fringing, they're handmade from the label's sturdy 'flesh out' leather that has the look and feel of suedeShown here with Chimala jeans, visvim hoodie.

fields.product_name: Yuketen - Textured-Leather Kiltie Derby Shoes - Men - Green
fields.description: These Yuketen shoes combine elements from two casual styles, Derbies and moccasinsDetailed with kiltie fringing, they're handmade from the label's sturdy 'flesh out' leather that has the look and feel of suede.

fields.product_name: Tod's - Gommino Full-Grain Leather Driving Shoes - Men - Brown
fields.description: Every pair of Tod's 'Gommino' driving shoes features 133 rubber pebbles dotted on the soles for gripCut, assembled and sewn by hand in Italy, this style is made from supple full-grain leather in a nice shade of tan that works perfectly with sandy chinos or indigo denimWear it with: Brunello Cucinelli Trousers, Brunello Cucinelli T-shirt, Canali Shirt.

fields.product_name: Gucci - Ayrton Kilty Leather Tasselled Driving Shoes - Men - Brown
fields.description: Gucci's 'Ayrton Kilty' driving loafers are so classic â made in Italy from leather, this pair is trimmed with tassels and the brand's iconic monogram in gold at the sidesThey're soled with rubber pebbles for good grip, whether you're at the wheel or strolling the streets.

fields.product_name: Hugo Boss - Lisbon Full-Grain Leather Derby Shoes - Men - Brown
fields.description: Derby shoes ought to feature in every guy's shoe collection and Hugo Boss' black 'Lisbon' pair comes in full-grain leather that will help to disguise any light signs of wearThey have rubber-tipped soles and plush leather and suede linings that will always feel comfortableWear it with: Hugo Boss Suit, TOM FORD Shirt, Hugo Boss Tie, Le Gramme Bracelet.

fields.product_name: Hugo Boss - Lisbon Full-Grain Leather Derby Shoes - Men - Black
fields.description: Derby shoes ought to feature in every guy's shoe collection and Hugo Boss' black 'Lisbon' pair comes in full-grain leather that will help to disguise any light signs of wearThey have rubber-tipped soles and plush leather and suede linings that will always feel comfortableWear it with: Hugo Boss Suit jacket, Hugo Boss Shirt, Hugo Boss Tie.

fields.product_name: Tod's - Gommino Full-Grain Leather Driving Shoes - Men - Neutrals
fields.description: Every pair of Tod's 'Gommino' driving shoes features 133 rubber pebbles dotted on the soles for gripCut, assembled and sewn by hand in Italy, this style is made from supple full-grain leather in a off-white shade that works perfectly with sandy chinos or indigo denimWear it with: Loro Piana Shorts, TOM FORD Polo shirt.

fields.product_name: Tod's - Gommino Full-Grain Leather Driving Shoes - Men - Green
fields.description: Every pair of Tod's 'Gommino' driving shoes features 133 rubber pebbles dotted on the soles for gripCut, assembled and sewn by hand in Italy, this style is made from supple full-grain leather in a nice shade of olive that works perfectly with sandy chinos or indigo denimWear it with: Saman Amel Trousers, TOM FORD Polo shirt.

fields.product_name: Tod's - Gommino Leather-Trimmed Suede Driving Shoes - Men - Red
fields.description: It's been more than 35 years since Tod's created its signature driving shoes, and they're as popular today as they were back thenThis two-tone pair has been made in Italy from red suede backed with supple leather and is set on rows of black rubber pebbles, or gomminiWear it with: Loro Piana Shorts, Anderson & Sheppard T-shirt.

fields.product_name: Tod's - Gommino Full-Grain Leather Driving Shoes - Men - Burgundy
fields.description: Every pair of Tod's 'Gommino' driving shoes features 133 rubber pebbles dotted on the soles for gripCut, assembled and sewn by hand in Italy, this style is made from supple full-grain leather in a nice shade of burgundy that works perfectly with sandy chinos or indigo denimWear itwith: Drake's Shorts, TOM FORD Polo shirt.

fields.product_name: Tod's - City Full-Grain Leather Driving Shoes - Men - Black
fields.description: Tod's driving shoes launched in the '70s and have since become synonymous with laid-back eleganceThis pair is made from full-grain leather that will mould to your feet over time and rest on the signature pebbled solesWear them through the warmer months with shorts or chinos.

fields.product_name: Tod's - Gommino Textured Leather Driving Shoes - Men - Black
fields.description: An encounter with some poorly made driving shoes inspired Tod's founder Mr Diego Della Valle to make a pair that were as soft and practical as glovesStill the brand's best-selling item to date, this 'Gommino' style has been handcrafted in Italy from full-grain leather with squared-off toes and the signature pebbled soles for traction and support.

fields.product_name: Tod's - Gommino Full-Grain Leather Penny Loafers - Men - Brown
fields.description: Tod's 'Gommino' penny loafers have a relaxed formality yet still feel elegantThis pair has been hand-stitched in Italy from richly toned full-grain leather and finished with pebbled rubber soles that make them a practical choice for weekend strolls or motoringWear it with: Dunhill Polo shirt, TOM FORD Jacket, Brunello Cucinelli Jeans, Tod's Belt.

fields.product_name: Tod's - Gommino Suede Driving Shoes - Men - Neutrals
fields.description: It's been more than 35 years since Tod's created its signature driving shoes, and they're as popular today as they were back thenThis pair has been made in Italy from beige suede backed with supple leather and is set on rows of black rubber pebbles, or gomminiWear it with: TOM FORD Sweater, Hugo Boss Trousers.

fields.product_name: Tod's - Gommino Full-Grain Leather Driving Shoes - Men - Black
fields.description: Every pair of Tod's 'Gommino' driving shoes features 133 rubber pebbles dotted on the soles for gripCut, assembled and sewn by hand in Italy, this style is made from supple full-grain leather in a classic black shade that works perfectly with sandy chinos or indigo denimWear it with: Loro Piana Jeans, James Perse T-shirt.

fields.product_name: Tod's - City Full-Grain Leather Driving Shoes - Men - Brown

fields.product_name: Mulo - Suede Espadrilles - Men - Blue
fields.description: Each pair of Mulo shoes goes through 100 individual processes to ensure that the finished product is long-lasting and comfortableThese espadrilles are cut from soft suede and set on sturdy rubber soles.

fields.product_name: Anderson & Sheppard - Cotton-Velvet Espadrilles - Men - Blue
fields.description: Anderson & Sheppard's espadrilles are made from soft cotton-velvet and go nicely with lightweight linen and chino shorts or trousersThey've been crafted in Spain using traditional techniques and have classic jute solesWear them with: Officine Generale Jeans, Isaia T-shirt, Luis Morais Bracelet, Garrett Leight California Optical Sunglasses.

fields.product_name: Anderson & Sheppard - Cotton-Velvet Espadrilles - Men - Red
fields.description: Anderson & Sheppard's espadrilles are made from soft cotton-velvet and go nicely with lightweight linen and chino shorts or trousersThey've been crafted in Spain using traditional techniques and have classic jute solesWear them with: Mr PShorts, Isaia T-shirt, Cutler and Gross Sunglasses, Le Gramme Bracelet.

fields.product_name: Anderson & Sheppard - Cotton-Velvet Espadrilles - Men - Black
fields.description: Anderson & Sheppard's espadrilles are made from soft cotton-velvet and go nicely with lightweight linen and chino shorts or trousersThey've been crafted in Spain using traditional techniques and have classic jute solesWear them with: Rubinacci Shirt, Brunello Cucinelli Shorts, Brunello Cucinelli T-shirt, Tod's Bracelet.

fields.product_name: CastaÃ±er - Pablo Suede Espadrilles - Men - Brown
fields.description: CastaÃ±er 's 'Pablo' espadrilles have been crafted in Spain from smooth suede in a light-brown shade that will go with so muchThe braided jute soles are reinforced with a layer of rubber, making them suitable for walking around sightseeing or shoppingShown here with Folk trousers, Luis Morais bracelet.

fields.product_name: CastaÃ±er - Pablo Canvas Espadrilles - Men - Blue
fields.description: CastaÃ±er's espadrilles are a classic warm-weather style, ideal to team with shorts or to dress down summertime tailoringMade with durable canvas uppers and traditional jute midsoles, they've been hand-stitched in Spain and reinforced with grosgrain inside the collar to hold their shapeWear it with: Charvet Shirt, Hugo Boss Trousers.

fields.product_name: CastaÃ±er - Pablo Canvas Espadrilles - Men - Gray
fields.description: CastaÃ±er's espadrilles are a classic warm-weather style, ideal to team with shorts or to dress down summertime tailoringMade with durable canvas uppers and traditional jute midsoles, they've been hand-stitched in Spain, the label's home country, and reinforced with grosgrain inside the collar to hold their shapeWear them with: Charvet Shirt, Altea Sshorts.

fields.product_name: CastaÃ±er - Pablo Canvas Espadrilles - Men - Black
fields.description: Black Canvas, Pull Tabs, Rubber Soles, Made In SpainCastaÃ±er 's hand-stitched canvas espadrilles embody laid-back summer styleThe brand's authentic jute-soled design has been updated with practical non-slip rubber basesTeam them with lightweight chinos or linen shortsShown here with a Massimo Alba T-Shirt, Barena Trousers.

fields.product_name: CastaÃ±er - Pablo Linen Espadrilles - Men - Yellow
fields.description: CastaÃ±er's espadrilles are a classic warm-weather style, ideal to team with shorts or to dress down summertime tailoringMade with lightweight linen uppers and traditional jute midsoles, they've been hand-stitched in Spain and reinforced with grosgrain inside the collar to hold their shapeWear it with: Altea Trousers, Mr PT-shirt, Charvet Shirt.

fields.product_name: CastaÃ±er - Pablo Canvas Espadrilles - Men - Neutrals
fields.description: Cream Canvas, Pull Tabs, Rubber Soles, Made In SpainFrom the military to high fashion, CastaÃ±er has a rich and varied history; these espadrilles capture the brand's ethos of quality and effortless styleThis hand-sewn jute and rubber-soled pair is a classic summer choiceThe cream canvas uppers will work with everything from bright printed shorts to understated linen trousersShown here with a J.Crew shirt, Incotex trousers, Timex x J.Crew watch and WANT Les Essentiels de la Vie tote.

fields.product_name: CastaÃ±er - Pablo Suede Espadrilles - Men - Blue
fields.description: CastaÃ±er has nearly a century of shoemaking under its belt â it even supplied soldiers with espadrilles in the early 20th centuryMade in Spain using the same methods, this pair has suede uppers and traditional braided jute soles reinforced with a layer of rubberShown here with Oliver Spencer trousers, Universal Works shirt, Luis Morais bracelet.

fields.product_name: CastaÃ±er - Pablo Linen Espadrilles - Men - Green
fields.description: CastaÃ±er's espadrilles are a classic warm-weather style, ideal to team with shorts or to dress down summertime tailoringMade with lightweight linen uppers and traditional jute midsoles, they've been hand-stitched in Spain and reinforced with grosgrain inside the collar to hold their shapeWear it with: Barena Shirt, Barena Trousers.

fields.product_name: Ermenegildo Zegna - Collapsible-Heel Suede and Leather Espadrilles - Men - Blue
fields.description: Since its founding more than a century ago, Ermenegildo Zegna has used the most luxurious materials to craft its designsThese espadrilles are made from supple navy suede and have collapsible leather heels and braided jute soles grounded by rubber basesWear them with: Ermenegildo Zegna Polo Shirt, Ermenegildo Zegna Trousers, Ermenegildo Zegna Boxers, Breitling Watch.

fields.product_name: Ermenegildo Zegna - Collapsible-Heel Suede and Leather Espadrilles - Men - Brown
fields.description: Since its founding more than a century ago, Ermenegildo Zegna has used the most luxurious materials to craft its designsThese espadrilles are made from supple brown suede and have collapsible leather heels and braided jute soles grounded by rubber basesWear it with: Ermenegildo Zegna Shorts, Ermenegildo Zegna Shirt, Paul Smith Sunglasses, Tod's Bracelet.

fields.product_name: Fendi - Collapsible-Heel Leather-Trimmed Logo-Print Canvas Espadrilles - Men - Brown
fields.description: Espadrilles are already the paragon of laidback summers, and Fendi's pair is designed with collapsible leather heels so you can simply shuffle them on and goThey're made from airy monogram-printed canvas, and the woven jute soles are reinforced with a layer of pavement-friendly rubberWear it with: Fendi Shirt, SAINT LAURENT Jeans, Fendi T-shirt, Fendi Sunglasses.

fields.product_name: Fear of God for Ermenegildo Zegna - Leather Espadrilles - Men - Black
fields.brand: Fear of God for Ermenegildo Zegna
fields.description: Fear of God for Ermenegildo Zegna is the golden mean between the former's street-ready approach and the latter's superior craftsmanshipPart of the joint capsule, these espadrilles have supple black leather uppers with minimal seams for comfort and are set on thick cream soles that hit higher on the sidewallsWear it with: Fear of God for Ermenegildo Zegna Shirt, Fear of God for Ermenegildo Zegna Trousers, Fear of God for Ermenegildo Zegna T-Shirt, Fear of God for Ermenegildo Zegna Belt.

fields.product_name: Gucci - Perforated Leather Espadrilles - Men - Black
fields.description: Gucci's espadrilles are perfect for warmer climes when you're in need of something a little more breathableThey have supple perforated leather uppers and are set on jute midsolesA thin layer of rubber along the bottom makes them suitable for both promenades and city pavementsWear them with: Gucci Shirt, Gucci Trousers, Alexander McQueen Bracelet.

fields.product_name: Gucci - Woven Horsebit Leather Espadrilles - Men - Brown
fields.description: Gucci's espadrilles are braided from strands of leather using an open weave, so they feel particularly breathableSet on traditional jute midsoles, they're topped with the brand's gold horsebit, a nod to its equestrian heritageOn the rubber outsoles you'll find signature bees and the French phrase L'Aveugle Par AmourWear it with: Gucci Shirt, Loewe Shorts.

fields.product_name: Gucci - Alejandro Collapsible-Heel Logo-Embroidered Leather Espadrilles - Men - Black
fields.description: Even Mr Ken Jennings wouldn't be able to guess the trio of flags on these 'Alejandro' espadrilles, they're Gucci's exclusive handiwork, designed to represent a global communityThey've been made in Spain with buttery leather uppers, traditional jute midsoles and collapsible heels featuring the house's gold bee emblem.

fields.product_name: Gucci - Matador Horsebit Leather-Trimmed Suede Espadrilles - Men - Brown
fields.description: These leather-trimmed 'Matador' espadrilles are the summer version of Gucci 's iconic 'Horsebit' loafersDetailed with the same gold-tone hardware, they've been crafted in Spain from tan suede and have signature bee emblems and 'L'Aveugle Par Amour' debossed on the gripped rubber solesShown here with Gucci shorts, Gucci T-shirt, Gucci shirt.

fields.product_name: Gucci - Horsebit Leather-Trimmed Logo-Jacquard Canvas Espadrilles - Men - Blue
fields.description: These espadrilles showcase a range of Gucci 's most-loved motifs â the canvas uppers are woven with its monogram and feature gold horsebits, while the rubber soles are stamped with bees and French phrasingMade in Spain, they have leather trims and linings and traditional jute midsolesShown here with Gucci track jacket, Gucci trousers, Gucci T-shirt.

fields.product_name: Loro Piana - Seaside Walk Collapsible-Heel Suede Espadrilles - Men - Gray
fields.description: Loro Piana's 'Seaside Walk' espadrilles have supple suede uppers treated with a water-repellent finish, so they're perfect for beach holidays, just as their name suggestsThey're set on rubber soles for traction and have collapsible heels so you can wear them as as slip-ons tooTeam them with everything from chinos to linen shorts.

fields.product_name: Loro Piana - Chambray Espadrilles - Men - Blue
fields.description: Loro Piana worked with master craftsmen in Spain to produce these espadrillesThey have woven-jute midsoles set on gripped rubber outsoles, while the uppers are made from breathable blue chambray.

fields.product_name: Mulo - Linen Espadrilles - Men - Neutrals
fields.description: Beige Linen, Pull Tabs, Elasticated Inserts, Leather Linings, Gripped Rubber Soles, Designer Colour: NaturalPractical and distinctively summery, these beige linen espadrilles from British brand Mulo are made on an Oxford last to keep the shape classicWith leather linings and rubber soles, they'll take on the shape of your foot over time as well as provide grip, whether at the beach or in the cityShown here with NN07 shorts, Polo Ralph Lauren shirt, Albam T-shirt, Luis Morais bracelet.

fields.product_name: Mulo - Suede Espadrilles - Men - Brown
fields.description: Mr Toby Cox started Mulo to recreate the espadrilles he wore to sail the world one summerLined in leather for comfort, this pair is handcrafted from supple suede in a process that takes over 100 steps and three daysThe braided linen trim nods to the jute sole associated with the traditional shoe, but it's reinforced with rubber for traction and durability.

fields.product_name: Mulo - Linen Espadrilles - Men - Pink
fields.description: Mulo based the design of its signature espadrilles on traditional boardwalk styles, but adapted the shape so they fit comfortably and last much longer than a single summerThis pair is handmade from linen and has breathable canvas linings, along with pull tabs so you can easily slip them on.

fields.product_name: Mulo - Suede Slip-On Sneakers - Men - Blue
fields.description: Mulo's slip-on sneakers are so comfortable, thanks to the cushioned insoles that mould to your feet after just a few wearsThis suede pair is handmade on a traditional Oxford last for a slim and streamlined shape and treated with Scotch Guard to protect them from the rainWear them with: Outerknown Shirt, Frescobol Carioca Trousers, Tod's Bracelet, Mulberry Bag.

fields.product_name: Mulo - Linen Espadrilles - Men - Blue
fields.description: Mulo founder Mr Tobias Cox was inspired to re-create the traditional espadrille during a sailing trip across the AtlanticHandmade on an Oxford last, this lightweight linen pair is built to wear well over time and has lightly padded perforated canvas insoles for comfort.

fields.product_name: Mulo - Denim Espadrilles - Men - Blue
fields.description: Made from dark-wash denim, Mulo 's espadrilles have all the appeal of traditional loafers, with an inherently summery feelThe cushioned insoles are lined with perforated suede for comfort and breathability, while the gripped rubber soles provide traction on slick terrainWear them on sandy beaches and city streets alikeShown here with Polo Ralph Lauren shirt, Officine Generale T-shirt, Polo Ralph Lauren shorts, Luis Morais bracelet, Mikia braceletThis item is small to size; see Size & Fit notes.

fields.product_name: Rivieras - Cotton-Mesh and Canvas Espadrilles - Men - Green
fields.description: When summer sets in and the mercury rises, it's time to reconsider your footwearThese Rivieras espadrilles are made from breathable panels of mesh and canvas and set on flexible rubber solesThey'll pack away easily inside your carry-on without adding much weight or bulkShown here with Folk T-shirt, J.Crew shirt, Oliver Spencer shorts, Miansai bracelet.
fields.material: Textile fibres 80% / Natural Rubber 10% / Soft Leather 10%

fields.product_name: Rivieras - Cotton-Mesh and Canvas Espadrilles - Men - Gray
fields.description: Made in Spain from layered mesh and canvas, these Rivieras espadrilles will let your feet breathe in hot climatesIncredibly comfortable, the elasticated inserts allow you to pull them on and off easily, while the bouncy rubber soles will put a spring in your stepWear them with shorts and a T-shirt for definitive summer styleShown here with Incotex shorts, Sunspel T-shirt, Oliver Spencer shirt, TATEOSSIAN bracelet.
fields.material: Textile fibres 80% / Natural Rubber 10% / Soft Leather 10%

fields.product_name: Rivieras - Cotton-Mesh and Canvas Espadrilles - Men - Blue
fields.description: Navy Cotton-mesh And Canvas, Elasticated Inserts, Leather Insoles, Rubber Soles, Made In SpainDesigned to be lightweight and timelessly stylish, these navy espadrilles by Rivieras are the ideal choice on sunny holidaysThis pair is made from breathable cotton with springy rubber soles for assured comfortThey will work from the beach to the bar, complete a classic summer look with a woven-straw fedoraShown here with rag & bone shorts, Hartford shirtPart of the MR PORTER essentials"

fields.product_name: Rivieras - Cotton-Mesh and Canvas Espadrilles - Men - Red
fields.description: Navy Cotton-mesh, Red Canvas, Elasticated Inserts, Leather Insoles, Rubber Soles, Made In SpainConstructed to be lightweight yet hard-wearing, Rivieras' cotton espadrilles with sturdy and comfortable rubber soles are the ideal holiday footwearWhether you are treading cobbled streets or sandy shores, this blue and red pair will inject low-key looks with a dose of continental flairShown here with rag & bone shorts.
fields.material: Textile fibres 40% / Soft Leather 40% / Various Materials 20%

fields.product_name: Rivieras - Cotton-Mesh Espadrilles - Men - Blue
fields.description: When the weather heats up there comes a point where it's just too hot to wear your usual selection of shoes, which is where Rivieras comes inThese espadrilles have been made in Spain from airy cotton-mesh anchored by saddle-stitched rubber soles and supple leather liningsShown here with Mollusk shirt, Mollusk T-shirt, Mollusk Plain swim shortsThis item is small to sizeSee Size & Fit notes.

fields.product_name: Rivieras - Cotton-Mesh and Canvas Espadrilles - Men - Neutrals
fields.description: Crafted in Spain from panelled mesh and canvas, these slip-on shoes from Rivieras will let your feet breathe in hot climatesIncredibly comfortable, the elasticated inserts allow for ease of movement, while the flexible rubber soles will put an energetic spring in your stepWear them with shorts and a T-shirt for definitive summer styleShown here with a Pink House Mustique shirt, Hartford swim shorts and a Timex x J.Crew watch.
fields.material: Textile fibres 80% / Soft Leather 10% / Various Materials 10%

fields.product_name: Rivieras - Maltese Falcon Cotton-Mesh and Canvas Espadrilles - Men - Blue
fields.description: Ideal for warm-weather holidays, Rivieras ' 'Maltese Falcon' canvas and mesh espadrilles are lightweight and flexible, ensuring they won't take up much room in your carry-onThe navy, light-blue and white palette keeps styling options wide open, while gripped rubber soles mean they're wearable in less favourable weatherShown here with Officine Generale trousers, Enlist shirt, Miansai bracelet.

fields.product_name: Edward Green - Piccadilly Leather Penny Loafers - Men - Brown
fields.description: To ensure that each pair of Edward Green shoes meets the same standard of quality, the brand's expert craftsmen make sure everything from the first cut of the leather to the final buff is done meticulouslyThese âPiccadillyâ penny loafers are set on soles that have been oak bark-tanned for a full nine months to achieve superior flexibilityShown here with Massimo Alba sweater, Officine Generale chinos, Massimo Alba blazer.

fields.product_name: Loro Piana - Summer Walk Suede Loafers - Men - Gray
fields.description: Loro Piana's 'Summer Walk' loafers are so popular that the brand recently opened an NYC pop-up shop focused almost entirely on the shoesHandcrafted in Italy from soft suede, they're set on lightweight rubber soles and have a water-repellent finish to protect your feet in case of unexpected rain.

fields.product_name: Dr. Martens - Adrian Polished-Leather Tasselled Loafers - Men - Burgundy
fields.description: DrMarten's 'Adrian' loafers debuted in the '80s and are among some of the brand's most iconic styles â they are still constructed at the original Cobbs Lane factoryMade from sturdy polished-leather, this pair is Goodyear-welted to chunky air-cushioned rubber soles and detailed with kiltie fringing.

fields.product_name: John Lobb - Hendra Leather-Trimmed Suede Penny Loafers - Men - Brown
fields.description: Each pair of John Lobb's shoes is made using an extensive 190-step process, so they're built to lastThese 'Hendra' loafers are crafted from supple suede and leather and topped with classic penny slotsWear them at the weekend with jeans or chinos.

fields.product_name: G.H. Bass & Co. - Weejuns Larkin Leather Tasselled Loafers - Men - Black
fields.description: G.HBass & Co.'s 'Weejuns Larson' tasselled loafers are as classic as they comeVirtually unchanged since they were first created in 1936, this pair is made from smooth leather using traditional bench-crafting and hand-stitching methods and is fitted with supple, cushioned insolesKeep yours in good shape with shoe trees and a regular polish.

fields.product_name: G.H. Bass & Co. - Weejuns Layton Kiltie Moc II Leather Tasselled Loafers - Men - Black
fields.description: G.HBass & Coincludes a shoehorn with every pair of its 'Weejuns' loafers to help stretch the leather during the break-in period, providing an accurate fit within a few weeksThis classic 'Layton Kiltie Moc II' pair is made according to the brand's original construction techniques from 1936 with added cushioning for comfort and hand stitching for resilience.

fields.product_name: Brunello Cucinelli - Full-Grain Leather Penny Loafers - Men - Brown
fields.description: Brunello Cucinelli's penny loafers are set on flexible rubber soles to boost comfort and traction, so they're ideal for frequent travels or long work commutesThey've been crafted in Italy from full-grain leather in a neutral brown colour that will work with dark and light tailoring, as well as jeansWear them with: Brunello Cucinelli Trousers, TOM FORD T-shirt, Brunello Cucinelli Sweater.

fields.product_name: Loro Piana - Summer Walk Nubuck Loafers - Men - Blue
fields.description: Loro Piana's signature 'Summer Walk' loafers are a wise investment because they're both comfortable enough to wear during the day and smart enough for dinner in the eveningThis pair has been handcrafted in Italy from durable nubuck that's specially treated with a water-repellent and stain-resistant finish and set on lightweight rubber solesWear it with: Loro Piana Polo shirt, TOM FORD Jeans, Loro Piana Socks, IWC SCHAFFHAUSEN Watch.

fields.product_name: Balenciaga - Logo-Debossed Leather Backless Loafers - Men - Black
fields.description: Balenciaga always delivers a certain sharpness in design, alongside something less than expectedWorn on the runway, these backless loafers are made from smooth black leather and constructed with a notably squared-off toeThe brand's emblem is debossed on the front, while the signature 'Carpet' motif is carved into the rubber soles.

fields.product_name: Balenciaga - Logo-Print Leather Backless Loafers - Men - Black
fields.description: Demna Gvasalia's shoes for Balenciaga tend to become cult favourites, so it's only a matter of time before these backless loafers crop up on your radarMade in Italy from smooth leather, they're stamped with the brand's distinctive logo and have a square toe.

fields.product_name: Balenciaga - Cosy BB Logo-Embellished Collapsible-Heel Leather Loafers - Men - Black
fields.description: This time around Balenciaga updates its popular 'Cosy' loafers with collapsible heels, so you can convert them into a backless pairMade from smooth, supple leather, they have a roomy square-toe shape and signature silver-tone 'BB' hardware.

fields.product_name: Balenciaga - Logo-Embossed Patent-Leather Loafers - Men - Black
fields.description: Embossed with the house's 'BB' logo and set on squared block heels, Balenciaga's loafers feel particularly contemporaryThey're made from glossy patent-leather that'll look just as good with jeans as it does with suit trousersWear it with: Acne Studios Jeans, Acne Studios Shirt.

fields.product_name: Brunello Cucinelli - Suede Tasselled Loafers - Men - Brown
fields.description: The comfort of Brunello Cucinelli's tasselled loafers is owed to the unstructured suede uppers and lightweight, flexible solesThey're particularly suited to warm climes, like that of the Italian hamlet where they've been handcrafted.

fields.product_name: Brunello Cucinelli - Suede Penny Loafers - Men - Neutrals
fields.description: Mr Brunello Cucinelli believes craftsmanship is a symbol of Italian heritage and one he goes to lengths to preserve, having established a school in Solomeo to teach and maintain traditional skillsExpertly assembled in the label's Umbrian workshop, these penny loafers are made from soft suede so they'll feel comfortable from the outsetThey have classic almond-shaped toes and sturdy rubber soles to withstand frequent wearWear it with: Brunello Cucinelli T-shirt.

fields.product_name: Brunello Cucinelli - Burnished-Leather Penny Loafers - Men - Brown
fields.description: Brunello Cucinelli's penny loafers are set on thick rubber soles that give them a more casual feelDesigned with classic split apron toes and raised seams, they're crafted from brown leather with a burnished finish to make them look slightly worn-in.

fields.product_name: Bottega Veneta - Polished-Leather Tasselled Loafers - Men - Black
fields.description: Mr Daniel Lee has carved out an understated yet distinctive aesthetic in his time at Bottega VenetaPart of the AW20 collection, these polished-leather loafers have a square-toe shape and are set on chunky transparent solesTextural tassels finish the frontWear it with: Bottega Veneta Shirt, Bottega Veneta Trousers, Bottega Veneta Bracelet.

fields.product_name: Bottega Veneta - Intrecciato Leather Backless Loafers - Men - Black
fields.description: Intrecciato has been a Bottega Veneta signature since the 1960s, it wasn't until Mr Daniel Lee became Creative Director that the label started using the blown-up proportions featured on these backless loafersThey've been made in Italy and have pebbled rubber soles for grip.

fields.product_name: Bottega Veneta - Polished-Leather Tasselled Loafers - Men - Green
fields.description: Mr Daniel Lee has carved out an understated yet distinctive aesthetic in his time at Bottega VenetaPart of the AW20 collection, these polished-leather loafers have a square-toe shape and are set on chunky transparent solesTextural tassels finish the frontWear it with: Bottega Veneta Shirt, Bottega Veneta Trousers, Bottega Veneta Bracelet.

fields.product_name: Bottega Veneta - Intrecciato Leather Loafers - Men - Brown
fields.description: Bottega Veneta's signature woven intrecciato technique is applied to these loafers to make the supple leather more durableThey're fitted with smooth, comfortable linings and have sturdy solesWear them with relaxed tailoring.

fields.product_name: Bottega Veneta - Intrecciato Leather Loafers - Men - Black
fields.description: Bottega Veneta's intrecciatio requires great skill and, indeed, strength â the technique is only carried out from a standing positionWoven in the pattern from strips of black calfskin, these loafers are fitted with supple linings that'll feel comfortable from the get-goWear them with unstructured tailoring or a pair of the house's leather shorts.

fields.product_name: Bottega Veneta - Leather Loafers - Men - Black
fields.description: Made with elasticated heels for ease and comfort, Bottega Veneta's supple leather loafers have an understated elegance inspired by Italian cultureWear them with loose trousers or simple shorts.

fields.product_name: Bottega Veneta - Crinkled-Leather Loafers - Men - Brown
fields.description: Fine Italian craftsmanship is at the core of Bottega Veneta, the label even established its own permanent workshop, La Scuola dei Maestri Pellettieri, to train students and new hires in traditional techniquesThese unstructured loafers are made from crinkled-leather that's supple and has a nice sheenWear it with: The Row Coat, The Row Trousers, Bottega Veneta Sweater, Bottega Veneta Glasses.

fields.product_name: Christian Louboutin - Spiked Suede Loafers - Men - Blue
fields.description: A pair of loafers has never quite embodied the phrase 'business in the front, party in the back' quite like Christian Louboutin'sMade from grosgrain-piped suede in a deep navy hue, they have a refined almond-toe shape and are studded with spikes around the stacked heelKeep yours pristine by storing them in the accompanying dust bag between wearsWear it with: SAINT LAURENT Sweater, SAINT LAURENT Trousers, Christian Louboutin Belt.

fields.product_name: Christian Louboutin - Studded Leather Backless Loafers - Men - Black
fields.description: Christian Louboutin's backless loafers are a cool, unexpected way to ground classic tailoringThey're made from smooth black leather and embellished with a band of signature studs across the vamp in lieu of a traditional penny strapThey're set on the house's hallmark red lacquered solesWear it with: SAINT LAURENT Sweater, The Row Trousers, Bottega Veneta Ring, Luis Morais Bracelet.

fields.product_name: Christian Louboutin - Magic Moc Leather Penny Loafers - Men - Black
fields.description: Master shoemaker, Mr Christian Louboutin knows how to design refined footwear that makes a statementThese graphic 'Magic Moc' loafers are crafted from black leather with carefully inlaid white panels for a trompe l'oeil effectThe rubber-tipped soles are rendered in the house's classic red shadeWear it with: TOM FORD Rollneck, Givenchy Trousers, Bottega Veneta Necklace, Alexander McQueen Bracelet.

fields.product_name: Christian Louboutin - Leather Tasseled Backless Loafers - Men - Black
fields.description: Christian Louboutin's backless loafers are smart enough to wear with tailoring as well as something more casual like jeans, just be sure to opt for a neat slim-cut pairThey're made from leather and topped with traditional tassels in engraved silver casingWear it with: Balenciaga Trousers, SAINT LAURENT Sweater.

fields.product_name: Christian Louboutin - Marpyramide Spiked Velvet Loafers - Men - Black
fields.description: You'll get lots of wear out of Christian Louboutin's 'Marpyramide' loafers, they are smart enough to style with a tux, but will also work with trousers and a sweater for more casual dress codesMade from black velvet, they're embellished with gold-tone studs at the heels and detailed with signature red lacquered solesWear them with: Prada Tuxedo, John Smedley Sweater, Prada Phone Case.

fields.product_name: Christian Louboutin - Grosgrain-Trimmed Velvet Loafers - Men - Black
fields.description: The great thing about Christian Louboutin's loafers is that while undeniably smart, they aren't strictly formal, you can wear them just as easily with pressed trousers and a sweater as with a tuxThey've been made in Italy from smooth velvet lined in leather for comfort, reinforced with grosgrain at the Venetian-cut vamps and set on signature red soles.

fields.product_name: Church's - Willenhall Bookbinder FumÃ¨ Leather Penny Loafers - Men - Burgundy
fields.description: Church's 'Willenhall' loafers are sleek and practical all at onceCrafted in Northampton, England from burgundy leather, they're treated with the house's 'Bookbinder FumÃ¨' for a high-shine finish and set on chunky rubber soles with storm welts to keep your feet dry in wet weather.
fields.material: Willenhall Bookbinder Fume' Leather Penny Loafer W/ Triple Welt Sole

fields.product_name: Church's - Tennant Bookbinder FumÃ¨ Leather Tasselled Loafers - Men - Black
fields.description: The Journal calls Northampton, England the global epicentre of menâs shoemaking", so it's no surprise that Churchâs hails from this very placeThese 'Tennant' loafers are made from premium leather that's treated with the brand's 'Bookbinder FumÃ¨' for a high-shine finish and accented with kilties and tasselsThe hand-stitched details add to the bespoke quality, while the GoodyearÂ®-welted soles ensures durability.

fields.product_name: Church's - Willenhall Bookbinder FumÃ¨ Leather Penny Loafers - Men - Black
fields.description: Church's 'Willenhall' loafers are sleek and practical all at onceCrafted in Northampton, England from black leather, they're treated with the house's 'Bookbinder FumÃ¨' for a high-shine finish and set on chunky rubber soles with storm welts to keep your feet dry in wet weather.
fields.material: Willenhall Bookbinder Fume' Leather Penny Loafer W/ Triple Welt Sole

fields.product_name: Church's - Dawley Leather Penny Loafers - Men - Black
fields.description: Dubbed the perfect slip-on shoes, Churchâs 'Dawley' penny loafers have been crafted in England from waxed black leatherThey're constructed with classic cut vamps and hand-stitched apronsThe durable GoodyearÂ®-welted soles ensure they'll stand up to lots of wear.

fields.product_name: Christian Louboutin - Dandelion Grosgrain-Trimmed Patent-Leather Loafers - Men - Black
fields.description: Christian Louboutin's Venetian-cut 'Dandelion' loafers are smart enough to wear with your tuxDesigned with sleek, tapered toes, they've been made in Italy from patent-leather, trimmed with grosgrain and set on signature red soles that are reinforced to hold up well over time.
fields.material: Upper: 100% calf leather / Sole: 100% calf leather
