fields.product_name: Jason Markk - Premium Shoe Cleaner, 236ml - Men - White
fields.description: Free From Harsh Chemicals And Abrasives, Safe To Use On All Colours And Materials, Cleans Up To 200 Pairs Of ShoesKeep your favourite footwear looking fresh with Jason Markk 's 'Premium Shoe Cleaner'Designed to alleviate the effects of daily wear and tear, this easy-to-use formula creates a foaming lather that gently removes dirt and stains from any material â it's absent of harsh chemicals and safe to use on everything from leather brogues to canvas sneakersApply a liberal amount of the cleanser to the damp Premium Shoe BrushDip the brush into a bowl of water and gently scrub the entire surface of the shoeWipe clean with a towel and repeat as needed.

fields.product_name: Jason Markk - Shoe Cleaning Kit - Men - Colorless
fields.description: Ideal for the frequent traveller, Jason Markk's compact shoe cleaning kit contains everything needed to keep footwear in good shape on the go, The label's best-selling foaming Premium Shoe Cleaner effectively cleans and conditions all types of uppers, including leather, The soft hog bristles on the Premium Brush tackle tougher stains, such as dirt on midsoles - Premium Stain and Water Repellent creates a barrier that effectively repels liquids and stains, Created specifically for sneakers, the dual-textured Quick Wipes are ideal for bag or pocket storage

fields.product_name: Jason Markk - Premium Shoe Cleaning Brush - Men - Brown
fields.description: Designed For Use On Delicate Materials Including Premium Leather, Suede Or Cotton MeshThe right maintenance will considerably extend the life of your shoes and Jason Markk's brush is designed to tackle all-around cleaningThis handcrafted wooden piece is designed to allow a supportive grip so the soft hog bristles can shake dirt loose from midsoles or buff stains out of leather., Dip in water, then apply Premium Shoe Cleaner and gently brushRepeat as needed then allow shoes to air dry.

fields.product_name: Liquiproof LABS - Footwear & Fashion Care Travel Kit - Men - Colorless
fields.description: Packed in a handy clear bag, Liquiproof LABS' 'Footwear & Fashion' travel kit ensures your footwear stays in tip-top conditionThe products are suitable to use on all fabrics, including suede, leather, nubuck and even silk, The label's Premium Microfibre Cloth effectively wipe stains away from leather and suede, Soft bristles on the Premium Vegetable Fibre Brush tackle deeper stains, like mud or dirt, This long-lasting Premium Protector creates an invisible barrier that effectively repels liquids and stains from water, alcohol and oil, Specially designed for use on fabrics, the Footwear & Fashion Eco-Cleaner conditions and cleans all types of fabric and textiles, including nubuck and leather, The Premium Freshener is formulated with a high concentration of probiotics that rapidly eliminate odours
fields.material: Brush Vegetable Fibre bristles and wood European Beech Wood- Germany -Fagus Sylvatica

fields.product_name: Liquiproof LABS - Protector Kit 125 Travel Bag - Men - Colorless
fields.description: Liquiproof LABS' kit contains everything you need to keep leather looking its bestIt's designed to lengthen the life of your favourite shoes, clothes and accessories and comes with a clear travel case, which will fit neatly in a suitcase or holdall, Spray the Leather Nourisher evenly across the surface of your item, at a distance of around 10-15cm, to deeply nourish the outer layer, and create a protective, water-resistant coating, Buff with the Premium Hog Hair Brush , the bristles will help remove stains without damaging, Wipe away residue with the Premium Microfibre Cloth , which features nearly half a million yarns to create a softer handle

fields.product_name: Liquiproof LABS - Footwear & Fashion Eco-Cleaner, 125ml - Men - Colorless
fields.description: Prolong pristine white shoes or a favourite work shirt with Liquiproof LABS' 'Eco-Cleaner', an enzyme-rich solution that's specially designed for use on footwear and clothingThis dual-action spray draws dirt particles to the surface, while conditioning fibres along the wayIt's safe to use on even the most premium materials, from suede to nubuck, leather and silk.

fields.product_name: Liquiproof LABS - Premium Protector, 125ml - Men - Colorless
fields.description: Liquiproof LABS' non-toxic 'Premium Protector' creates an invisible shield against stains to extend the life of your accessories and footwearSuitable for all fabrics, including leather, this water-based formula is made using all-natural ingredients that won't alter the appearance, feel or scent of your favourite itemsThis 125ml bottle should cover up to five pairs of shoes, one coat or two bags.

fields.product_name: Liquiproof LABS - Cleaning Kit 50 Travel Bag - Men - Colorless
fields.description: Liquiproof LABS is committed to tackling the waste and landfill overflow that results from fast fashion by creating eco-friendly solutions to help you care for garments, This 'Cleaning Kit 50' comes in a clear travel bag, meant to be tucked in carry-on luggage, Includes the signature Footwear & Fashion Eco-Cleaner Solution , Use the Premium Vegetable Fibre Brush and Microfibre Cloth to help remove stains and keep items in top shape

fields.product_name: Liquiproof LABS - Leather Nourisher, 125ml - Men - Colorless
fields.description: Liquiproof LABS is on a mission to lessen waste generated by the fast fashion industry, and does so by creating eco-friendly solutions to give your clothes, shoes and accessories a longer lifeFormulated with beeswax, this 'Nourisher' treats leather items with a durable water resistant (DWR) protective coatIt's non-toxic and suitable on all hides except suede.

fields.product_name: Lorenzi Milano - Travel Shoe Care Set with Leather Case - Men - Brown

fields.product_name: Lorenzi Milano - Shearling and Leather Shoeshine Mitt - Men - Brown

fields.product_name: George Cleverley - Hampton Leather-Trimmed Suede Loafers - Men - Brown
fields.description: George Cleverley has an impressive clientele list, including the likes of Messrs Alex Rodriguez, David Beckham and Sylvester StalloneIn versatile light-brown, these leather-trimmed 'Hampton' loafers have been crafted in the UK from velvety suede and can be dressed up with suiting or down with jeansWear it with: Altea Jacket, Altea Trousers, Anderson & Sheppard T-Shirt.

fields.product_name: George Cleverley - Hampton Leather-Trimmed Suede Loafers - Men - Blue
fields.description: George Cleverley has an impressive clientele list, including the likes of Messrs Alex Rodriguez, David Beckham and Sylvester StalloneIn versatile black, these leather-trimmed 'Hampton' loafers have been crafted in the UK from velvety suede and can be dressed up with suiting or down with jeansWear it with: Altea Trousers, Officine Generale Shirt, De Petrillo Jacket.

fields.product_name: George Cleverley - Albert Velvet Slippers - Men - Black
fields.description: George Cleverley 's shoes have been worn by Hollywood stars, royalty and politicians, so you know they're guaranteed to impressThese 'Albert' slippers have been expertly handmade in England from plush velvetThey rest on smooth leather soles and have soft quilted linings, making them all the more comfortable.

fields.product_name: George Cleverley - Albert Velvet Slippers - Men - Burgundy
fields.description: George Cleverley's designs are held in very high regard â Mr Jason Statham once described them as the best shoes on the planetExpertly handmade in England, these 'Albert' slippers are a handsome option for when you're relaxing at homeThey're crafted from plush velvet and have a smooth quilted satin lining for comfort.

fields.product_name: George Cleverley - Positano Patent-Leather Loafers - Men - Black
fields.description: George Cleverley is one of the few labels that still makes its shoes entirely by handCrafted in the brand's workshop above its shop in London, these patent-leather 'Positano' loafers have durable rubber soles and leather linings that will comfortably mould to your feet over timeWear it with: Richard James Blazer, Richard James Tuxedo trousers, Richard James Shirt, Lanvin Bow tie.

fields.product_name: George Cleverley - Albert Velvet Slippers - Men - Blue
fields.description: EXCLUSIVE AT MRPORTER.COMAlthough they're reserved for indoors, your slippers still need to be well made so they're as comfortable and long-lasting as possible, which is where George Cleverley 's handmade 'Albert' pair comes inThey have plush velvet uppers lined with smooth satin and are set on durable leather solesThe grosgrain piping will keep them in good shape even after lots of wearsShown here with Anderson & Sheppard pyjamas.
fields.material: Inner : Textile / Upper : Textile / Sole : Rubber

fields.product_name: Gucci - Pericle Horsebit Suede-Trimmed Monogrammed Canvas Slippers - Men - Brown
fields.description: Gucci's slippers bear many of the brand's signatures, from its burnished-gold horsebits to the '30s-inspired 'GG' emblemTrimmed with suede for durability, they have monogrammed canvas uppers and felt linings that'll ensure superior comfort.

fields.product_name: Gucci - Pericle Horsebit Suede Slippers - Men - Pink
fields.description: In Gucci's world these 'Pericle' slippers are perfect for relaxing at home, but why reserve them for your eyes only? Topped with signature gold horsebits, they're made from vibrant magenta suede and lined with felt for extra grip so they won't slide off.

fields.product_name: Gucci - Pericle Horsebit Leather Slippers - Men - Black
fields.description: Gucci's 'Pericle' slippers may be modelled after lounge shoes, but we're sure you won't want to reserve them strictly for the homeEmbellished with a burnished gold horsebit, they're made from black leather and lined with soft green felt for a touch of warmthWear yours with or without socks.

fields.product_name: Kingsman - George Cleverley Windsor Velvet Evening Slippers - Men - Green
fields.description: EXCLUSIVE AT MR PORTERWith more than six decades of shoemaking experience, it's no wonder that Kingsman has partnered with George Cleverley to create its distinguished footwear lineMade in the house's English workshop, these evening slippers have plush green velvet uppers and leather linings, soles and piping that will stand the test of time.

fields.product_name: Lemaire - Full-Grain Leather Slippers - Men - Black
fields.description: Lemaire's minimal slippers are inspired by tai chi shoes traditionally worn by Chinese practitionersThough they're usually constructed from cloth, this pair is made from supple full-grain leather with almond toes and smooth rubber-crepe solesWear it with: Lemaire Shirt, Balenciaga Trousers.

fields.product_name: Loro Piana - Maurice Cashmere-Lined Suede Slippers - Men - Blue
fields.description: After a long day on your feet, there's nothing better than sliding into some soft slippers, and they don't really get any better than Loro Piana'sMade from navy suede, this 'Maurice' pair is lined with the brand's highly prized cashmere for comfort and cosiness.

fields.product_name: Loro Piana - Maurice Cashmere-Lined Suede Slippers - Men - Gray
fields.description: There's little more luxurious than a pair of exquisitely made slippers just for lounging around the house, and Loro Piana's are among the best we've foundHandcrafted from supple suede, they're lined in soft cashmere for warmth and comfort.

fields.product_name: Loro Piana - Walk At Home Cashmere-Lined Suede Slippers - Men - Blue
fields.description: Lined with soft, warming cashmere, Loro Piana's 'Walk At Home' slippers are an investment for your downtimeThey've been expertly crafted in Italy from supple suede and come with a dust bag so you can stow them in your cabin luggage for long-haul flights.

fields.product_name: Paul Stuart - Hamilton Logo-Embroidered Suede Slippers - Men - Gray
fields.description: Paul Stuart combines Hollywood's Golden Age glamour with a refined New York sensibilityThese elegant slippers are made from buttery charcoal suede, set on comfortable rubber soles and embroidered with the brand's emblemWear it with: Zimmerli Pyjamas, Zimmerli Robe, Pantherella Socks.

fields.product_name: Paul Stuart - Hope Leather and Grosgrain-Trimmed Velvet Tasselled Slippers - Men - Black
fields.description: Creative Director Mr Javier Suarez says Paul Stuart's shoes are so comfortable because they have cushioning and rubber-composite soles inspired by sneakersCrafted in Italy, these velvet 'Hope' slippers are designed with grosgrain and leather trims, classic tassels and quilted linings.

fields.product_name: Paul Stuart - Hope Leather and Grosgrain-Trimmed Velvet Tasselled Slippers - Men - Burgundy
fields.description: Creative Director Mr Javier Suarez says Paul Stuart's shoes are so comfortable because they have cushioning and rubber-composite soles inspired by sneakersCrafted in Italy, these velvet 'Hope' slippers are designed with grosgrain and leather trims, classic tassels and quilted linings.

fields.product_name: Quoddy - Fireside Leather-Trimmed Shearling-Lined Suede Slippers - Men - Brown
fields.description: Nothing feels as good as a pair of comfortable slippers after a long day at the officeThis leather-trimmed 'Fireside' pair from Quoddy is handmade from suede and fully lined in insulating shearlingThey have VibramÂ® air-injected rubber soles for a light feel, and functioning laces to customise the fitShown here with Sleepy Jones pyjama trousers, Sleepy Jones pyjama shirt.

fields.product_name: Sulka - Full-Grain Leather Slippers - Men - Blue
fields.description: Sulka is renowned for its silk ties, scarves and robes, but the expert finish of these slippers show the house is just as skilled at leatherworkThis Italian-made pair has an open-back design so you can easily slip them on and offWear them when working from home to feel comfortable and that bit smarter.

fields.product_name: Vetements - Hug Me Bear Shearling Slippers - Men - Brown
fields.description: In traditional Vetements fashion, the label offers the most fun solution to walking bearfoot around the houseThese shearling slippers are shaped like fuzzy teddies, complete with VelcroÂ®-fastening pawsWear them with: Vetements T-shirt, Balenciaga Trousers, Undercover Necklace, MAPLE Earrings.

fields.product_name: Vetements - Hug Me Bear Shearling Slippers - Men - White
fields.description: In traditional Vetements fashion, the label offers the most fun solution to walking bearfoot around the houseThese shearling slippers are shaped like fuzzy teddies, complete with VelcroÂ®-fastening pawsWear them with: Vetements Sweater, Acne Studios Jeans, Maison Margiela Ring, Balenciaga Bracelet.

fields.product_name: Common Projects - Original Achilles Leather High-Top Sneakers - Men - Gray
fields.description: The Common Projects 'Original Achilles' has become something of a design classic thanks to the understated, clean finish and lack of obvious brandingThis high-top version comes in soft light-grey leather and is finished with the label's signature gold serial number stamp across the heelsShown here with a Folk blazer and trousers and A.P.CT-shirt.

fields.product_name: Common Projects - Original Achilles Leather Sneakers - Men - White
fields.description: White Leather, Gold Stamped Serial Numbers, Leather Linings, Rubber Soles, Lace-up, Come With Dust Bag And Spare Laces, Made In ItalyCommon Projects ' 'Original Achilles' sneakers have gained cult status thanks to their minimalist design and superior constructionThis white version is perfect for creating crisp city-smart looksWear this pair with rolled-up selvedge denim jeans and a lightweight knit for effortlessly understated flairShown here with Marvy Jamoke trousers, A.P.CT-shirt, Marvy Jamoke blazer, Uniform Wares watch.

fields.product_name: Common Projects - Original Achilles Full-Grain Leather Sneakers - Men - Black
fields.description: Black Full-grain Leather, Gold Stamped Serial Numbers, Leather Linings, Rubber Soles, Lace-up, Come With Dust Bag, Made In ItalyThis black version of Common Projects ' popular 'Original Achilles' style is a must-have for any sneaker aficionadoMade from supple yet durable full-grain leather, they're constructed in a streamlined tennis-shoe shape that will never dateShown here with A.P.Cpolo shirt, Acne Studios jeansThis item is large to size; see Size & Fit notes.

fields.product_name: Common Projects - Original Achilles Full-Grain Leather Sneakers - Men - Brown
fields.description: Brown Full-grain Leather, Gold Stamped Serial Numbers, Leather Linings, Rubber Soles, Lace-up, Come With Dust Bag, Made In ItalyA rich take on Common Projects ' hallmark 'Original Achilles' sneakers, this pair will ensure a stylish and comfortable stepThey've been expertly crafted in Italy from brown full-grain leather and set on supportive rubber solesWear them with shorts in the summer, switching to a sweater and chinos come autumnShown here with Engineered Garments jacket, Simon Miller shirt, A.P.CjeansThis item is large to size; see Size & Fit notes.

fields.product_name: Nike - Air Force 1 '07 Leather Sneakers - Men - White
fields.description: You'd be hard-pressed to find someone unfamiliar with Nike 's 'Air Force 1' sneakers, the low-top basketball shoes debuted in '82 and have been an icon ever sinceThis thick-soled, pristine white leather pair is based on the 2007 version of the designSpritz them with a mist of stain-repellent spray before you head outShown here with Nike jacket, John Elliott jeans, StÃ¼ssy T-shirt.

fields.product_name: Converse - Chuck 70 Canvas High-Top Sneakers - Men - Black
fields.description: Converse updates its original '70s basketball shoe using modern crafting techniques so they will last longerMade from heavy-duty black canvas, these sneakers are built with higher rubber foxing along the sidewalls, substantial toe caps and supportive cushioned footbedsTry wearing them with tailored trousersShown here with Cav Empt T-shirt, Jean Shop jeans, KAPITAL jacket.

fields.product_name: Common Projects - Original Achilles Suede Sneakers - Men - Black
fields.description: Common Projects founders Messrs Peter Poopat and Flavio Girolami met at a bar in the '90s and bonded over their shared love of 'Air Jordan', 'Stan Smith' and 'Chuck Taylor' sneakers, the iconic designs would eventually inform the duo's debut, the 'Original Achilles'This black pair has been made in Italy from smooth black suede, stamped with the brand's trademark serial numbers and set on coordinating rubber solesShown here with AMI jacket, Joseph T-shirt, Acne Studios sweatpants.

fields.product_name: Common Projects - BBall Leather Sneakers - Men - Black
fields.description: Common Projects' 'BBall' sneakers are inspired by classic basketball footwearThis sleek pair has been meticulously crafted in Italy from panels of smooth and textured-leatherThey look especially cool with long socks and cropped trousersWear them with: Mr PTrousers, Officine Generale Jacket, A.P.CT-shirt, Mr PSocks.

fields.product_name: Common Projects - Original Achilles Saffiano Leather Sneakers - Men - Gray
fields.description: Common Projects' 'Original Achilles' are deserving of a spot in any sneaker hall of fame, universally appreciated as they are for their minimal uppers, soft insoles and discreet gold serial numbersMade in the label's Italian workshop, this version comes in textural Saffiano leather and has rubber solesWear it with: A.P.CSweater, A.P.CCoat, AMI Trousers, Ray-Ban Sunglasses.

fields.product_name: Common Projects - Achilles Pebble-Grain Leather Sneakers - Men - Gray
fields.description: Common Projects' 'Achilles' sneakers are one of the best-selling styles of the last decade thanks to their minimalist design and quality materialsThis model is made from sturdy pebble-grain leather that won't show light scuffs and marks so obviously, and has signature rubber solesEach pair is stamped with a discreet gold serial numberWear it with: Mr PTrousers, Mr PT-shirt, A.P.CDenim jacket, Mr PSocks.

fields.product_name: Common Projects - Achilles Pebble-Grain Leather Sneakers - Men - White
fields.description: Common Projects' 'Achilles' sneakers are one of the best-selling styles of the last decade thanks to their minimalist design and quality materialsThis model is made from sturdy pebble-grain leather that won't show light scuffs and marks so obviously, and has signature rubber solesEach pair is stamped with a discreet gold serial numberWear it with: A.P.CShirt, A.P.CTrousers, Ray-Ban Sunglasses, A.P.CNecklace.

fields.product_name: Common Projects - Achilles Suede Sneakers - Men - Blue
fields.description: Common Projects' 'Achilles' is the collection to know when it comes to impeccable, minimalist sneakersMade from soft suede, this model has a low-top silhouetteThey're set on a chunky rubber sole which matches the colour of the lacesWear it with: A.P.CShorts, Folk Sweatshirt, Peyote Bird Bracelet, Mikia Bracelet.

fields.product_name: Common Projects - Track Classic Leather-Trimmed Suede and Ripstop Sneakers - Men - Black
fields.description: It comes as no surprise that Common Projects' latest 'Track Classic' sneakers are a flawless style, the brand has a knack for issuing minimal, high-quality kicks that fast become invaluable in your wardrobeThis pair has suede and ripstop uppers stamped with signature gold serial numbersThey're lined in smooth leather for optimal comfortWear it with: Officine GÃ©nÃ©rale Sweater, Mr PJacket, NN07 Suit trousers, Le Gramme Bracelet.

fields.product_name: Veja - Rio Branco Leather and Rubber-Trimmed Hexamesh and Suede Sneakers - Men - White
fields.description: Veja's 'Rio Blanco' sneakers are made from Hexamesh, a blend of organic cotton and recycled polyester that's super lightweight and breathableTrimmed with panels of leather and water-resistant suede, this pair is set on bouncy wild rubber soles sourced from the Amazonian forestWear it with: Sunspel Shirt, Officine Generale Jacket, SÃ©fr Trousers, Mr PSocks, Le Gramme Bracelet.

fields.product_name: Acne Studios - Leather Sneakers - Men - White
fields.description: While modelled after vintage styles, Acne Studios' leather sneakers have modern platform soles and utility-style rivets securing the lacesWear yours with jeans and tailored trousers alike.

fields.product_name: Bottega Veneta - Speedster Leather Sneakers - Men - Black
fields.description: Even Bottega Veneta's chunky sneakers are sleek and streamlinedEasy to wear with more formal outfits, too, this Italian-made black leather pair has substantial rubber midsoles for cushioning and supportStore them in the accompanying dust bags while travelling.

fields.product_name: Bottega Veneta - Dodger Intrecciato Leather Slip-On Sneakers - Men - Black
fields.description: Bottega Veneta 's combine refined intrecciato woven leather uppers with a sporty rubber soleSmall elasticated inserts at the side and pull tabs at the side make them easy to get onWear yours with everything from shorts and jeans to track pants and tailored trousersShown here with Bottega Veneta jacket, TOM FORD sweater, Prada trousers.

fields.product_name: Christian Louboutin - Louis Junior Spikes Cap-Toe Suede Sneakers - Men - White
fields.description: Christian Louboutin's 'Louis Junior' sneakers are a core style in its lineup, with different variations issued each seasonThis white leather pair is as classic as it gets, with tonal spiked toecaps delivering a bit of the brand's signature rock 'n' roll energy.

fields.product_name: Christian Louboutin - Happyrui Spiked Leather Sneakers - Men - White
fields.description: Christian Louboutin's 'Happyrui' sneakers are smart enough to team with tailoring while still allowing you to retain a bit of rock 'n' roll edge thanks to the tonal spikes across the toe boxesThey're made from white leather and lacquered with signature red soles that'll show with every step.

fields.product_name: Converse - Chuck 70 Canvas Sneakers - Men - Black
fields.description: Converse 's 'Chuck 70' sneakers are a revamped version of the original style we all know and love, the brand's iconic 'All Stars'They look almost identical, but have been upgraded for a better fit and feelThis black pair is made from a heavier-grade canvas and set on vulcanised rubber soles with slightly higher foxing which is a throwback to vintage stylesThe Ortholiteâ¢ footbeds provide a bit more cushioning, tooShown here with CMMN SWDN sweatpants, AMI T-shirt, Saturdays NYC shirt.

fields.product_name: Converse - Chuck 70 Canvas Sneakers - Men - Neutrals
fields.description: Converse 's sneakers look just like archival pairs from the '70sMade with higher rubber foxing and a cushioned footbed, this style feels comfortable to wear for hours and will go with just about any outfitThe heavier-grade canvas and vulcanised sole mean they're incredibly durable, tooShown here with Sunspel sweater, AMI jeans, A.P.Cparka.

fields.product_name: Common Projects - Track Classic Leather-Trimmed Suede and Ripstop Sneakers - Men - Brown
fields.description: It comes as no surprise that Common Projects' latest 'Track Classic' sneakers are a flawless style, the brand has a knack for issuing minimal, high-quality kicks that fast become invaluable in your wardrobeThis pair has suede and ripstop uppers stamped with signature gold serial numbersThey're lined in smooth leather for optimal comfortWear it with: Mr PSweater, Officine GÃ©nÃ©rale Trousers, Mr PSocks, Uniform Wares Watch.

fields.product_name: Common Projects - Achilles Suede and Leather Sneakers - Men - Green
fields.description: Common Projects' 'Achilles' is the collection to know when it comes to impeccable, minimalist sneakersMade from soft suede, this model has a low-top silhouetteThey're set on a chunky rubber sole which matches the colour of the lacesWear it with: Mr PShirt, Mr PJacket, Mr PJeans, A.P.CBracelet.

fields.product_name: Common Projects - Achilles Suede and Leather Sneakers - Men - Gray
fields.description: Since they were first introduced, Common Projects' cult 'Achilles' sneakers have been released in a variety of colourways and materialsThis pair is made from a combination of buttery suede and leather in a grey shade that'll work well with most trousersWear it with: Officine Generale Trousers, A.P.CJacket, Mr PT-shirt, Oliver Spencer Loungewear Socks.

fields.product_name: Common Projects - Achilles Pebble-Grain Leather Sneakers - Men - Burgundy
fields.description: Common Projects' 'Achilles' sneakers are one of the best-selling styles of the last decade thanks to their minimalist design and quality materialsThis model is made from sturdy pebble-grain leather that won't show light scuffs and marks so obviously, and has signature rubber solesEach pair is stamped with a discreet gold serial numberWear it with: A.P.CT-shirt, A.P.CTrousers, nonnative Bucket Hat, A.P.CBracelet.

fields.product_name: Common Projects - Retro Low Leather Sneakers - Men - White
fields.description: Common Projects' minimal designs go with just about anything, this 'Retro Low' model, for instance, works just as well with jeans as it does soft tailoringThey're made from leather and feature contrasting heel tabs, gold stamped serial numbers and stitching at the sidesWear it with: Velva Sheen T-Shirt, Bellerose Shirt, Nudie Jeans Jeans, Le Gramme Bracelet.

fields.product_name: Common Projects - Achilles Pebble-Grain Leather Sneakers - Men - Green
fields.description: Common Projects' 'Achilles' sneakers are one of the best-selling styles of the last decade thanks to their minimalist design and quality materialsThis model is made from sturdy pebble-grain leather that won't show light scuffs and marks so obviously, and has signature rubber solesEach pair is stamped with a discreet gold serial numberWear it with: Prada Raincoat, Officine Generale Trousers, Altea Sweater, Mr PT-shirt.

fields.product_name: Common Projects - Original Achilles Leather Sneakers - Men - Neutrals
fields.description: Common Projects' 'Original Achilles' are the first sneakers Messrs Peter Poopat and Flavio Girolami worked on together, and the sleek design hasn't changed sinceThis beige leather pair is set on tan rubber soles and comes with crisp matching laces.

fields.product_name: Common Projects - Achilles Suede Sneakers - Men - Gray
fields.description: Common Projects' 'Achilles' is the collection to know when it comes to impeccable, minimalist sneakersMade from soft suede, this model has a low-top silhouetteThey're set on a chunky rubber sole which matches the colour of the lacesWear it with: Mr PJeans, A.P.CT-shirt, A.P.CSweater, Officine Generale Jacket.

fields.product_name: Common Projects - Original Achilles Leather High-Top Sneakers - Men - Black
fields.description: Black Leather, Gold Stamped Serial Numbers, Leather Linings, Rubber Soles, Lace-up, Come With Dust Bag And Spare Laces, Made In ItalyCommon Projects has built its impressive reputation on superb construction and pared-back design, as these high-top 'Original Achilles' sneakers demonstrateCrafted in Italy from high-shine black leather, they'll add a shot of sleek texture to your contemporary lineupShown here with Polo Ralph Lauren T-shirt, Simon Miller jeans, Officine Generale cardigan, Mikia bracelet.

fields.product_name: Common Projects - Original Achilles Leather High-Top Sneakers - Men - White
fields.description: White Nappa Leather, Gold Stamped Serial Numbers, Leather Linings, Rubber Soles, Lace-up, Come With Dust Bag And Spare Laces, Made In ItalyDesigned in Manhattan and made in Italy, Common Projects' nappa leather high-top sneakers are a lesson in minimalist restraint and superior craftsmanshipDetailed with the label's signature gold serial number stamp denoting the style, colour and size of the shoe, this sleek pair will work equally well with slim-fit jeans or a tailored suitShown here with a Lanvin Jacket, John Elliott T-Shirt, Michael Kors Sweatpants, Burberry Backpack.

fields.product_name: Common Projects - Track Classic Leather-Trimmed Suede and Ripstop Sneakers - Men - Blue
fields.description: It comes as no surprise that Common Projects' latest 'Track Classic' sneakers are a flawless style, the brand has a knack for issuing minimal, high-quality kicks that fast become invaluable in your wardrobeThis pair has suede and ripstop uppers stamped with signature gold serial numbersThey're lined in smooth leather for optimal comfortWear it with: Mr PShirt, Folk Jacket, Barena Trousers, Common Projects Pouch.

fields.product_name: Common Projects - Original Achilles Leather Sneakers - Men - Black
fields.description: Black Leather, Gold Stamped Serial Numbers, Leather Linings, Rubber Soles, Lace-up, Comes With Dust Bag, Made In ItalyFans return to Common Projects for the brand's clean, minimalist style and superior construction, both of which are demonstrated by these black leather 'Original Achilles' sneakersThe design is one of the label's most popular, and has no detailing, save for the sleek signature golden stamp on the heelsShown here with Officine Generale blazer, Officine Generale shirt, Loro Piana sweatpants, Maison Margiela T-shirt.

fields.product_name: Common Projects - Original Achilles Leather Sneakers - Men - Gray
fields.description: Light-grey Leather, Gold Stamped Serial Numbers, Leather Linings, Rubber Soles, Lace-up, Come With Dust Bag, Made In ItalyThe 'Original Achilles' is Common Projects' most popular style and it's easy to see whyCombining the best in pared-back design with top-notch Italian construction, these light-grey leather sneakers represent a contemporary approach to luxuryShown here with an Acne Studios jacket, Neil Barrett T-shirt and Casely-Hayford trousers.

fields.product_name: Common Projects - Original Achilles Leather Sneakers - Men - Blue
fields.description: Navy Leather, Gold Stamped Serial Numbers, Leather Linings, Rubber Soles, Made In Italy, Come With Dust BagCommon Projects designers Messers Peter Poopat and Flavio Girolami originally created the Achilles sneakers for themselves to wear during the summerAlmost a decade later, the cult style comes in a multitude of shapes and shades, like this rich navy pairThe gold serial number stamping on the heel is set off by the deep blue hueShown here with a Tim Coppens jacket, Tomorrowland sweater, AMI trousers and Junya Watanabe socks.

fields.product_name: Common Projects - BBall Leather Sneakers - Men - White
fields.description: White Smooth And Textured-leather, Gold Stamped Serial Numbers, Perforated Toe Boxes, Leather Linings, Rubber Soles, Come With Dust Bag And Spare Laces, Made In ItalyCommon Projects ' 'BBall' sneakers are inspired by classic basketball footwearMeticulously crafted in Italy from panels of smooth and textured-leather, this slick pair is a top-notch choice for the weekendWear them sockless with rolled-up chinosShown here with a Marni sweatshirt, StÃ¼ssy T-shirt, OAMC trousers and a Maison Margiela toteThis item is large to size; see Size & Fit notes.

fields.product_name: Diemme - Marostica Leather Sneakers - Men - Black
fields.description: Diemme launched its 'Marostica' sneakers over a decade ago, and the best-selling style has remained virtually unchanged sinceConstructed in the brand's factory in the heart of OnÃ¨ di Fonte, Italy, his pair has smooth leather uppers and D-ring laces in homage to the label's mountaineering heritageThe durable 'Serena' rubber soles are made at a local family-run workshop.

fields.product_name: Diemme - Iseo Textured-Leather Sneakers - Men - Black
fields.description: EXCLUSIVE AT MR PORTERDiemme makes all of its sneakers at the Calzaturificio Diemme factory in OnÃ¨ di Fonte, Veneto, a town famous for its performance footwearThese 'Iseo' low-tops are crafted from textured-leather and have thick rubber soles for comfort and traction.

fields.product_name: Grenson - Hand-Painted Leather Sneakers - Men - Brown
fields.description: Inspired by '70s tennis shoes, Grenson 's sneakers have a neat streamlined profile that works with sweatpants and tailoring alikeThis handmade pair has leather uppers that are expertly hand-painted in tonal shades of brown for a burnished appearance, and are finished with thick rubber soles.

fields.product_name: Gucci - Ace Crocodile-Trimmed Leather Sneakers - Men - Black
fields.description: Gucci's 'Ace' sneakers first launched back in 2016 and over the years they've been worn by the likes of Messrs Justin Timberlake, Eddie Redmayne and A$AP RockyConstructed in Italy with black leather uppers and mismatched watersnake heel tabs, they're trimmed with the brand's signature striped webbing and set on rubber soles for traction.

fields.product_name: Gucci - Distressed Canvas and Webbing Sneakers - Men - Black
fields.description: Gucci's sneakers are inspired by classic tennis shoes from the '70s, and are distressed to look just like the perfect vintage pairMade from durable canvas, they're finished with some of the brand's most distinctive motifs, including two-tone webbing and 'GG'-moulded rubber soles.

fields.product_name: Gucci - Ace Snake-Trimmed Leather Sneakers - Men - Black
fields.description: Expect no classic design to go without an update in the hands of Gucci 's Creative Director Mr Alessandro MicheleCrafted in Italy from soft black leather, these 'Ace' sneakers are finished with the brand's iconic red and green webbing and have snake-trimmed heelsThe smooth interior and thick rubber soles will cushion every stepShown here with Gucci polo shirt, Gucci sweater, Gucci trousers.
fields.material: Soft Leather 75% / Various Materials 20% / Textile fibres 5%

fields.product_name: J.M. Weston - Nubuck Sneakers - Men - Black
fields.description: These black nubuck J.MWeston sneakers are on our shortlist of pairs to wear with suiting, they're simple, sleek and comfortableMade in France using the same attention to detail as its sought-after loafers, they have tonal black laces and eyelets and are set on contrasting cushioned rubber solesShown here with Officine Generale T-shirt, Altea trousers, Barena shirt.

fields.product_name: John Lobb - Levah Cap-Toe Suede and Leather Sneakers - Men - Neutrals
fields.description: Off-white Brushed-leather , Leather Linings, Rubber Soles, Lace-up, Come With Dust Bags, Made In ItalyEsteemed English shoemaker John Lobb offers a considered addition to your contemporary repertoire with these impeccably crafted sneakersThis minimalist low-top design is made from premium leather with a subtly brushed finish and chalky-white tone for an understated appearanceTeam them with trim casual trousers at weekends.

fields.product_name: John Lobb - Levah Cap-Toe Suede and Leather Sneakers - Men - Blue
fields.description: Midnight-blue Suede And Leather, Leather Trims And Linings, Rubber Soles, Lace-up, Made In ItalyHeritage firm John Lobb is known for its traditional shoemaking and the label's sneaker offering is equally impressiveThese slick suede and leather 'Levah' low-tops come in a handsome midnight-blue and are set on comfortable, durable rubber solesWear them to lend sharp tailoring modern attitude.

fields.product_name: Maison Margiela - Replica Suede and Leather Sneakers - Men - Black
fields.description: Maison Margiela's all-black sneakers are easy to dress up or down â they look just as good with tailored trousers as they do with shortsModelled after athletic shoes from the '70s, they're made from a combination of leather and suede and have hidden elasticated straps inside, so you can forgo laces.

fields.product_name: Maison Margiela - Replica Leather and Suede Sneakers - Men - Black
fields.description: Maison Margiela 's all-black sneakers are easy to dress up or down, they look just as good with tailored trousers as they do with shortsModelled after athletic shoes from the '70s, they're made from a combination of leather and suede and have hidden elasticated straps inside, so you can wear them without the laces for a more streamlined lookShown here with Loewe coat, Balenciaga T-shirt, Loewe jeans.
fields.material: Replica Leather and Suede fabric / inner:fabric&rubber / sole:rubber:Upper: Fabric / Inner: Fabric & Rubber / Sole: Rubber rubber sole

fields.product_name: Moncler - New Monaco Striped Leather Sneakers - Men - Black
fields.description: Just like the label's signature outerwear, Moncler 's 'New Monaco' sneakers are expertly made from quality, durable materialsThey have smooth leather uppers carefully sewn to the rubber soles and are accented with pinked edges and tricolour stripesShown here with Prada sweatpants, Prada hoodie, Prada sweater.
fields.material: inner sole leather and textileoutter leather sole rubber

fields.product_name: Moncler - Monaco Leather Sneakers - Men - Black
fields.description: Moncler's 'Monaco' sneakers are sporty, smart and comfortable to stroll around inThey have smooth black leather uppers and are set on lightweight white rubber soles for some monochromatic contrastThe signature tricolour is sewn onto the sides, marking them out as one of the brand's designs.

fields.product_name: Valentino - Valentino Garavani Open Rockstud Leather Sneakers - Men - Black
fields.description: Valentino Garavani's sneakers are done in a black-on-black monotone so they'll work with both casual and smarter outfitsMade in Italy from smooth leather, they're punctuated with tonal Rockstuds and fasten beneath the tongue to keep the silhouette streamlined.

fields.product_name: Valentino - Valentino Garavani Open Striped Leather Sneakers - Men - White
fields.description: Valentino Garavani's aptly titled 'Open' sneakers are designed with only half the laces on show, preventing anything interrupting the minimal black stripe across the frontThis Italian-made pair has smooth leather uppers set on rubber soles, and tonal Rockstuds detailing the heels.

fields.product_name: Valentino - Valentino Garavani Rockrunner Camouflage-Print Canvas, Leather and Suede Sneakers - Men - Black
fields.description: We always look forward to new editions of Valentino Garavani's 'Rockrunner' sneakers, and this all-black pair doesn't disappointThey're made from camouflage-print canvas, leather and suede and embellished with signature studs â they're modelled after the pyramid-shaped nailheads of ancient Roman doors in the house's native city.

fields.product_name: Veja - Campo Suede-Trimmed Leather Sneakers - Men - White
fields.description: Veja performs routine spot checks on its sneakers to ensure that they're consistently up to scratch with its rules around responsible manufactureThis 'Campo' pair is made from chrome-free leather and set on natural rubber solesThe tonal-white palette will work with everything from denim to tailoringWear them with: Sunspel Sweatshirt, Mr PRaincoat, Aspesi Trousers, Les Girls Les Boys Socks, Le Gramme Bracelet.

fields.product_name: Veja - V-12 Leather Sneakers - Men - White
fields.description: Veja is all about simplified design, and these 'V-12' sneakers can be worn with pretty much anythingThey're made from leather that's tanned without chrome and detailed with the distinctive 'V' logoThe breathable jersey linings are made from organic cotton and recycled fibres, while the wild rubber for the soles is responsibly sourced from the Amazon rainforestWear it with: Maison KitsunÃ© Cardigan, Mr PT-Shirt, Officine Generale Trousers, Paul Smith Socks.

fields.product_name: Veja - Esplar Rubber-Trimmed Leather Sneakers - Men - White
fields.description: Veja produces footwear in an environmentally friendly fashion, frequently visiting factories and carefully selecting its materialsThese vintage-style 'Esplar' sneakers are made from supple leather and set on sustainably sourced rubber solesWear yours with your trousers cuffed to show off the brand's 'V' logo.

fields.product_name: Veja - Campo Rubber-Trimmed Full-Grain Leather Sneakers - Men - Black
fields.description: Veja's 'Campo' sneakers have a sleek low-top silhouette that'll look great with casual and smart outfits alikeLined in organic cotton, they're made from chrome-free black full-grain leather and have logo-print heel tabsThe signature 'V' motifs and soles are moulded from wild Amazonian rubber, sourcing it allows the brand to support local communities.

fields.product_name: Veja - V-10 Rubber-Trimmed Leather Sneakers - Men - White
fields.description: Before starting production on its sneakers, Veja co-founders Messrs SÃ©bastien Kopp and Francois Ghislain Morillion took a trip to the Amazonian rain forest, the local seringueiros taught them how to work in harmony with the environment and have a positive impact on societyMade from raw materials, these leather 'V-10' sneakers have rubber trims and soles sourced directly from the trees thereThe cotton linings and padded collars ensure a comfortable fitShown here with Sandro sweater, AMI overshirt, Acne Studios trousers.

fields.product_name: Veja - V-10 CWL Faux Leather Sneakers - Men - White
fields.description: Here at MR PORTER HQ, there's always someone wearing Veja sneakers, which we put down to them being consciously made and versatile enough to go with anythingConstructed with faux leather uppers, this 'V-10 CWL' pair has perforated toecaps for ventilation and comfortable padded collarsThey're set on natural rubber soles which are responsibly harvested from the Amazon rainforestWear it with: Velva Sheen T-Shirt, Officine Generale Jacket, Barena Trousers, Mr PSocks, Le Gramme Bracelet.

fields.product_name: Veja - V-12 Suede-Trimmed Leather Sneakers - Men - White
fields.description: Veja doesn't cut corners when it comes to selecting its raw materials, the wild rubber for the soles on these 'V-12' sneakers, for example, is responsibly sourced from the Amazon rainforestMade from supple leather, they're trimmed with suede heel tabs and have soft jersey liningsCuff your jeans or chinos to showcase the 'V' logos at the sidesWear it with: Vans T-shirt, Alex Mill Jacket, Norse Projects Trousers, Les Girls Les Boys Socks, Le Gramme Bracelet.

fields.product_name: Veja - V-10 CWL Faux Leather Sneakers - Men - Black
fields.description: Here at MR PORTER HQ, there's always someone wearing Veja sneakers, which we put down to them being consciously made and versatile enough to go with anythingConstructed with faux leather uppers, this 'V-10 CWL' pair has perforated toecaps for ventilation and comfortable padded collarsThey're set on natural rubber soles which are responsibly harvested from the Amazonian rainforestWear it with: A.P.CSweater, Theory Trousers, Mr PSocks, Le Gramme Bracelet.

fields.product_name: Rhude - Rhecess Distressed Leather High-Top Sneakers - Men - Red
fields.description: Rhude's 'Rhecess' leather sneakers are modelled on vintage basketball shoes, and the brand came up with an old-school ad campaign to show how authentically retro they feelFitted with comfortable padded collars, they're set on red rubber soles and appliquÃ©d with the label's moniker on the heels.

fields.product_name: Rhude - RH V1 Shell High-Top Sneakers - Men - Black
fields.description: Rhude's high-top 'RH V1' sneakers strike a fine balance between minimalism and eye-catching streetwear appealMade from sleek black shell, they have contrasting white stitching, reflective tongues and are set on transparent rubber soles.

fields.product_name: Rick Owens - Grosgrain-Trimmed Leather Sneakers - Men - Burgundy
fields.description: Mr Rick Owens is a class act when it comes to streamlined yet distinctive silhouettesThese sneakers have been made in Italy from smooth leather and set on transparent rubber soles for plenty of grip and supportWear them with everything from tailoring, to sweatpants and denimWear them with: Vetements Cardigan, Rick Owens Pants, Prada T-shirt, Tom Wood Ring.

fields.product_name: Rick Owens - Grosgrain-Trimmed Leather Sneakers - Men - Gray
fields.description: Mr Rick Owens is a class act when it comes to streamlined yet distinctive silhouettesThese sneakers have been made in Italy from smooth leather and set on chunky rubber soles for plenty of grip and supportWear them with everything from tailoring, to sweatpants and denimWear them with: Dries Van Noten Trousers, Bottega Veneta Sweater, Bottega Veneta Raincoat, A.P.CNecklace.

fields.product_name: Rick Owens - Ramones Coated-Leather High-Top Sneakers - Men - Black
fields.description: Mr Rick Owens' shoes continue to be totally distinctive in terms of profile and use of materialsThese 'Ramones' boot-sneaker hybrids have been crafted in Italy from smooth coated-leather that almost looks like tape and set on a serrated chunky sole for plenty of gripTry yours with a pair of the brand's sweatpantsWear them with: Rick Owens Shorts, Rick Owens T-shirt, Rick Owens Sweater, Tom Wood Ring.

fields.product_name: SAINT LAURENT - Leather High-Top Sneakers - Men - Black
fields.description: The graphic monochrome panels and distinctive high-top silhouette of SAINT LAURENT's sneakers echo iconic court styles from the '90sMade in Italy from a combination of smooth and perforated leather, they're detailed with red trims and have substantial soles that are lightly distressed for a lived-in feelRoll up your trousers to show off the gold lettering at the heels.

fields.product_name: Valentino - Valentino Garavani Logo-Detailed Tech-Canvas High-Top Sneakers - Men - Black
fields.description: Valentino Garavani's high-tops are detailed with the house's abbreviated 'VLTN' logo, it's an archival emblem from the '80s that Creative Director Mr Pierpaolo Piccioli recently reintroducedThey're made from black canvas and feature premium leather trimsWear it with: Valentino Garavani Shirt, Prada Trousers, Prada Bucket hat, Prada Socks.

fields.product_name: Vans - OG SK8-Hi LX Leather-Trimmed Suede and Canvas High-Top Sneakers - Men - Black
fields.description: Vans' 'OG SK8-Hi LX' sneakers riff on the classic 'Old Skool' style and were the first high-tops to incorporate the same signature 'waves'Made from hard-wearing canvas and suede, this leather-trimmed pair has reinforced toecaps, padded collars and vulcanised rubber soles.

fields.product_name: Vans - Free & Easy OG SK8-HI LX Leather-Trimmed Canvas and Suede High-Top Sneakers - Men - Yellow
fields.description: Vans and Free & Easy team up to reimagine the former's signature 'OG SK8-HI LX' high-top sneakersTaking cues from '70s SoCal vibes, they're made from a combination of sturdy canvas and suede, and feature the LA brand's 'Don't Trip' slogan embroidered at the side.
fields.material: Upper Leather AND Textyle Inner Textyle Sole Rubber

fields.product_name: Vans - Free & Easy OG SK8-HI LX Leather-Trimmed Canvas and Suede High-Top Sneakers - Men - Blue
fields.description: Vans and Free & Easy team up to reimagine the former's signature 'OG SK8-HI LX' high-top sneakersTaking cues from '70s SoCal vibes, they're made from a combination of sturdy canvas and suede, and feature the LA brand's 'Don't Trip' slogan embroidered at the side.
fields.material: upeerl leater and texsri sole ruber

fields.product_name: Vans - UA OG SK8-Hi LX Leather-Trimmed Canvas High-Top Sneakers - Men - Black
fields.description: Following Vans' 'Old Skool' style, the 'SK8-Hi' sneakers were among the first to feature the label's signature side stripe, a design created by co-founder Mr Paul Van Doren and originally dubbed the 'Jazz Stripe'This 'UA OG LX' pair is made from durable canvas and set on flat waffled soles.

fields.product_name: visvim - Skagway Leather-Trimmed Canvas High-Top Sneakers - Men - Blue
fields.description: The retro-inspired 'Skagway' sneakers are one of visvim's most popular styles and come in a variety of colours, patterns and silhouettesThis high-top version is made from durable canvas, trimmed with leather and set on vulcanised rubber solesThe navy colour makes it easy to work into your casual wardrobeWear it with: Blue Blue Japan Shirt, Blue Blue Japan Trousers, KAPITAL Bracelet, The Elder Statesman Socks.

fields.product_name: Givenchy - Urban Street Leather Sneakers - Men - White
fields.description: Givenchy 's 'Urban Street' sneakers nod to classic tennis shoesImpeccably made from white leather, they have red heel tabs for a point of difference and knotted detailing, a signature that will catch the eye of brand loyalistsShown here with Givenchy sweatpants, Givenchy T-shirt, Givenchy jacket.

fields.product_name: Balenciaga - Triple S Mesh, Nubuck and Leather Sneakers - Men - White
fields.description: Since they were first introduced by Mr Demna Gvasalia in 2017, Balenciaga's 'Triple S' have become some of the most in-demand sneakers of all timesCombining running, track and basketball styles, they're set on chunky tricolour soles and have white, beige and grey mesh and leather uppers and are finished with hiking-inspired lacesShown here with Balenciaga hoodie, Balenciaga trousers, Balenciaga T-shirt.
fields.material: Textile fibres 40% / Soft Leather 40% / Various Materials 20%

fields.product_name: Vans - OG Classic LX Canvas Slip-On Sneakers - Men - Black
fields.description: Vans' 'Slip-On' sneakers were originally a favourite among surfers, sand and socks don't mix, so they solved a problem and looked cool in the processThis 'OG Classic LX' pair is made from durable canvas and set on vulcanised rubber solesThey're ideal for running out the door or getting through airport security without a hitch.

fields.product_name: adidas Originals - Continental 80 Full-Grain Leather Sneakers - Men - White
fields.description: adidas Originals' sneakers hark back to the '80s, when tennis styles featured split rubber cupsoles and retro stripes like the ones on this 'Continental' pairDesigned with full-grain leather uppers, they have ventilating perforations and plush terry Ortholite sockliners inside.

fields.product_name: Vans - OG Classic LX Canvas Sneakers - Men - White
fields.description: Vans' 'OG Classic LX' sneakers recall the '44's', the very first kicks the brand produced at its Californian factory in 1966They're made from canvas offset with contrast foxing tape along the rubber soles.

fields.product_name: Balenciaga - Triple S Clear Sole Mesh Sneakers - Men - Black
fields.description: Since making their debut for AW17, Balenciaga's 'Triple S' sneakers have proven themselves an icon in their own rightThis latest 'Clear Sole' iteration is made from a combination of intentionally distressed mesh, nubuck and leather, and set on unmistakable rubber soles stacked three high, the blown-up proportions are inspired by styles seen in '90s America.

fields.product_name: Balenciaga - Triple S Clear Sole Mesh, Nubuck and Leather Sneakers - Men - Black
fields.description: Balenciaga keeps reinventing its 'Triple S' sneakers in fresh colorways and fabricationsMade from panels of nubuck, mesh and leather, this all-black pair is washed for a worn-in feel and rests on a trio of stacked rubber soles, including one clear oneThey're embroidered with the brand's moniker and European size in contrasting white threadsShown here with Balenciaga jeans, Balenciaga T-shirt, Balenciaga hoodie, Balenciaga bracelet.

fields.product_name: Balenciaga - Track.2 Nylon, Mesh and Rubber Sneakers - Men - Neutrals
fields.description: Balenciaga's Mr Demna Gvasalia knows a thing or two about sell-out sneakers â following suit from the 'Triple S', this 'Track.2' style is one of the brand's most sought-after designsSet on chunky rubber soles, they're made from nylon, mesh and rubber and detailed with the label's moniker at the sides.

fields.product_name: Balenciaga - Triple S Clear Sole Mesh, Nubuck and Leather Sneakers - Men - Neutrals
fields.description: Balenciaga's 'Triple S' sneakers have been a firm favourite for a number of seasons now, and are showing no signs of slowing downThis all-beige pair has mesh, leather and nubuck uppers and is set on a trio of clear stacked rubber soles.

fields.product_name: Tod's - Leather and Suede-Trimmed Nubuck Sneakers - Men - Black
fields.description: The minimal, tonal design of Tod's sneakers means they'll work with so many outfits you already ownThey're panelled from nubuck, leather and suede and stamped with the brand's logo at the sidesWear it with: Loro Piana Sweater, Brunello Cucinelli Jeans, Loro Piana Socks, Bremont Watch.

fields.product_name: Nike - Air Force 1 '07 Leather Sneakers - Men - Black
fields.description: You'd be hard pressed to find someone unfamiliar with Nike's 'Air Force 1' sneakers, the low-top basketball shoes debuted in '82 and have been an icon ever sinceThis thick-soled, black leather pair is based on the 2007 version of the design.

fields.product_name: Gucci - Ace Webbing-Trimmed Embroidered Leather Sneakers - Men - White
fields.description: A fan favourite since it was introduced in 2016, Gucci's 'Ace' sneaker has been updated numerous timesThis leather pair is detailed with an embroidered anchor and flower (key fixtures in recent collections), along with the house's moniker and classic webbing trimsWear them with everything from suiting to sweatpantsWear it with: Gucci Jeans, Gucci Polo shirt, Gucci Cardigan, Gucci Socks.

fields.product_name: Nike - Air Force 1 07 Suede-Trimmed Leather Sneakers - Men - White
fields.description: Modelled on a 2007 iteration, this latest release of Nike's iconic 'Air Force 1' sneaker is quite the elevated takeThey're made from supple leather, contrasted with brushed-suede at the heels and come complete with padded collars, mesh linings and bouncy Air midsoles.

fields.product_name: Officine Creative - Race Lux Leather Sneakers - Men - Blue
fields.description: Officine Creative's 'Race Lux' sneakers have undergone a series of meticulous processes to get the patina just rightThey're made from leather in a sleek and minimal shape that makes them look smart, while the breathable mesh lining and bouncy rubber soles ensure they're comfortable enough to walk around in all dayWear it with: Officine Generale Trousers, A.P.CSweater, Mr POvershirt.

fields.product_name: Santoni - Leather Sneakers - Men - White
fields.description: Santoni's sneakers are ideal if your style errs on the more minimal sideMade in Italy from soft leather, they have a sleek low-top silhouette and tonal rubber solesWear them with: De Petrillo Shirt, Loro Piana Trousers, Altea Sweater, Isaia Bracelet.

fields.product_name: Fear of God Essentials - Leather-Trimmed Suede and Mesh Sneakers - Men - Neutrals
fields.description: Mr Jerry Lorenzo's Fear Of God Essentials label delivers on its namesake â the collection is packed with pieces you're sure to turn to time and againThese sneakers are made from panels of mesh, suede and leather in neutral tones and rest atop rubber soles that are comfortably cushionedWear them with: Fear of God for Ermenegildo Zegna T-shirt, Fear of God for Ermenegildo Zegna Trousers, Fear of God for Ermenegildo Zegna Jacket, Fear of God for Ermenegildo Zegna Belt.

fields.product_name: A-COLD-WALL* - 180 Strand Leather, Nubuck and Mesh Sneakers - Men - Black
fields.description: A-COLD-WALL*'s sneakers take their name from the experimental art space occupying a brutalist site at the London address 180 StrandThey're panelled from leather, nubuck and mesh in all-black and grounded on serrated tracks, and a midsole designed to resemble clayWear it with: A-COLD-WALL* Cardigan, A-COLD-WALL* Trousers, A-COLD-WALL* T-shirt, A-COLD-WALL* Pouch.

fields.product_name: Acne Studios - Faux Suede and Rubber-Trimmed Ripstop Sneakers - Men - Neutrals
fields.description: Acne Studios' sneakers borrow elements from durable trail running styles, like ripstop uppers and reinforced placketsDetailed with faux suede and rubber trims, they have comfortable padded collars, breathable mesh linings and gripped solesWear it with: Acne Studios Trousers, Acne Studios Shirt, Balenciaga Sunglasses, Tom Wood Ring.

fields.product_name: AMI - Full-Grain Leather Sneakers - Men - White
fields.description: An arbiter of wardrobe essentials, it would be remiss if AMI didn't create a solid pair of white leather sneakersThis basketball-inspired pair has perforated full-grain uppers and is embroidered with a logo on the padded collarWear it with: AMI T-Shirt, AMI Trousers, AMI Hat, Bunney Ring.

fields.product_name: AMI - Leather and Suede Sneakers - Men - White
fields.description: Mr Alexandre Mattiussi models AMI's smart, simple designs after what Parisians wear day in, day outInspired by old-school athletic sneakers, these leather and suede low-tops are embroidered with the logo at the heels and have thick gum-rubber solesWear it with: AMI T-Shirt, AMI Trousers.

fields.product_name: AMI - Spring Low Suede-Trimmed Shell Sneakers - Men - Black
fields.description: AMI's collections are inspired by Paris â both the style of its residents and their requirement for practicality when navigating the cityDesigned with the latter in mind, these 'Spring' sneakers have bouncy rubber soles, breathable mesh linings, and suede-trimmed shell uppersThe minimal palette means they'll work with a range of outfitsWear them with: AMI Sweater, AMI Trousers, AMI Necklace, AMI Hat.

fields.product_name: AMIRI - Skel Toe Leather-AppliquÃ©d Canvas and Suede Slip-On Sneakers - Men - Black
fields.description: AMIRI's cult-favourite 'Skel Toe' sneakers have been spotted on the likes of Metallica's Mr Kirk HammettThey have suede and canvas uppers detailed with leather appliquÃ©s hand-cut and painted by artisansSet on vulcanised rubber soles, they're trimmed with heel tabs bearing the brand's moniker and flexible elasticated insertsShown here with AMIRI hoodie, SasquatchfabrixT-shirt, AMIRI jeans.
fields.material: Soft Leather 50% / Textile fibres 30% / Various Materials 20%

fields.product_name: Acne Studios - Faux Suede and Rubber-Trimmed Ripstop Sneakers - Men - Black
fields.description: Acne Studios' sneakers borrow elements from durable trail running styles, like ripstop uppers and reinforced placketsDetailed with faux suede and rubber trims, they have comfortable padded collars, breathable mesh linings and gripped soles.

fields.product_name: Acne Studios - Buzz Faux Suede and Rubber-Trimmed Mesh Sneakers - Men - Black
fields.description: The sleek, aerodynamic shape of Acne Studios' 'Buzz' sneakers is informed by archival running and trail shoesThey're made from black mesh and suede, and feature rubber overlays that create a graphic patternUse the logo-print pull tabs to easily get them onWear it with: Acne Studios Sweater, Bottega Veneta Trousers, Velva Sheen T-shirt, Le Gramme Bracelet.

fields.product_name: Acne Studios - Faux Suede and Rubber-Trimmed Ripstop Sneakers - Men - Gray
fields.description: Acne Studios' sneakers borrow elements from durable trail running styles, like ripstop uppers and reinforced placketsDetailed with fluorescent faux suede and rubber trims, they have comfortable padded collars, breathable mesh linings and gripped soles.

fields.product_name: Acne Studios - Leather Sneakers - Men - Black
fields.description: Acne Studios' sneakers take cues from classic tennis styles and have cool retro design elementsThey're made from black leather, set on thick rubber soles and feature perforated toe boxes and oversized VelcroÂ® fasteningsThe brand's signature face emojis can be seen at the back of each heelWear it with: Acne Studios Sweatshirt, Human Made T-Shirt, Acne Studios Jeans.

fields.product_name: Acne Studios - Buzz Faux Suede and Rubber-Trimmed Mesh Sneakers - Men - White
fields.description: The sleek, aerodynamic shape of Acne Studios' 'Buzz' sneakers is informed by archival running and trail shoesThey're made from black mesh and suede, and feature rubber overlays that create a graphic patternUse the logo-print pull tabs to easily get them onWear it with: Bottega Veneta Jacket, Velva Sheen T-shirt, Acne Studios Jeans, A.P.CBag.

fields.product_name: Alexander McQueen - Glow-In-The-Dark Exaggerated-Sole Rubber-Trimmed Leather Sneakers - Men - White
fields.description: Exaggerated-sole sneakers are an Alexander McQueen signature, but this pair has an unexpected twist, they're treated with a colourful, fluorescent splatter pattern that only appears in the darkThey've been made in Italy from white leather and stamped with the brand name at the tongues and heel tabsWear it with: Alexander McQueen Sweater, Alexander McQueen Trousers, Alexander McQueen Tote, Alexander McQueen Earring.

fields.product_name: Alexander McQueen - Exaggerated-Sole Reflective-Trimmed Leather Sneakers - Men - White
fields.description: Alexander McQueen's cult sneakers debuted on the brand's SS15 runway and they've taken on countless iterations over the yearsConstructed in Italy with supple white leather uppers, this pair is detailed with branded reflective heel tabs and perforated sides to boost airflowThe signature exaggerated soles are updated in transparent rubber which gives them even more of a futuristic feelWear it with: Givenchy Trousers, Prada Raincoat, Alexander McQueen Bracelet.

fields.product_name: Alexander McQueen - Exaggerated-Sole Reflective-Trimmed Leather Sneakers - Men - Black
fields.description: Alexander McQueen's cult sneakers debuted on the brand's SS15 runway and they've taken on countless iterations over the yearsConstructed in Italy with supple leather uppers, this pair is detailed with branded reflective heel tabs and perforated sides to boost airflowThe signature exaggerated soles are updated in transparent rubber which gives them even more of a futuristic feelWear it with: Acne Studios Sweatshirt, Balenciaga Trousers.

fields.product_name: Alexander McQueen - Exaggerated-Sole Suede Sneakers - Men - Black
fields.description: The exaggerated soles on Alexander McQueen's sneakers are an instantly recognisable brand signatureThis pair has been made in Italy from supple black suede and has tonal details for a streamlined look, including the laces, eyelets and stitching.

fields.product_name: Alexander McQueen - Rubber-Trimmed Canvas Sneakers - Men - White
fields.description: Alexander McQueen's shoes combine elements from sneakers and outdoor hiking stylesMade in Italy with canvas uppers, they're detailed with embossed logos and have durable rubber toecaps, high sidewalls and thick lug soles.

fields.product_name: Alexander McQueen - Exaggerated-Sole Neon Snake-Effect Leather Sneakers - Men - White
fields.description: If the exaggerated soles on these leather Alexander McQueen sneakers don't grab attention, the neon-yellow laces and snake-effect heels sure willTeam them with otherwise simple pieces to strike the right balance.

fields.product_name: Alexander McQueen - Tread Slick Suede-Trimmed Leather Sneakers - Men - Black
fields.description: Consider these 'Tread Slick' sneakers the sportier version of Alexander McQueen's exaggerated-sole modelThey rest on similarly chunky bases and are panelled from suede and perforated leatherWear them with track pants or jeansWear them with: Givenchy T-shirt, Balenciaga Sweatpants, Givenchy Bag, Balenciaga Sunglasses.

fields.product_name: Balenciaga - Triple S Mesh and Faux Leather Sneakers - Men - White
fields.description: Since they were first introduced by Mr Demna Gvasalia in 2017, Balenciaga's 'Triple S' have become some of the most in-demand sneakers of all timesCombining running, track and basketball styles, they're set on chunky clear rubber soles and have mesh and faux leather uppers and are finished with hiking-inspired lacesWear it with: Balenciaga Sweater, Balenciaga Trousers, Prada T-Shirt, Balenciaga Bag.

fields.product_name: Balenciaga - Triple S Mesh and Faux Leather Sneakers - Men - Neutrals
fields.description: Since they were first introduced by Mr Demna Gvasalia in 2017, Balenciaga's 'Triple S' have become some of the most in-demand sneakers of all timesCombining running, track and basketball styles, they're set on chunky rubber soles and have mesh and faux leather uppers and are finished with hiking-inspired lacesWear it with: Balenciaga Trousers, Balenciaga T-Shirt, Balenciaga Socks, Balenciaga Hat.

fields.product_name: Balenciaga - Soccer Logo-Print Faux Leather Sneakers - Men - Black
fields.description: Mr Demna Gvasalia has long been fascinated with vintage sportswear, and quite literally in this caseBalenciaga's quilted leather 'Soccer' shoes aren't your typical Sunday league boots, although the streamlined shape and moulded cleats lend the impression that they might just do the job in a pinchWear it with: Balenciaga Shirt, Balenciaga Trousers, Balenciaga Necklace, Givenchy Ring.

fields.product_name: Balenciaga - Triple S Clear Sole Faux Leather and Mesh Sneakers - Men - Yellow
fields.description: Every pair of Balenciaga's signature 'Triple S' sneakers has its own look and character, this fluorescent yellow version is undoubtedly one of the most eye-catchingMade from faux leather and tonal mesh, they're minimally detailed, save for the brand moniker and embroidered size at the toeThe futuristic clear soles help to create the chunky shape we all know and love, and are also injected with air for a comfortable, lighter feel.

fields.product_name: Balmain - B-Runner Nylon and Mesh Sneakers - Men - Black
fields.description: Balmain's popular 'B-Runner' sneakers have such a distinguishable designMade with nylon and mesh uppers, they feature an asymmetric lacing systems that wraps the heels and rest on chunky moulded rubber solesWear it with: Balmain T-shirt, SAINT LAURENT Denim jacket, Balenciaga Sweatpants, Bottega Veneta Bracelet.

fields.product_name: Balenciaga - Zen Logo-Print Faux Leather Sneakers - Men - White
fields.description: Balenciaga's streamlined 'Zen' sneakers are modelled after classic sports shoes, like those used in football and martial artsDetailed with topstitching, they have lightweight faux leather uppers, elasticated tongues and cushioned foam insoles for supportWear it with: Balenciaga Sweatpants, Balenciaga T-shirt, Maison Margiela Sweatshirt, Maison Margiela Bracelet.

fields.product_name: Balenciaga - Tyrex Nylon, Mesh, Faux Leather and Rubber Sneakers - Men - Silver
fields.description: Debuting on the SS20 runway, Balenciaga's futuristic 'Tyrex' sneakers are inspired by human anatomy and the natural web of muscles beneath the skin"The eye-catching design boasts details like asymmetrical caged uppers, exaggerated square toes and honeycomb heelsThey're made from nylon, mesh, rubber and faux leather and have shock-absorbing midsoles for comfortWear it with: Valentino Trousers, Balenciaga Blazer, Balenciaga T-shirt, Balenciaga Sunglasses.

fields.product_name: Balenciaga - Tyrex Rubber and Coated-Mesh Panelled Sneakers - Men - Black
fields.description: Part of the SS20 line-up, Balenciaga's new 'Tyrex' sneakers have distinct overlapped panelling inspired by the intricacies of human anatomyThey're constructed from rubber and coated-mesh and set on sculpted shock-absorbing solesThe square toecaps and backs are branded with the model and house monikerWear it with: Acne Studios Jeans, Undercover T-shirt, Prada Coat.

fields.product_name: Burberry - Logo-Print Two-Tone Rubber-Trimmed Cotton-Gabardine Sneakers - Men - Black
fields.description: Burberry has a way of making simple styles feel really freshIn a cool, two-tone design, these cap-toe sneakers are printed with the label's new sans-serif logo spliced between the cotton-gabardine uppers and high rubber foxingWear them with: Burberry Shirt, Burberry Trousers, Burberry Bag, Burberry Belt.

fields.product_name: Burberry - Suede and Checked-Cotton Sneakers - Men - Neutrals
fields.description: Few patterns have been around as long as Burberry's iconic check, it was originally used to line the label's trench coats in the 1920sFeaturing the recognisable motif, these Italian-made low-top sneakers have lightweight cotton uppers and suede panels at the toes and heels for durabilityWear it with: Burberry Jeans, Burberry Jacket, Burberry T-shirt, Burberry Hat.

fields.product_name: Converse - Chuck 70 Canvas Sneakers - Men - Red
fields.description: Converse released its original 'Chuck 70' sneakers over 40 years ago and they've been a consistent best-seller ever sinceThis pair is upgraded with heavier-duty canvas uppers and set on vulcanised soles with slightly higher rubber foxing for durabilityWear it with: Pasadena Leisure Club Hoodie, nanamica Blazer, OrSlow Jeans, Dries Van Noten Bracelet.
fields.material: inner fabric outer fabric sole rubber

fields.product_name: Converse - Chuck 70 OX Canvas Sneakers - Men - Blue
fields.description: Converse's low-top sneakers are arguably one of the most classic options out there, they've been a firm favourite of athletes, skaters and band members since way backAn updated version of the original 'All Star' model, this 'Chuck 70 OX' pair has thick canvas uppers, higher foxing and Ortholiteâ¢ footbeds so they're particularly comfy if you're on your feet all dayWear them with: Y-3 Sweatpants, Acne Studios Sweater, Norse Projects Socks, Polaroid Originals Cameras.

fields.product_name: Converse - Chuck 70 OX Canvas Sneakers - Men - Green
fields.description: Converse's low-top sneakers are arguably one of the most classic options out there, they've been a firm favourite of athletes, skaters and band members since way backAn updated version of the original 'All Star' model, this 'Chuck 70 OX' pair has thick canvas uppers, higher foxing and Ortholiteâ¢ footbeds so they're particularly comfy if you're on your feet all dayWear them with: Folk T-shirt, Saman Amel Sweater, Norse Projects Trousers, MAPLE Ring.
