fields.product_name: Converse - Chuck 70 OX Giraffe-Print Canvas Sneakers - Men - Brown
fields.description: We're going to stick our necks out and say that Converse's giraffe-print 'Chuck 70 OX' sneakers are some of the best we've seen latelyMade from the same weighty canvas we expect of the brand, this low-top style will go nicely with olive chinos, blue jeans or printed shortsWear it with: Acne Studios Jeans, Wacko Maria Shirt.
fields.material: fabric / inner:fabric&rubber / sole:rubber:Upper: Fabric / Inner: Fabric & Rubber / Sole: Rubber and inner: fabric. sole: rubber

fields.product_name: Converse - Chuck 70 OX Zebra-Print Canvas Sneakers - Men - Neutrals
fields.description: Have you really earned your sartorial stripes unless you've invested in one of Converse's special editions? Over the years, the brand has decorated its sneakers with everything from rainbows to Bart SimpsonThis canvas pair of its 'Chuck 70 OX' model features a fun zebra print and is finished with the usual rubber toe caps and solesWear it with: Neighborhood Shirt, Vans Trousers, Vans T-shirt.
fields.material: fabric / inner:fabric&rubber / sole:rubber:Upper: Fabric / Inner: Fabric & Rubber / Sole: Rubber and inner: fabric. sole: rubber

fields.product_name: Converse - Chuck 70 OX Printed Canvas Sneakers - Men - Black
fields.description: From the bold flame pattern to the iconic low-top silhouette, Converse's 'Chuck 70' sneakers take cues straight from the label's archivesThey're made from durable canvas and set on OrthoLite insoles for all-day comfort and cushioningWear it with: Folk Sweatshirt.
fields.material: fabric / inner:fabric&rubber / sole:rubber:Upper: Fabric / Inner: Fabric & Rubber / Sole: Rubber and inner: fabric. sole: rubber

fields.product_name: TOM FORD - Bannister Leather-Trimmed Suede Sneakers - Men - Purple
fields.description: A luxurious pair of sneakers like TOM FORD's 'Bannister' style is an excellent investment, every feature is carefully considered, so you can really feel the premium qualityMade in Italy from supple suede, they're lined with leather for comfort and have designer emblems at the heel tabsThe ridged rubber soles create traction when you walkWear it with: The Row Jacket, TOM FORD T-shirt, TOM FORD Jeans, Le Gramme CuffSmall to sizeSee Size & Fit notes.

fields.product_name: TOM FORD - Bannister Leather-Trimmed Suede Sneakers - Men - Blue
fields.description: A luxurious pair of sneakers like TOM FORD's 'Bannister' style is an excellent investment, every feature is carefully considered, so you can really feel the premium qualityMade in Italy from supple suede, they're lined with leather for comfort and have designer emblems at the heel tabsThe ridged rubber soles create traction when you walkWear it with: TOM FORD Jacket, TOM FORD T-shirt, TOM FORD Jeans, Prada SocksSmall to sizeSee Size & Fit notes.

fields.product_name: TOM FORD - Cambridge Leather-Trimmed Suede Sneakers - Men - Burgundy
fields.description: TOM FORD's 'Cambridge' sneakers will work double-time in your wardrobe as they're easy to dress up or downConstructed with tactile suede uppers, they're set on rubber soles and minimally detailed with leather trims and branded heel tabsTry them with dark jeans or casual suitingWear it with: Brunello Cucinelli Sweatpants, TOM FORD T-shirt, TOM FORD Jacket, TOM FORD SweaterSmall to sizeSee Size & Fit notes.

fields.product_name: TOM FORD - Jagga Leather-Trimmed Suede and Mesh Sneakers - Men - Gray
fields.description: It seems that each new style in TOM FORD's ever-growing lineup of cool sneakers is even better than the lastMeticulously made in Italy from premium suede, leather and technical mesh, this latest 'Jagga' pair has cushioned insoles and padded collars for unparalleled comfortWear it with: SAINT LAURENT Jeans, Orlebar Brown Shirt, TOM FORD Jacket, TOM FORD CardholderSmall to sizeSee Size & Fit notes.

fields.product_name: Tod's - Leather, Nubuck and Suede Sneakers - Men - Blue
fields.description: Tod's is best known for its impeccable driving shoes, but the label puts as much focus and consideration into its sneakersMade in the brand's Italian workshop from panels of contrastingly textured nubuck, suede and leather, this pair is stamped with the label's moniker on the tongue and finished with an embossed version at the sideWear it with: Loro Piana Sweater, Loro Piana Trousers, Loro Piana Jacket, Tod's Bracelet.
fields.material: fabric / inner:fabric&rubber / sole:rubber:Upper: Fabric / Inner: Fabric & Rubber / Sole: Rubber leather / sole rubber

fields.product_name: Tod's - Leather, Nubuck and Suede Sneakers - Men - Gray
fields.description: Tod's is best known for its impeccable driving shoes, but the label puts as much focus and consideration into its sneakersMade in the brand's Italian workshop from panels of contrastingly textured nubuck, suede and leather, this pair is stamped with the label's moniker on the tongue and finished with an embossed version at the sideWear it with: Berluti Jeans, Kiton T-shirt, Dunhill Jacket.

fields.product_name: Vans - OG Era LX Colour-Block Suede and Nubuck Sneakers - Men - Black
fields.description: Pro skateboarders Tony Alva and Stacy Peralta helped Vans develop its classic 'Era' sneakers back in the '70s, and they've been one of the label's most popular styles ever sinceDesigned with comfortable padded collars, this 'LX' pair is made from colour-block panels of suede and nubuck and has thick, waffled rubber soles for gripWear it with: Reese CooperÂ® Hoodie, Reese CooperÂ® Trousers, Neighborhood Scarf, Neighborhood Socks.
fields.material: Upper Leather/Inner Textile// Sole Other Materials

fields.product_name: Vans - OG SK8-Hi LX Leather-Trimmed Suede and Canvas High-Top Sneakers - Men - Green
fields.description: Following Vans' 'Old Skool' style, the 'SK8-Hi' sneakers were among the first to feature the label's signature side stripe, a design created by co-founder Mr Paul Van Doren originally dubbed the 'Jazz Stripe'This 'OG LX' pair is made from durable canvas and suede, trimmed with leather and set on flat waffled solesWear them with: Reese CooperÂ® T-shirt, WTAPS Sweatpants, WTAPS Cardholder, WTAPS Belt.
fields.material: Upper Leather and Textile//Inner Textile/// Sole Other Materials

fields.product_name: Vans - Style 73 DX Anaheim Factory Leather-Trimmed Suede Sneakers - Men - Burgundy
fields.description: These 'Style 73 DX Anaheim Factory' sneakers pay homage to the location where Vans' kicks were originally made in Orange County, California, and are a reissue of a style produced there in the '90sThey're made from leather-trimmed suede in a vintage-inspired burgundy hueWear them with: Acne Studios Jeans, Acne Studios Sweater, Velva Sheen T-shirt, Le Gramme Bracelet.

fields.product_name: Vans - Neighbourhood Old Skool 36 DX Leather-Trimmed Suede Sneakers - Men - Black
fields.description: Collaborations are common in Vans' universe and the latest sees legendary graffiti and tattoo artist MrCartoon join forces with Japanese brand Neighborhood for a three-way link-upPart of the 'Uncle Toons Mart' capsule, these 'Old Skool 36 DX' are constructed with plush suede uppers and trimmed with black leatherThey're set on waffled rubber soles and embroidered with swirling script on the toecaps, referencing the brands' home townsWear it with: Vans T-shirt, Vans Trousers, Vans Tote Bag, Vans Socks.

fields.product_name: visvim - Corda-Folk Leather-Trimmed Suede Sneakers - Men - Black
fields.description: visvim puts a strong focus on craftsmanship and quality materials, these 'Corda-Folk' sneakers are a great example of bothInspired by vintage tennis shoes, they're made from smooth suede and simply detailed with the brand's V emblem in grained leatherWear it with: EDWIN Jeans, visvim Shirt, Le Gramme Bracelet, KAPITAL Pouch.

fields.product_name: visvim - Corda-Folk Leather-Trimmed Suede Sneakers - Men - Gray
fields.description: visvim puts a strong focus on craftsmanship and quality materials, these 'Corda-Folk' sneakers are a great example of bothInspired by vintage tennis shoes, they're made from smooth suede and simply detailed with the brand's V emblem in grained leatherWear it with: visvim Shirt, Save Khaki United Trousers, Velva Sheen T-shirt, Mr PSocks.

fields.product_name: visvim - Corda-Folk Leather-Trimmed Suede Sneakers - Men - Neutrals
fields.description: visvim puts a strong focus on craftsmanship and quality materials, these 'Corda-Folk' sneakers are a great example of bothInspired by vintage tennis shoes, they're made from smooth suede and simply detailed with the brand's V emblem in grained leatherWear it with: OrSlow Jeans, KAPITAL T-shirt, KAPITAL Socks, Le Gramme Bracelet.

fields.product_name: visvim - Gila Moc Mid II Suede High-Top Sneakers - Men - Brown
fields.description: Gila Moc Mid II' is the second and much-anticipated footwear release from visvim's SS20 collectionSet on VibramÂ® rubber soles, EVA phylon midsoles and cork footbeds for optimal cushioning, they have moccasin-inspired uppers made from butter-smooth suede and fasten with a gunmetal-tone buckleWear it with: KAPITAL Jeans, Acne Studios T-shirt, KAPITAL Shirt, Acne Studios Hat.

fields.product_name: visvim - Roland Leather-Trimmed Suede and Mesh Sneakers - Men - Black
fields.description: When I design products, I consider what is necessary to make something long-lasting, or what kind of things can be enjoyed for a long time" explains visvim's Mr Hiroki NakamuraThese 'Roland' sneakers are panelled from all-black mesh and suede and lined in comfortable, breathable leatherThey're fitted with contrasting cream laces and substantial VibramÂ® rubber solesShown here with visvim jacket, Remi Relief T-shirt, Chimala trousersThis item is small to sizeSee Size & Fit notes.

fields.product_name: visvim - Roland Leather-Trimmed Suede and Mesh Sneakers - Men - Blue
fields.description: Built with longevity in mind and modelled on comfortable basketball styles, visvim's 'Roland' sneakers are a real fan favouriteMade from suede and mesh with leather heel tabs and linings, this pair rests on durable VibramÂ® rubber soles and has comfortable padded collarsShown here with OrSlow jeans, nanamica T-shirt, nanamica sweatshirtThis item is small to sizeSee Size & Fit notes.

fields.product_name: visvim - Roland Leather-Trimmed Suede and Mesh Sneakers - Men - Orange
fields.description: visvim's Mr Hiroki Nakamura regularly spends his time sifting through vintage stores and flea markets (he even met his wife in one) which explains the throwback feel to his designsInspired by retro baseball shoes, these 'Roland' sneakers are made from panels of suede and breathable mesh and trimmed with leather heel tabsThe durable VibramÂ® rubber soles are selected so they stand up to years of wearShown here with KAPITAL jeans, Remi Relief T-shirt, visvim jacketThis item is small to sizeSee Size & Fit notes.

fields.product_name: adidas Originals - Gazelle Vintage Leather-Trimmed Brushed-Suede Sneakers - Men - Blue
fields.description: Inspired by training shoes from the '60s, these adidas Originals' 'Gazelle Vintage' sneakers are a nod to the brand's first version that were only available in red or blueStreamlined and lightweight, they're made from brushed-suede and trimmed with white leatherSet on rubber soles, they're detailed with convenient pull tabs and the signature three stripes.
fields.material: outer- leather / inner- leather and fabric / sole- rubber

fields.product_name: adidas Originals - Hamburg Leather-Trimmed Suede Sneakers - Men - Burgundy
fields.description: These sneakers are a revival of adidas Originals' vintage classic, which was a popular choice for football fans across Europe in 1982This suede pair is stamped with 'Hamburg' in gold lettering and trimmed with the brand's three stripes in leatherThe rubber soles will keep you steady, whether at a match or in the cityWear it with: adidas Originals T-Shirt, WTAPS Trousers, MAPLE Necklace, adidas Originals Bucket hat.
fields.material: fabric / inner:fabric&rubber / sole:rubber:Upper: Fabric / Inner: Fabric & Rubber / Sole: Rubber leather sole rubber

fields.product_name: adidas Originals - Gazelle Vintage Leather-Trimmed Brushed-Suede Sneakers - Men - Red
fields.description: Inspired by training shoes from the '60s, these adidas Originals' 'Gazelle Vintage' sneakers are a nod to the brand's first version that were only available in red or blueStreamlined and lightweight, they're made from brushed-suede and trimmed with white leatherSet on rubber soles, they're detailed with convenient pull tabs and the signature three stripes.
fields.material: outer- leather / inner- leather and fabric / sole- rubber

fields.product_name: adidas Originals - Superstar Pure Leather and Rubber-Trimmed Suede Sneakers - Men - Black
fields.description: This edition of adidas Originals' 'Superstar Pure' sneakers pay homage to The City That Never SleepsDesigned to celebrate the style's 50th anniversary, this pair is made from suede, reinforced with leather and signature rubber toe capsThe duo-tone colourway has a minimal, urban feelWear it with: adidas Originals T-shirt, Acne Studios Jeans, Saturdays NYC Bucket Hat, Norse Projects Socks.

fields.product_name: adidas Originals - Gazelle Vintage Leather-Trimmed Textured-Suede Sneakers - Men - Green
fields.description: Why mess with perfection? adidas Originals certainly doesnât, these 'Gazelle Vintage' sneakers have the same slim silhouette as their â60s predecessorThe dark-green suede upper has a fuzzy finish and is lifted with white trimsNote the oversized heel tabsWear it with: adidas Originals T-shirt, Levi's Vintage Clothing Jeans.

fields.product_name: Church's - Shannon Polished-Leather Derby Shoes - Men - Black
fields.description: These 'Shannon' Derby shoes have been one of Church's most popular style since they debuted in 1970Handcrafted from a single piece of leather in Northampton, England, they're detailed with artisanal touches, including half-moon stitching securing the eyestays and hand-written details along the liningThe polished binder finish gives them an elegant look, while the durable GoodyearÂ®-welted soles ensure they'll last.
fields.material: Shannon Polish Binder Leather Derby W/Leather Sole

fields.product_name: Common Projects - Polished-Leather Derby Shoes - Men - Burgundy
fields.description: You can tell from the simple, minimalist uppers of Common Projects ' Derby shoes that the label places emphasis on flawless craftsmanship over obvious brandingDiscreetly stamped with a gold serial number at the heel, they've been made in Italy from supple polished-leather and feature lightweight rubber-crepe soles to ensure lasting comfortThe rich burgundy will look great with black trousers and inky jeans alikeShown here with Acne Studios jacket, Mr Prollneck, Acne Studios trousers.

fields.product_name: Paul Smith - Ludlow Polished-Leather Derby Shoes - Men - Black
fields.description: Paul Smith's 'Ludlow' Derby shoes are as classic and versatile as they come; they'll make a great match for clothes on the smarter side, whether you're wearing dark jeans or a suitSet on rubber soles, they're made from polished black leather and have durable waxed lacesWhy not take the opportunity to stock up on some of the brand's socks, too? Shown here with Mr Ptrousers, John Smedley sweater, Margaret Howell jacket.

fields.product_name: Paul Smith - Chester Leather Derby Shoes - Men - Brown
fields.description: Specially designed for travelling, Paul Smith 's 'Chester' Derby shoes are comfortable yet smart so you won't need to pack additional pairsThey're made from supple leather, and fitted with flexible soles that have extra padding under the ball of the footShown here with John Smedley sweater, Paul Smith trousers, Paul Smith suit jacket.

fields.product_name: Rick Owens - Geobasket Rubber High-Top Sneakers - Men - Black
fields.description: Rick Owens' signature off-kilter aesthetic is displayed by the hybrid design of these sneakersThey're made from protective rubber with elongated tongues and taped up to give off the appearance of bootsWear them with: Balenciaga Trousers, Bottega Veneta Sweater, Rick Owens Raincoat, Bottega Veneta Bag.
